1.content: Welcome to the world of...
1.title: What Franchise?

choices: Chun Li stay's on the offensive...
1112.content:
Today was yet again, another beautiful day in New York, New York. Chun Li went all over the world, basically her version of a vacation. A relaxing get away from her usual everyday life of fighting criminals, day in and day out. She loved what she did, the lives she's saved and the people she'd helped but even she needed some time to breathe. Everyday Chun Li would take a stroll in the afternoon, it didn't matter where she was currently and this day was no different. She would wear her cop uniform but would make sure it didn't yell "On duty", it was very casual and not to be confused as a NYPD officer. It was 12:45 and she was taking her daily walk, taking in the hustle and bustle of New York City. People being loud on the streets was common but what Chun Li heard somewhere in the distance wasn't the typical young man yelling at traffic. It was a woman, a woman dressed up in what easily separated her from anyone else that was around her. It was her old rival... Juri Han.

"Hey kid, didn't your mommy ever tell you sharing is caring?" Juri asked the child. The child being about 12, maybe 13 years of age.

"B-But that's is my lunch! My Mom gave me a $5 to pick out something!" The little boy pleaded.

"Beat it kid, until I turn you outside down by your foot and take the change too." Juri said holding a hotdog in her hands.

"Juri!" Chun Li interrupted Juri's bullying, getting her attention.

"Oh lookie, it's... umm" Juri played dumb.

"What are you doing? Why're you in New York of all places?" Chun Li asked stone faced, not playing Juri's games.

"Getting ready to eat lunch, until you rudely interrupted."

"Speaking of rude..."

Chun Li approached the child and took a knee "Did that woman take your hot dog?"

"Mmhmm" The child replied on the verge of tears.

"First you ruthlessly attack the dolls as well as countless other crimes... and now you've resorted to taking food from children?"

"Hey, a girls gotta eat. Does this sexy fit look like it can fit a wallet?" Juri slid her hand seductively down her hip to her thigh. Years ago she wore a type of Taekwondo outfit but has now sported a skintight biker kind of outfit.

"Juri... give that little boy his food back." Chun Li demanded, still stonefaced.

"What? This hotdog?" Juri took a big bite consuming half of the frank. Chun Li's open palm forming a fist.

"Uggh, $2.50 for this crap. Good thing I didn't pay." Juri said as she tossed the other half onto the ground.

Now, the little boy was really crying.

Chun Li again confronting him "Shhh, don't cry. Don't worry I'll get you another one later, okay?"

If there was one thing that bothered Chun Li it was children being hurt, whether it was physical or through childish bullying, she wouldn't allow it. Juri knew she wouldn't allow it as well. She always the type to push people's buttons. But on vacation, a get away from this sort of action, a kid crying in front of her. Chun Li wasn't going to indulge Juri's behavior with a simple bout this time. Doing what she did to that kid was the ultimate slap in the face and right now... Chun Li wasn't in the mood for a smack of any kind.

Chun Li stuck a fighting pose in the direction of Juri "Awww, are you going to cry next, thunder thighs?"

Chun Li quickly went forward with her signature Hyakuretsukyaku. Juri dodged backwards avoiding her kicks...
1112.title: Chun Li Vs. Juri

11121.content:
Juri wasn't getting away this time, Chun Li had enough. If she were to let Juri get away scot free yet again not only would the rest of her vacation be utterly ruined but she wouldn't let it go for quite some time. She was an amazing fighter she knew that, and she knew she was better than Juri...

Juri and Chun Li aggressively traded blow for blow in the street causing civilians to back up and run away. Neither woman landing the strikes they were looking for but Chun Li's strikes came at a much quicker pace. Juri as skilled as she was, couldn't keep up that kind of speed. For the most part Juri stayed on the defense, dodging and jumping away from her kicks. Slowly but surely Juri was getting losing steam. Chun Li with the same no nonsense look kept up her pace for about 5 minutes, waiting for Juri to let her guard down.

As the fight continued Juri started to resort to using her forearms to block some of the blows instead of just dodging and jumping away... she was getting tired and Chun Li knew it...
11121.title: Chun Li on the offensive...

choices: Chun Li knocks Juri out cold...
111211.content:
"You're done, Juri!" Chun Li told the now sweating Juri.

"Aaaaaaah!" A flurry of kicks hit Juri's forearms.

"Y-You piece of!" Chun Li kept the kicks coming until Juri's arms limped to her side out of pain.

"You can't escape now!" Chun Li delivered a heel directly to the unprotected side of Juri's face sending her flying into the air and harshly onto the ground.

Chun Li looked over to the cowering little boy who hasn't left the scene like the others in the area.

Chun Li pulled out a $20 out of her pocket "Thanks for cheering me on from the sidelines... here take this and get something nice for you and your Mom."

"T-Thank you, ma'am!" The child started crying again.

"No problem, you're mom's going to be worried sick about you if you don't hurry on up. Go ahead... and be careful!" The little boy left running in the distance.

The warm smile left Chun Li's face as she turned around, her attention now again on Juri who was still down with legs wide open.

"...Now what to do with... this?" Chun Li mumbled to herself.
111211.title: Chun Li breaks Juri's defense...

1112111.content:
Chun Li looked down at the downed psychotic. She was panting... but not because she lost her bout. Her eyes where even more crazy than usual...

"Hahahahaa! I-Is that all you got girl!?" Juri asked, tilting her head upwards.

"You need help, Juri." Chun Li looked down in pity.

"Or you gonna play the doctor?"

"You're never going to stop this game are you?"

"Nah... I don't think I'm gonna." Juri said with a smirk.

Stomp

Chun Li kicked Juri in the lower gut and held it in place.

"Grooah!" Juri coughed up a little blood.

Chun Li's eyes stared through Juri.

"S-Someone's got a t-temper, huh?"

"...No, don't play this fiends game. It's no doubt what she wants. You don't wanna---" Chun Li thought to herself as she lifted her foot.

The sole of her boot was... slightly wet.

"What the Hell?" Chun Li mumbled.

Chun Li again looked at Juri's face... it wasn't just a face of pain... but of something else.

"...Eww. This... makes some sense."

"Juri... You just so happened to be in this city the same time I was?" Chun Li asked.

"..." Juri ignored the question and turned her head away.

"You love to fight... don't tell me you also love... losing them?" Chun Li asked not taking her eyes off of Juri.

Juri didn't need to answer, her reaction gave it away.

"Pfft, and you think I'm the insane one? Haha!" Juri laughed it off.

Chun Li placed her foot onto Juri's gut even lower than before and twisted her sole.

"Mmmh grooah!"

"I think you're a pervert, Juri. I think you stalk people fighting them over and over, taunting them... over and over to motivate them." Chun Li continued to twist her boot's sole.

"Y-You're..." Juri panted.

"You want to be punished. You wanted my attention... I think I'll give it to you. You're too dangerous to run these streets." Chun Li pulled out a pair of handcuffs which she always kept one of. You never know when you might need them.

Chun Li turned and lifted Juri to her feet, turned her around and put her wrists together cuffing her. "I'm not going to be your doctor, let's play cops."
1112111.title: Juri starts panting...

11121111.content:
"L-Let me go, you old ass hag!" Juri was loud on the way to Chun Li's spot. Ironically, Juri's screeching might have made the walk less awkward. Her loud annoying screams potentially keeping civilians away. Juri laid over her shoulders as she made her way...

"Now you're going to need to quiet down for me, we're almost there."

"A-Almost where!" Juri yelled still worming around on Chun Li's shoulder.

"Stop... yelling."

"Tell me where we're headed" Juri used her inside voice.

"My place, don't worry. You have nothing to worry about... you know I'm a respected authority figure." Chun Li opened the door to her hotel's lobby. The lady at the front desk didn't bother saying anything... just stared.

"W-What the Hell ya staring at, call the cops or something, lardass!" Juri yelled at the female desk attendant.

"What did I just say about raising your voice?" Chun Li menacingly muttered to Juri. Juri gulped nervously.

"Don't worry ma'am, I'm a cop. You're fine." Chun Li smiled at the frightened woman.

"You're not a cop... you're some international interpooling wannabe superhero."

"Even better." Chun Li continued her walk to her room.
11121111.title: Chun Li brings Juri to her hotel room...

choices: Juri stays quiet through her punishment.
111211111.content:
Chun Li opened the door to her hotel room and tossed the bound woman onto her bed.

Juri continued to be loud and obnoxious, wiggling around on the bed, as Chun Li got relaxed. She removed her boots and got relaxed.

"Quiet, there's others in this hotel."

"They'll hear your blood curdling screams and panic once I GET OUT OF HERE!" Juri frantically wiggled.

Chun Li was done with the back and fourth. "Your new gear doesn't look like it's too good for protection, Juri..."

Juri smiled. "I picked it up from Macy's to impress sluts like you."

Again, Chun Li didn't humor her, instead she bent down, eye to eye with Juri who was on her stomach. Chun Li raised her right palm and licked it for Juri to see. Juri looked confused as Chun Li got up...

"Arghh!" Juri cried out as Chun Li grabbed a hold onto her hair from behind, forcing her chin upwards.

"Get the Fu--" Juri yelled out before...

Slap!

Juri was even more confused about what was happening. "You bitch!"

Slap!

Another slap onto her ass, the noise loud against the slick, glossy fabric that encased it.

"Groooah!"

Slap!

"The louder you get, the harder I'm hitting." Chun Li told Juri.

"...When I get out."

Slap!

Chun Li rested her palm on Juri's behind. "If I let you out. Keep talking, Juri, I'll add a smack for every word you say."

Slap!

"...You." Juri groaned.

"That's one more, Juri, and I haven't even gave you the number I think you deserve..."

Slap!
111211111.title: Chun Li begins Juri's "Intermission"

1112111112.content:
"You... You stupid bitch. Do you actually think this is enough to keep me down and quiet?" Juri gasped.

"I can tell you're used to having control, I can also tell you've needed a good spanking for a long, long time." Chun Li released Juri's hair.

"You are right though; my hand isn't good enough... and your ass is starting to sting a little." Chun Li rubbed her palm and walked in front of Juri.

Juri looked up. Chun Li reached around her waist... and began to undo her belt. Juri's cringed as she knew what was coming next.

Despite knowing, Juri asked. "W-What?"

Chun Li responded by snapping her belt to make a cracking sound the echoed in the room.

"D-Don't you bit--"

Slap... Slap... Slap

Chun Li struck Juri's rear with her belt quickly, three times.

"Still talkative?" Chun Li smiled.

"...."

Slap

It wasn't that she couldn't handle pain... Juri has never felt more embarrassed in her life.

Slap

"Yes... this is what you've been missing in your life."

Slap

"Go on... call me an old hag..."

Slap

"...A slut."

Slap

"... A bitch."

Slap... Slap... Slap.

Juri's eyes started to tear up...

Chun Li took notice. "Awww, just a little while ago you were making a child cry. Do you see how it feels?"

"You get off on kicks but this is making you cry?"

"I wasn't getting off..." Juri finally spoke.

"...Must of been the rain, I guess. I think 10 more whips seems about right, don't you?" Chun Li toyed.

Juri didn't answer, she just kept her head down in shame.

Slap

Slap

Slap

Slap

Her behind surely, hot red, right about now...

Slap... Slap... Slap... Slap... Slap.

After the barrage, Juri cried out in pain.

Chun Li had told her to be quiet but loved Juri's scream.

Slap!

"Grrrrooooah!" Juri again, cried out.

Chun Li laid her belt across Juri's back.

"I'm going to assume you, get it now, right?"
1112111112.title: Juri refuses to quiet down.

11121111121.content:
Juri nodded her head in submission. A warm smile formed on Chun's face.

"This isn't who I am... but someone needed to fix you. You've been like this for far too long."

Chun Li picked up her cellphone. Juri looked up, wondering what she was up to next. "Hmmm, curious? I'm calling a friend. A friend who'd love to see you like this."

Juri groaned. "You're going to stay quiet while I'm on the phone, Juri."

Again, Juri uttered a whine similar as a dog would.

Chun dialed up a number...
11121111121.title: Chun Li's belt quiets Juri.

1131.content:
Yuri walked his way to school. It was a normal day, same old same old. Wake up, got to school, ...get ignored, go home, study, and relax. It was boring but also expected. Reaching the school he saw three girls walking wearing their, blue and white, school uniforms. Girl's that were quite cute and always ready to completely ignore him. Yuri exhaled heavily, he wouldn't mind a little attention every now and then but at least he didn't attract the attention of the loud rowdy boys that he went to school with either.

By the window, in the back, homeroom, Yuri held up his head with his palm looking out the window. He groaned as class went on. Highly intelligent relatively, he could certainly afford to daydream a little here and there. Time passed and eventually the last class came and went, slowly like every other day prior. Yuri grabbed his books filled with notes, waited for everyone else to leave, and then he got up and made his way out as well.

Yuri groaned out loud again and walked towards the entrance to go home... Same old same old.

...Until he felt... a forearm under his chin and a palm against his head.

Surprised, Yuri gasped. About 3 seconds later he would be gasping for air. In a snap, the muscular but slim forearm turned his lights out.



"...He doesn't have anything better to do. That I can assure you, guys!" Yuri's eyes fluttered as he heard a feminine voice mid-sentence. Still out of it, he couldn't keep his eyes open...

"Put him back until, you get us all in trouble, idiot!" A different voice, not quite as feminine voice, woke up Yuri.

"...Wha--- Where?" Yuri asked confused. Yuri's eyes blinking, shaking the webs out of his mind.

Both hands on her hips. "Good job, Makoto. You waked him up."

Yuri's eyes now focused, knew Makoto.. or at least heard of her. A long yellow headband with slighty ruffled up hair and clothes, she was a tomboy troublemaking delinquent of the school. Her first day, knocking two fellow students out cold. She was the talk of the school for a month. Next to her... Yuri didn't know but she had hair that would definitely make her stand out.

"Wh-Where Am I!?" Yuri yelled.

"Shhh, quiet down, will you?" The long haired girl asked.

"N-No! I won't quiet down!? Where am I?"

"...You're in school, what's it look like?" Yuri looked around.... Maybe it was a kind of dumb question. He was in an empty classroom... but that wasn't the point.

"B-But... Why though!? You chocked me out and dragged me here!?"

"I didn't do anything, that was this idiot." Her leg crossed along her lap, pointed to the other girl in the room. The other girl gave him the 'V sign'.

"You are going to need to calm down though. You're not getting me into trouble. Ibuki, you better start explaining."

"Alright, alright. I was getting to it." ...Her name was Ibuki.

"Well you see... Well first off, sorry for knocking you unconscious... but it should've been painless right?"

"...."

"Hmm, right." Ibuki continued.

"I've been watching you for a couple of weeks now and you don't seem to have all that much going on but I'm sure you're aware of that... So... Me and Makoto..."

"Just you." Makoto cut in.

"...sure. Thought we'd sit and... have a talk with you today, after school was finished."

"You choked me out..."

"I'm pretty sure it was painless." Ibuki awkwardly smiled.

"If this was just a sit and chat then why didn't you just ask me?"

"...Not my style? Look maybe I did go about it the wrong way but the past is the past." Ibuki twiddled her thumbs as Makoto stared at Yuri.

...That story clearly didn't add up. Ibuki wasn't here to talk to him about studying. He wasn't stupid, Makoto is here for a reason. "...What do you want from me?"

"Alright well, we know you don't have any after school activities so you are free for the rest of the day... so... we were wondering if you could help the two of us relieve a little... stress."

...This wasn't the kind of attention, Yuri wanted from the ladies.
1131.title: Yuri, a student at Ibuki's school...

11311.content:
Where they being... serious?

"...No."

"...Oh." Ibuki had a look of confusion.

"I'm going to leave now." Yuri got up from his chair and walked to the door before... Makoto stood in front of it.

"I guess it's a good thing you're here Makoto."

Makoto stood still with her arms crossed. "Stay quiet blockhead! You're the reason we're in this predicament."

"...I thought he'd be all for it." Ibuki shrugged.

"Look... whoever your name is, I get your answer but I'm not going to let you get me into trouble. Take a seat." Makoto pointed to the chair behind him.

Knowing her history, Yuri sat back down. "What... What are you going to do to me?"

"I... don't know. Convince you?" Ibuki also grabbed a seat.

"You can't help out a couple cuties like us?" Ibuki said with puppy dog eyes... Yuri knew very well how cute the two were.

"...I can't."

"Can't... or won't. Again, I've had my eyes on you. You don't have anywhere to be." Ibuki said frankly. It was true but Yuri didn't like hearing it out loud like that.

"Both." Yuri answered with attitude.

"Aaaargh, this was a waste of time, Ibuki. Let's make sure he doesn't say anything about what happened and we can go train."

Yuri gulped. "M-Make sure, I d-don't say anything!?"

"We're not stupid. Why wouldn't you report us after everything that happened?" Makoto asked, annoyed.

"I wasn't though!"

"Sure you weren't... but after walking out the door you might have forgotten to keep quiet." Makoto punched into her palm.

"Wawawait! ...Yuri are you sure you don't want to help us out? You'd really rather be alone all day?"

"...."

"You looked really... lonely. I thought we'd kinda be helping you out. You rub our backs you have something to actually do after school's out. There's a lot of other guys who wouldn't mind being in your position but they all seemed very... well, annoying. We just wanted somebody who looked quiet and... nice."

"...."

Ibuki worked her magic. "Makoto and I would really appreciate it, Yuri."

Yuri looked over towards Makoto who still looked menacing blocking the door with her arms folded.
11311.title: Ibuki and Makoto try and "convince" Yuri

113112.content:
She seemed nice enough... Ibuki, not Makoto who was about to cave his stomach in with her fist.

"...I'm not saying yes... but what did you have in mind?"

Ibuki with a toothy grin turned around and gave a thumbs up to Makoto. "Makoto wants massages after doing her thing, I just want you to... help with my homework every now and then. Not much different from a normal club!"

"...That's all?"

"Yeah... mostly. Sorry about choking you out... it have been a bit dramatic."

"It wasn't dramatic, it was incredibly stupid." Makoto added.

"Yes Makoto... as you've told me many times while he was sleeping. I heard you the first 10 times."

"...Anyways, it's still early." Ibuki grabbed her backpack.

"So... can you help me out now? I know this stuff must be easy for you being a smart guy and stuff." Yuri blushed.

"...I guess so." With that, Makoto took a seat.

"Umm... Are you joining us?"

"No. I do my own work."

"and she refuses to help me out." Ibuki pouted.

"You're not copying my work."

"W-Why not!?" Makoto just exhaled.

"You don't mind me copying your work do you Yuri?"

"Whatever gets me home quicker."

"Hahaa so you got notes on this?" Ibuki showed him her notebook as they got to work studying.



About 30 minutes later...



"Alright done already. Sorry for the wait Makoto, you ready to go?"

"I've been ready, Ibuki let's go."

"Yeah, yeah." Ibuki put her materials into her backpack.

Ibuki and Makoto made their way to the exit. "This is room 204, come here straight away school wraps up, Yuri. The door will be open."

"If you're not here in the first 10 or so minutes I'll go ahead and assume you've told somebody what Ibuki did... and that I was with her." Makoto gave Yuri a not so subtle threat as she walked out the door.

"Heh heh... Try not to make her angry okay, Yuri. See you tomorrow." Ibuki exited and waved to Yuri.
113112.title: Yuri gives it some thought...

1131121.content:
The hours at home came and went fast as all Yuri could think about was tomorrow. Makoto scared him and Ibuki was... cute but she likely was a story too. He didn't mind helping someone with their homework exactly but he had never given anyone a massage before... or have touched a woman in general. Despite all of these thoughts and worries, he slept very well.


It was a new day. So far, everything was the same. His new schedule will come into play after this last class...

Yuri made sure to arrive early to room 204. The door was unlocked just like Ibuki had said.

It was dark and quiet. Empty, seemingly for a while. Their were plenty of classrooms, this must of been one that was left over.

Yuri waited...

and waited...

...and waited.

About an hour later, Yuri heard the doorknob turn. "Ahh! Yuri!" Ibuki with high energy greeted.

"I thought you told me you would be here right after school was finished..."

"No... I told you, you'd better be here in the first 10 minutes. You're fine, should've grabbed a book or something to pass the time."

"She got you there." Ibuki added. "So... ready to start."

"Hold on Ibuki. Why don't you actually try doing it yourself. The guy owes me a massage from yesterday."

"Fine... I'll wait." Ibuki took a seat relaxing... not opening a book.

"Look... I've never given anybody a massage before so---"

"We know ya haven't. No offense, but anyone would guess that by looking at you." Makoto insulted as Ibuki covered her mouth, hiding her smirk.

"I'll guide you through it, just don't test my patience or anything."

Yuri couldn't promise that... "I'll try."

"First my shoulders." Makoto pointed behind her.

"A-Alright." His hands were clearly shaking as he rested his palms onto her shoulders.

"Use a lot of force." Yuri did as told. He could feel pure muscle. He knew Makoto was built but he had to wonder what she had to do to actually build this up.

"Hrmm. Not so bad for a first timer with a frame of a string bean."

"...Okay." Yuri took the compliment.

"Just a little more pressure and then go lower." Yuri rubbed a tad harder and progressively made his way lower.

"Aaaalright." Makoto stretched her arms out.

"My plan's not seeming so dumb now is it?" Ibuki watched from her chair at Makoto's expression.

"No... just the first part really." Makoto uttered.

"Sooo are you done now, Makoto?"

"Hmmm." Makoto thought...
1131121.title: A new school "Club"

choices: "I don't really... want to do it."
11311211.content:
"Hold on, Ibuki." Makoto fiddled with her right shoe. "Damn, do I hate these things." Makoto popped off her shoe off of her foot.

Yuri watched on, knowing what was coming. He wasn't ready for this...

Ibuki bounced her right foot on top of her left as Makoto removed her other shoe from her foot. "I don't mind the shoes at all, they really make you feel like a normal student."

Makoto hooked her fingers around her sock. "School's out. My feet aren't supposed to be cooped up inside shoes."

Makoto placed her freshly bared feet onto the ground. "Ummm, Makoto..."

"What?" Makoto raised an eyebrow.

"Are you really going to get Yuri to rub your feet... Umm... smelling like that?" Ibuki didn't know any other way to put it.

Yuri felt a sweat on his forehead start to form. Ibuki asking what he was thinking.

"...What? Why the Hell not? A man who can't handle something like this is no man at all." Makoto said, annoyed.

Makoto looked over at Yuri who was silent. "It doesn't bother you, right?"

"Of course, he's not going to be honest. He's freaking scared of you, Makoto!"

"I've gotten use to the smell, like the smell of Don-Chan in my bedroom." Yuri figured Don was a pet... hoped so too.

"If you're not comfortable, just tell me Yuri..." Ibuki seemed rather nice. She meant well but... she wasn't always going to be with Makoto. The smell is... strong but maybe it'll be worth it to try and get on Makoto's good side.

Yuri looked at Ibuki who had a soft smile and then at Makoto, both feet planted on the ground, who looked like she was tired of waiting...
11311211.title: Makoto's massage

113112112.content:
"...It's fine, Ibuki." Yuri muttered.

"Whelp it's your nose, Yuri." Ibuki got up out of her chair and laid out onto where the teacher would give his/her lessons in front of the blackboard.

Yuri looked back over at Makoto. The look of annoyance replaced with a look of expectancy. "Move you chair closer and get started." Makoto ordered.

"Y-Yeah..." Yuri did as told. Makoto lifted her left foot and placed it between Yuri's legs.

"The same as you handled the shoulders."

"Got it." Yuri hated the tone of Makoto but he knew he couldn't... or wouldn't do anything about it. After all... this wasn't about getting a head start in a new career in foot massaging, it was about getting friendly with this very aggressive woman.

Like instructed, Yuri handled Makoto's foot as he did her shoulders. Like her shoulders, you could feel muscle. Her foot a little dusty from being on the school ground and the size and weight behind it felt like her foot could turn a brick into powder. When she knocked out those guys on her first day, it was no fluke or miracle. This girl was fit, he didn't see how powerful she was up close but now... he could feel it. Speaking of powerful... the scent traveled upwards. Truth be told, it wasn't horrible but it was very much present.

Yuri grabbed hold of Makoto's other foot and dropped the other to the ground softly, as she paid very little attention to him. "...I guess that means I'm doing good." He thought to himself.

Yuri looked over at Ibuki who was still relaxing on the teachers desk doing "The pose" while on her phone... not even getting started with her homework.

Yuri continued to rub as he every now and then looked up to see Makoto's face. Every time he looked up her face was the same. Bored and ready for her massage to be over.

"Was that good Makoto?" Yuri asked getting Makoto's attention as he stopped rubbing but kept hold of her foot.

Makoto retracted her foot from Yuri's hands. "Yeah... you're good."

"Took you long enough." Ibuki got up and dangled her legs off the front of the desk.

"Yuri toss me your work!" Yuri began to open his backpack.

"Wait , wait, wait... Makoto, toss me his book."

"What? Why?" Makoto asked.

Ibuki looked at Yuri. "Do you want your stuff smelling like feet?"

"Ibuki... he didn't complain once. My feet smell fine... just sweat and hard work."

"Makoto... c'mon, we're friends... honestly, your feet smell strong."

"It's fine, Makoto. The book she's looking for is the blue textbook." The conversation was on the friendly side but Yuri still felt he should interrupt.

"...Hmph" Makoto looked into Yuri's backpack and grabbed the text.

Next she threw it carelessly to Ibuki across the room. Ibuki caught it with ease but... Yuri always keep his things neat and collected and Makoto threw his book like a Frisbee.

"Good stuff, I'll be done in like a sec, Makoto." Ibuki went to grab her textbook.

"Come over here, Yuri. I might have a question or something."

Yuri got up and took his chair with him... she didn't have any questions, just wrote down his notes. When she was done she got up, walked over, and dropped his textbook back into his backpack.

"Alright, Makoto. We're ready to go. Thanks again, Yuri. I know Makoto's thanking you too but I'm sure you can tell the type of girl she is."

"Hey... I'm right here." Makoto got up, still barefoot, her socks tucked into her shoes as she carried them.

"...You're going to get us in trouble, if you get caught, Makoto." Ibuki awkwardly smiled seeing that Makoto wasn't putting her shoes back on.

"I'm sure you could just poof away." Makoto replied.

"Hahaha... heh heh heeeh." Ibuki awkwardly laughed.

"...Poof?" Yuri asked out loud.

"...Yeah. We'll see you again tomorrow right, Yuri?" Ibuki ignored Yuri's confusion and continued.

"...Sure, I guess so."

"Nice. Thanks, Yuri." Ibuki got up and held the classroom door open for Makoto.

"Until then..." Ibuki waved as she walked out.

"Not a bad massage, Yuri. Later." Makoto raised her left hand, her way of saying bye. Yuri's eyes catching her long toned legs walk out, bare feet naturally lifting off the ground. Yuri didn't dare look at her legs in the classroom but they were nice... very nice. They, like the rest of her body, were toned but somehow not reducing their femininity.

Taking everything in for a second, Yuri finally got up. He was going to go home... but before that he went to the bathroom to rinse his hands. He didn't want anyone asking any questions. Yuri wrapped up the day by gaming for a while, until he got sleepy and then got ready for bed...
113112112.title: Yuri continues Makoto's massage

1131121121.content:
The next day...

Yuri opened the door to the classroom... day 3 of this after-school activity. He dropped his backpack next to his chair and heavily exhaled as he relaxed in his chair.

Yuri heard the door open, first came in Ibuki and after her Makoto... who was already barefoot holding onto her school shoes with her socks tucked into them.

"H-Hello." Yuri greeted Ibuki and Makoto.

"Hey, Yuri." Ibuki dropped her stuff on the teachers desk setup like she did yesterday.

"You can hand her your notes and then get started." Makoto ordered as she crossed her arms and legs.

Yuri silently handed Ibuki everything she needed. "Thank you!"

Yuri then returned back into his seat. Makoto raised her right foot. More dirty than yesterday, her feet picking up the dirt off of the school's grounds. The classrooms were kept clean but it was obviously harder to keep those hallways spotless. There was a positive though... the fresh smell from yesterday was gone. Still a bit of perspiration but walking barefoot before coming in the classroom, aired them out. Yuri grabbed hold of her foot and got started...
1131121121.title: The next day...

11311211212.content:
Yuri stopped rubbing... Someone was knocking on the door!

Yuri started to panic, attempting to stand up out of his chair before Makoto's foot held him down. "Stay... Keep rubbing."

Yuri ignored her order initially as he stared at the door.

"You got the right place, c'mon in girl!" Ibuki yelled.

"Hello, friends!" In walked a very tall dark skinned girl with snow white hair. It was the foreign exchange student, Elena.

"Welcome to the club, hnnng!" Ibuki greeting was interrupted by a big hug.

"Thank you for the invitation!"

"Elena, quiet down. You're even louder than Ibuki." Makoto warned as Ibuki put her finger to her lips signaling her to sshhh.

"Right, sorry! I'll quiet down..." Elena looked at Makoto to apologized and noticed she was barefoot.

Elena tilted her head. "Makoto, is it okay to be shoeless?"

"It's okay in our room. This is our club to relax in... speaking of." Makoto looked at Yuri.

Yuri was still confused to why the "club" has a new member... This group was diverse.

"Didn't she tell you to rub her feet?" Ibuki asked noting, Makoto's face.

Yuri, annoyed. "What? First off..."

"Hello, I'm Elena!" Elena grabbed Yuri's hand with both of hers.

"...Umm."

"And what's your name?" Elena smiled.

"...."

"His name is, Yuri and he really should get to work." Makoto answered for him.

Scared, Yuri took the hint and got back to work in front of Elena.

"Is he your... servant?" Elena asked, confused. Ibuki giggled.

"Something like that." Makoto answered.

Elena brought her palms together in excitement. "Interesting!"

"...I-I'm not a servant." Yuri mumbled.

"Go ahead and get comfy, Elena. I know you hate shoes about as much as Makoto."

"Wonderful!" Elena didn't bend down... she simply lifted her long legs up to remove both her shoes and socks. Such a simple thing looked graceful. She wasn't showing off her flexibility, it was just natural. Like Makoto the soles of her feet laid flat on the ground... the school floors weren't the warmest.

"I'm sure you don't mind another cutie, joining us right, Yuri?" Ibuki directed the question at Yuri but her knew she didn't actually need an answer.

Elena eyed Makoto's massage in envy as Yuri continued...
11311211212.title: Someone opens the classroom door.

113112112121.content:
"Makoto, may I have a turn when you have finished?"

"Yeah, yeah." Makoto answered with her arms crossed.

Still in the process of the massage, Yuri thought "...Is it not up to me at all?"

"Ahaha, what a man..." Ibuki said sarcastically. Her words, not Makoto's, tended to annoy him the most.

After some time...

Makoto removed her foot from Yuri's hands signaling she was finished with him.

"Elena, have a seat!" Makoto got attention as Elena was chatting with Ibuki was had finished copying Yuri's homework.

Makoto walked over towards Ibuki. Elena asked her. "...You're finished?"

Makoto sat in the chair Elena was using. "Yeah."

Elena looked at Makoto, confused. "...Before the tongue bath?"

Yuri wasn't paying attention to their conversation. Both Ibuki and Makoto asked... "W-What!?"

"He is a servant... yes?" Elena tilted her head, still confused.

Ibuki was astonished and Makoto was blushing.

"K-Kinda..." Ibuki answered.

"Are your servants different here?"

Makoto stayed quiet still blushing as Ibuki handled the talking. "I mean..."

"In Africa... you had servants that licked your feet?"

"I mean... not all the time, Ibuki." Elena answered as if it would be common knowledge.

"...Well excuse me princess" Ibuki joked.

"I thought you got a servant because you two loved fighting and training." Elena asked.

"We did.. that was the plan."

Elena continued. "To relive the stress of the day..."

Ibuki replied. "...Yeah."

"Ibuki, I'm confused..."

"Me too..."

"...You're weird... It's not confusing, she wants her freaking feet licked!" Makoto finally spoke out... alerting Yuri.

Makoto hid her face in her palms, Ibuki gave her usual awkward smile, and Elena gave a big smile while waving at Yuri...
113112112121.title: Elena shares her "servant" experiance.

1131121121212.content:
Yuri got up out of his seat. "...I'm outta here."

"Wait, servant!" Elena called out.

"I'm not your servant, I'm not anyone's servant. It was bad enough massaging Makoto's rank feet but hearing that, made up my mind." Yuri, annoyed, not worrying about the consequences of his harsh words.

The red was gone from her face, Makoto gave him a disapproving stare, but Yuri didn't care.

"And I'm not licking the freaking feet of some girl how I must met less than an hour ago!"

Elena looked at him confused. Yuri's words were straight and to the point. There was nothing to be confused about, the look on her face further pushed Yuri to his limit.

Yuri, finally looked at Ibuki. "...and no cutesy smile is going to get me from getting my ass out of here."

Yuri angrily made his way towards the classroom door opening the door.

Yuri was going to leave until someone's foot closed the door shut before he could...
1131121121212.title: Yuri attempts to leave...

choices: Ibuki seated in front of him...
11311211212121.content:
Yuri looked down. A school shoe pressed against the door. It was Ibuki who had somehow creeped up behind him to close the door.

"Sit back down, Yuri."

"I said no, I am leaving!" Yuri yelled in her face. She didn't move nor flinch.

Yuri tried to force the door open. "Move your foot, Ibuki." and she did.

Yuri continued to open up the door before...

Ibuki placed her arms around Yuri's neck , similar to their first meeting. Scared, Yuri attempted to elbow her off of him but that only increased the pressure of her hold.

"Go ahead, keep struggling." The cuteness in her voice was gone.

Still in her head lock, Ibuki turned him around back away from the door.

"Are you going to calm down."

Yuri couldn't breathe...

"Attempt to nod your head, I'll feel ya." Yuri tried to nod. Ibuki pushed him to the ground.

"Don't be rude to my friends, Yuri." Ibuki said.

Yuri just coughed, getting more oxygen into his lungs. His head spinning, he wasn't in the headlock long at all but he was seeing stars.

"Y-You... can't keep me here..."

"No, but I can convince you." Ibuki replied.

Ibuki went on. "The past couple of days you've been so good, too and you start to act up when a new member comes on in."

"I'm... not... licking... her feet."

"It appears... he isn't what I thought. I'm sorry for the trouble, Ibuki."

Ibuki looked at Elena. "Enough, Elena... You were right. He pretty much is our servant. A bad one, one that isn't as smart as he thinks he is. Listen... I tried to be nice but, you don't seem to be getting it."

"You're a loser, Yuri... and you're not leaving this club." Yuri just listed in anger as he was still catching his breath on the ground.

"You are not above licking a princess's feet. I don't blame you for not wanting to do it but, I'm telling you, you're not above it. Someone like you, isn't going to embarrass me in front of them."

"You're not keeping me here." Yuri said, again.

"Want me to use him as a punching bag for ya?" Makoto got up out of her seat to stand over Yuri next to Ibuki.

"Nope. I picked this guy out of the bunch, he's my problem to solve, Makoto."

"...Are you sure? I don't mind knocking some sense into this rude skinny asshole."

Ibuki smiled. "I know you don't, but you can watch how I do it."

Yuri quickly crawled to the door, as he reached for the knob he was yet again put into Ibuki's headlock.

Yuri's lights dimmed as Ibuki kept applying pressure. Dragging his body back into the middle of the classroom...

Some time later...

Yuri's eyes fluttered open to see...
11311211212121.title: Ibuki stops Yuri...

11311211212123.content:
Yuri looked down. A dark skinned foot with a blue pedicured toes pressed against the door. It was Elena who had somehow creeped up behind him silently to close the door.

"In my village it was rare, but there were servants just like this little boy." Elena towered over Yuri. Most of the time in the classroom she sat down... up close like this, Yuri couldn't help but feel like a "little boy" in comparison.

Elena turned around with her foot still on the door. "Ibuki, is he a servant?" Elena asked, seeking confirmation.

Ibuki took a while to think... and then remembered his outburst. "...Yeah, Elena. Sorry, I guess I'm not the best at this sort of thing..."

"She's lying, I'm not a freaking---"

"Quiet!" Elena raised her voice, quieting Yuri. "Go, sit." Elena pointed to his chair.

"But Ibuki's---"

"I said quiet. I'll allow you to speak after you sit down." Yuri slowly sat down as he was told.

Meanwhile, Ibuki and Makoto watched in awe. This was the first time they've seen this side of Elena.

Elena looked at Ibuki with a frown. "I'm sorry Ibuki, I know it's not my place to order your servant around but... this situation you were in... and his rudeness he has shown..."

"No no no... please, Elena. You're fine, please teach me, sensei."

Makoto took a seat, seeing things were handled. "Nice to see you ditch the smile, Elena."

"Don't be mean, Makoto. I hate doing this kind of thing... but it's the only way sometimes..." Yuri stayed silent, looking off to the side.

"Elena sensei, this servant has never... licked feet before. Makoto was in the process of getting there, starting with her massages." ...Some of this was true. Ibuki stopped Makoto from speaking out. She still was disgusted by the thought and honestly... it was very interesting to her too but it was always her idea to break this loser, his constant whining and reluctance was annoying, and Elena looked like she was more than happy to help her. Her friend gets pampered and she gets her "servant".

A win-win...
11311211212123.title: Elena stops Yuri...

113112112121231.content:
Elena grabbed a chair and pulled it in front of Yuri and sat down. She looked as if she was actually willing to listen to what he had to say. "Now, Yuri, you may talk."

"Elena... they're lying." Yuri gave a stink eye to Ibuki. The woman who put him here.

"Rude" Ibuki replied. "...and wrong. You still don't get it. I never lied to my friend. You are our servant. Elena's question wasn't 'Does this skinny ass loser think he's a servant' she asked if you were a servant."

"Does this boy know who you two are, guys?" Elena asked.

Ibuki and Makoto looked at each other. Ibuki said "You know we want to keep that on wrap, Elena."

"Why?"

"Elena... we... I just want a normal schoolgirl life."

"Everyone here knows I'm a princess. Everyone treats me with respect and like any other student." Ibuki didn't like how this got turned around on her.

"I don't know..."

"I never hid who I am. I am a proud fighter of Rindo-kan. I honor my fathers dojo and will crush anyone who dares disrespect the name." You could feel the energy from Makoto's words.

Ibuki shrugged. "...Fine. I'm a ninja. We good here? Why did this guy need to know Elena?"

"A ninja... yeah okay." Yuri thought.

"A servant must know who he or she is serving." Ibuki rolled her eyes. A servant should follow not question the master's career choice.

"If you're not a servant, Yuri, then why are you still here?" Elena continued her line of questions.

"Because... I... Can't... Leave!"

Elena's warm smile left. "I'm letting you have your say and you yell at me?"

She was... right. She wasn't like Ibuki or Makoto. "...Sorry, I'm just angry."

Her warm smile returned. "It's fine. What's stopping you from leaving?"

"The two behind you."

"He'll snitch on Ibuki and I the moment we release him."

"You don't know that Makoto." Elena calmly replied.

"Would you tell on them?" Elena asked Yuri.

"N-No!"

The three stared at Yuri.

Elena looked into his eyes. "Do you really want out, Yuri?"

"...Yes, I do."

"Right... Ibuki, Makoto, I think we need to have a talk of our own."
113112112121231.title: Elena's Influence...

1131121121212311.content:
"I'll talk with them later, Yuri... but there's something you should know before I do. I can sense the servant within you. The same aura that my servants back home had, there's no mistaking it."

"W-What?"

"You don't need to hide it, not around me, friend." Elena brightly smiled.

"Makoto, Ibuki, let's talk outside for a second please." The 3 girls went outside the classroom.

"Whatever you do did, you need to apologize and start fresh." Elena told the two.

"We already told you, Elena. We can't, he'll snitch as soon as he's gone." Ibuki said.

"Do you two trust me?"

"We trust you; we don't trust him." Makoto added.

Elena looked at them with a frown. "...Alright, fine. If Ibuki apologizes, then I will too. You're going down with us if this doesn't work out, you know."

"You're in charge, Elena. I'll apologize, again."

"Ibuki... A sincere apology." Ibuki nodded.

Elena opened the classroom door and Ibuki and Makoto followed.

"Yuri... They have something to say."

Ibuki went first. "I'm sorry for what happened, I obviously shouldn't have hurt you."

"...and I'm sorry for threatening you, I wasn't actually going to kill you or anything." Makoto said with her head down.

"O-Okay..." Yuri replied.

"Anything else girls?" Elena wanted more.

"Ummm... You don't have to hand over your homework anymore."

"...and you don't need to massage me back anymore either."

Elena smiled. "You can leave if you want, Yuri."

"I... can?" Yuri questioned what was going on. At this point he didn't have any reason to not trust Elena.

Elena still with her warm and welcoming smile on her face said. "The winds tell me you don't want to... but no one will stop you."
1131121121212311.title: Elena's Influence...  (Part 2)

11311211212123112.content:
"...I'll stay, I just didn't want to be treated like a prisoner." Ibuki and Makoto's eye's widened.

"Very understandable." Elena nodded.

"I also don't want to... l-lick your feet." Yuri looked to the ground... away from Elena's blue pedicured toes.

"That too, is understandable. Forgive me, I thought you were a long time servant and not new."

"I'm not a servant!"

Elena had a sad look on her face, her smile gone. "...Yuri."

"Sorry for raising my voice..." Ibuki stifled a giggled and Makoto had a slight smile.

"It's fine, but Yuri. I'm honest with you, can you be honest with me?"

"About what?"

"You don't hate Ibuki do you?"

"...I wouldn't say I 'hate' her."

"You didn't mind helping her out even after what she did."

Yuri took a deep breath and exhaled. "...No, not really."

"And you didn't mind massaging Makoto's back and feet as well, am I correct?" Yuri's silence was the answer.

Elena finally took, moved it in front of Yuri, and sat down. "Ibuki... Makoto, can you give us a second alone?"

"Ummm, sure thing. Let's go, Makoto." Ibuki left first and Makoto shut the door behind her. Ibuki wasn't worried at all, she read the mood and she was sure Makoto saw what she saw in his eyes.

The tall white-haired beauty brought her long legs to her chest, her feet on the edge of her chair. "Thank you for being honest, and now, I'll be honest. I think you have all the early signs of being a good servant. Maybe the tongue bath was too soon, but I don't think you'd hate it."

Elena lifting her left foot and placed it directly in front of Yuri, her toes lining up with his eyes. "They aren't too dirty, are they?"

Yuri looked into Elena's sole. So delicate, the contrast of her dark skin. She had beautiful feet no doubt. Servant or not, anybody would agree... but licking it...

"N-No."

"If they're no too bad th---"

"N-No!"

Elena put her foot back onto her chair. "Okay... I just thought I'd try it. Please, let's put this behind us then, friend."

"We'll leave for today, we'll see you tomorrow, it really was nice meeting you. There's so many interesting people in this school." Elena smiled and left while Yuri sat still.

Outside the classroom, Ibuki and Makoto smiled at Elena and she gave a knowing smile back.
11311211212123112.title: Elena's Influence... (Part 3)

113112112121231121.content:
The next day...

After the bell had rung, Yuri subconsciously walked towards Ibuki's club room hideout.

"...." Yuri waited... He didn't know if he should open the door or just go home. The girls made him feel... award, at times but... he didn't hate them, especially Elena. He waited outside the room for about 5 minutes before opening the door and entering with his head down.

"Hey, Yuri." Elena was the first to greet him. Yuri just gave a little wave. Ibuki and Makoto paid him no attention as he took a seat.

Yuri looked around, Makoto and Elena were talking about something and were barefoot. This would likely be a common sight, Ibuki was just relaxing, laying across the teacher's desk as usual, dangling her shoe while tapping on her cellphone.

After a while. "Yuri, may I borrow your notes... to uh... copy?" Ibuki asked nicely.

"...Um, sure." and handed her this week's homework papers.

Yuri continued to awkwardly sit alone whilst, Ibuki copied his notes.

Yuri's eyes continued to drift, he noticed Makoto acting fidgety. She brought her foot upon her lap and started to rub it, while she kept eye contact with Elena. A small part of him, felt for her. The macho man, side of him wanted to offer a foot massage... but this was Makoto. He didn't say anything but Makoto did.

"Umm, Yuri. I-If you d-don't mind, could you give me a foot massage before we leave?"

"Makoto!" Elena gasped.

"We've been through this, Yuri isn't comfortable."

"Yeah, yeah... alright." Makoto brought her other foot onto the chair and crossed them Indian style.

"I... I don't mind giving her a massage, just nothing... too much." Yuri spoke up.

Elena gave a caring smile. "Are you sure, Yuri?"

"I'm fine, Elena... thanks." Yuri smiled back. He couldn't help it; Elena's smile could kill any rainy mood.

Elena got up "I'll get out of your way then. Ibuki. let's talk about Japanese fashion."

"I'm learning, over here."

"I'm not sure what you're doing, would be 'learning'."

"H-Hey, I'm taking the information in... some of it will stick."

Yuri got up and sat in Elena's chair in front of Makoto. Makoto mumbled "Th-Thanks." and lifted her right foot onto Yuri's thigh.

Yuri began to knead her sole. He had forgotten how tough her feet were, somehow, soft and delicate, but you could tell she could use it to crush a brick... and probably has. Seems like a challenge that's right up her alley. Yuri took his time massaging.

"Process recovered." Ibuki told Elena.

"Of course, getting back to where you where is the easy part though, Ibuki."

"Yeah, I imagine. Foot massages are somewhat normal. Do you actually have a plan, Elena?"

"Of course, Ibuki. The plan is to let nature run its course." Elena gleefully smiled.

As the massage progressed in the background, Elena pulled out a magazine. "Now... About these skirts, do you where spats underneath?"
113112112121231121.title: Yuri's Limit.

1131121121212311211.content:
"When you're done, may you massage my legs next, Yuri." Elena directed her attention to Yuri.

"Uhh... sure, Elena."

Yuri switched Makoto's feet a while ago and was about done. He kneaded a little while longer before asking Makoto. "Am I done?"

Dry out of 'thank you's' Makoto nodded and removed her foot from his thigh.

Makoto stretched her legs out. "I got what I came for. I'll catch you guys tomorrow."

Ibuki waved. "See ya, Makoto."

Makoto got her socks and shoes and opened the classroom door to leave.

Elena sat in the empty seat in front of Yuri for her turn. "Again... Thank you, friend."

"It's not a problem, I was here doing nothing."

Elena lifted her left foot unto his lap. "I need to thank you because... not everyone is willing to do this sort of thing."

Yuri stared at Elena after her comment. "...Right."

Yuri started to rub her legs first. "Most boys would insult us for being active, they would say 'eww' or just 'no way'. I will never understand it. A little sweat and a slight smell and they lose there charm... and manners." Elena frowned a bit.

Yuri looked up at Elena again. "And I'm different from them?"

"...Of course, Yuri." Elena smiled.

"I don't like feet." Yuri said, offended.

"I'm not saying you are, Yuri... but no one here would care if you did." Yuri stopped rubbing.

"Please, don't be like that. If you don't like them... I get it, I don't think they're unattractive but... as long as you rub them..." Elena looked towards the ground beneath her.

"Don't try that, I never said you weren't attractive... it's just not a kink of mine." Yuri started to rub again, and Elena crossed her foot over her leg.

It was pretty much objective... Her feet were pretty. Yuri liked her legs... and everything else about Elena but he felt uncomfortable with Elena's assumptions.

Yuri finished her upper and lower thigh and moved into her foot. "Th-They're not too sweaty or smelly Elena... they kinda smell like cocoa butter."

"Yeah, it came Ibuki recommended. She said I'd like it, and I did!" Ibuki gave Elena a thumbs up whilst on her cellphone. She could hear from all the way over there?

Yuri continued until he was done, and Elena lifted her other foot until her toes were below his nostrils. He stared through her toes to see Elena with an expecting look on her face. He took her foot and began yet again with the scent of cocoa butter through his nose.
1131121121212311211.title: Elena requests a massage.

choices: Yuri goes home after they leave
11311211212123112111.content:
Yuri's hands worked their magic around Elena long foot. He took his time, if he were to do something it wouldn't be half-assed... even if it were a foot massage. Elena had a look of complete relaxation; he could tell she was enjoying the work he was putting in and it honestly did make him feel a little bit better. The tall white-haired beauty taking it easy, made it easier to do the task. About 5 minutes later...

"Thank you, Yuri. That really was wonderful."

"No problem, Elena." Yuri smiled.

"Ibuki, is there a reason you don't take advantage of our friends' generosity."

"Aren't you supposed to be the nice one here? You know I train wearing these shoes before coming here. My toes won't smell like cocoa."

"Quite weird of you to do, now that you mention it. Your ninja suit doesn't have shoes."

"That suits for business only. My school uniform is staying on during school days."

Elena giggled. "Your washing machine must hate you."

"A necessary evil, anyways Yuri might be kind enough to deal with Makoto's funk but not mine."

"He's a gentleman, Ibuki. A nice one." Elena smiled at Yuri.

"...Umm, if you're hurting after practice, Ibuki... it wouldn't kill me to give you a massage."

Ibuki sighed. "Are you sure about this, Yuri? ...I really am sorry for what happened between us before, I don't wanna pressure you or anything, I survived without a massage for years."

Yuri was now standing up, he nodded, and sat back down in his chair.

Ibuki took the seat in front of him just as Makoto and Elena had. Ibuki pulled her right shoe off and you could instantly smell her feet. Yuri hadn't seen Ibuki train but this smell... gave him a good idea of how hard and long she did. Next Ibuki slid her sock off, revealing her pale moist foot. Like Makoto's foot, there was no polish and it was quite muscular but not as much as Makoto's. It was more petite looking. All three women had attractive feet... mysterious considering how often they trained and went barefoot. Maybe not 'mysterious' exactly but it made Yuri wonder... how. Quickly regaining his attention has the smell. Ibuki wasn't kidding... but he meant what he said.

Ibuki frowned, grabbing her shoes and socks. "See... I told you. Thanks anyway, Yuri."

"Wh-Where are you going?" Yuri asked.

"Yuri... My feet are rank... and this room is going to be too."

"The room is fine, Ibuki." Elena smiled.

"I-I'm fine too, Ibuki." Yuri said still sitting.

"...Fine!" Ibuki sat back down.

"My... toes are what's hurtin, I see how you handle Makoto... please don't be too rough." With that, Yuri picked up Ibuki's left foot and pulled at her toes as he made his way down. As time went on, he noticed the smell less and less. It was tolerable. Yuri softly rubbed the sides of her arch and then paid more attention to her toes again and did the same to her right foot.

"That... felt amazing. Thank you, Yuri." Ibuki smiled.

"You're welcome... A-Anytime." Yuri instantly regretted that last part...

"Damn, Elena you're right. He is a gentleman." Yuri blushed a bit.

"Alright well. I'm out for today." Ibuki announced as she stood up with her shoes in hand.

Elena stood up too. "I'll join you; we can walk together."

Ibuki waved with a smile. "We'll see ya later, Yuri."

Yuri returned her smile with one of his own and waved back...
11311211212123112111.title: Ibuki's first massage.

113112112121231121111.content:
Yuri was alone, still sitting in the quiet classroom with just a bit of light coming in from the windows.

Yuri went to pick up his backpack and brought it across his back. He was about to leave until... "...Cherry blossoms?" Yuri sniffed his wrist.

"...and cocoa butter." The scents smelled amazing together. Expecting his palms to smell like feet, it was surprising. Yuri continued to sniff, always being a lover of the smell of cherry blossoms. The scent of cocoa butter was new to him, but it was pleasant as well. The sniffs turned into straight up smelling; Yuri's mind was somewhere else. He looked like a guy in a fabric softener advertisement. It would be a bit embarrassing but the next time they met he just had to ask her what lotion she used. Just as he was about finished...

Yuri heard footsteps. "Hey, Yuri... forgot my backpack full of stuff." Before she talked, Yuri awkwardly got himself together. It was Ibuki... if she saw, then there would be no mistaking what she would have seen...

"H-Hey..."

"Why're you still in here alone?" Ibuki asked.

"Ummm, I don't know... was just about to leave. Was... relaxing, I-I guess."

"You did look pretty relaxed..." Ibuki said flatly.

Yuri was slack jawed. She saw... "...It wasn't what you thought."

"...Okay."

"It was just... the smell of the lotion you were using."

"...Yeah?" Ibuki wasn't having it.

"Look, it isn't what you think it was. I told you, I don't like feet! How did you get in here without a sound anyway? Did you use a ninja technique or something?"

"A ninja technique? I didn't force you to sniff up my lotion, Yuri... Why are you mad at me? Sorry for forgetting my backpack, I can be forgetful... which is why I suck at homework." Ibuki frowned.

Yuri exhaled. "...I'm... sorry. You're right."

"I'm not the brightest in a class... but I'm also not the dumbest." Ibuki said with a straight face.

"...." Yuri knew what that meant. He knew she wouldn't believe him and he also knew she wasn't dumb enough to believe him but what else was he going to say to her?

Ibuki looked down on Yuri reading his thoughts, enjoying his mental freakout.

...Ibuki did use a 'ninja technique' a ninja technique called 'stealth'. She quietly opened up the door, lots of practice sneaking into classrooms a bit late, and made sure her feet made just enough noise for Yuri to hear upon entering. She trusted Elena's insight and was planning on quietly peeking on Yuri every day. She didn't expect it to be this soon. Elena's insight strikes again.

Ibuki grabbed her backpack but before leaving she placed her hand on his shoulder. "Hey Yuri..."
113112112121231121111.title: Yuri sniffs his palms...

1131121121212311211111.content:
Out of nowhere Ibuki put on her neckhold. The same neckhold she used when they had their first encounter.

"Ssshh." Ibuki cooed into his ear as she loosened up the hold.

"Sometimes we just need a little... push." Ibuki raised a school shoe a slowly lifted it to Yuri's nose, letting the bottom opening rest on his nose.

"I-Ibuki!" Yuri reached out behind him to try and grab at Ibuki.

"Smeeell." Yuri didn't really have any other choice but to.

The smell of cherry blossoms and sweat followed into his body, combining with Ibuki's right forearm around his neck quickly convinced his arms to stop flailing around.

Pleased, Ibuki rested her forearm even more. "It's not all that bad, right?"

Yuri continued to take in the ninja's scent.

"Ya see, the smell isn't as bad as you thought right. It's just a shooooe." She continued to whisper in Yuri's ear.

"A shoe with a cute girl's sock in it."

"I..."

Ibuki moved her shoe away from his face. "Yes?"

"I... never said your feet stunk."

"Yeah, I know... I'm not Makoto after all. That girl loves being barefoot so why can her feet stink up a whole classroom? But my feet do have a certain smell, tell me the smell, Yuri." Ibuki seductively ordered, Yuri.

"...Blossoms. Cherry Blossoms."

Ibuki giggled. "The lotion isn't cheap, my shoes better smell like flowers." Ibuki brought her shoe back to his nose.

"There's a sock in the toe, that can't smell all that great... but then again, you never whined about Makoto's feet maybe you got used to it... or maaaaybe." She was going in that direction yet again. This time Yuri, didn't care enough to argue with her.

At this point Ibuki completely let go of her neckhold. "If you like this then maybe you'd also enjoy tonguing Elena's soles."

"Do they taste as good as cherry blossoms smell?" Yuri tried to shut down Ibuki's attempt.

"Maybe they do to you." Ibuki tickled his ear as you whispered.

"...." Yuri tried to ignore her as he kept sniffing Ibuki's insole.

"You're going to come here tomorrow and I'm going to tell Elena you're willing to try it."

"She's going to be disappointed."

"Again... sometimes we just need a little push." Ibuki said removing her shoe. She removed her shoe and the sock within it and took a tiny sample whiff.

Ibuki squinted her nose. "Cherry blossoms, huh? Definitely not the only thing I'm picking up... I'll see you tomorrow, Yuri." She picked her backpack back up off of the ground and made her exit, while Yuri quickly realized the embarrassing moment they just had.

"Nononono!" Yuri internally screamed.
1131121121212311211111.title: Ibuki pushes.

11311211212123112111111.content:
Yesterday... He gave into Ibuki. He knew it, he hated it... He hated that he didn't mind being in that position.

"It was being in the arms of a... very cute girl. Her touching me... Alone." Yuri thought to himself as he walked to school.

When he arrived and went to his usual classes... it was a little harder to concentrate than usual. The smell of cherry blossoms still on his nose which triggered the very fresh memory of yesterday. These classes dragged on...

The last bell of the day rang as Yuri quickly got out of his seat and to the bathroom. Yuri splashed some cold water onto his face before exiting and slowly making his way to the clubroom. The door was unlocked but he was the first to arrive, Yuri's heart started pounding just a tad faster as he patiently waited for anyone else to join him.

After about three to five minutes the clubroom's doorknob turned. In came, Makoto. "Where are the other two?" She asked.

"Umm, they're not here yet." Yuri answered.

Looking a little annoyed. "I keep forgetting that you're supposed to be smart."

"...I don't know why they're late, Makoto."

Makoto began to take her shoes and socks off as Yuri's eyes looked on. "Whelp, I guess they aren't really needed, are they?" Makoto walked toward Yuri and onto a chair. She then placed a mat down in front of her.

Makoto crossed her right ankle on her left knee. "You know the deal... I even got you a soft little mat for your knees from another club. I don't think they'll miss it."

Yuri got down in front of her bared foot. No idea how her feet constantly smelled and he absolutely wasn't going to bring it up anytime soon... it still didn't bother him too much... It certainly didn't make him feel the same as Ibuki's feet. That means he didn't have a kink... right? Yuri thought to himself before taking hold of Makoto's foot. He started rubbing her sole as he has done so before and then... Yuri remember the intensity, what Ibuki did to him. He had to be certain, he had to try and emulate what happened yesterday. Whilst rubbing her foot, Yuri very quietly opened up his nostrils taking in the smell of Makoto's foot. The smell of pure sweat. Her feet smelled similar to what Yuri imagined an athlete would smell like after a game, before the shower. After minutes of rubbing her sweaty feet, Yuri convincingly got his answer... He didn't like feet. It was the lotion after all...

Shortly after he finished the massage, Ibuki and Elena walked in. "Sorry, we're late."

Makoto got up out of her chair. "Well, seems like you have someone else to look after you. I think I'll go home a bit early today."

Ibuki gasped. "We just got here, and you want to leave?"

"...I'll see you tomorrow, Ibuki. I guess... I'll give you a call later or something." Ibuki smiled. She loved seeing the cute side of her ruff rounded friend.

Makoto made her way to the door, ready to leave but stopped. "Oh, and by the way our new friend was sniffing my feet the entire time he rubbed them... Later girls."

Yuri's mouth could have hit the floor and Elena giggled. His chances of convincing these two that he didn't have a kink closed with the door.

"You don't like feet huh, Yuri?" Ibuki smiled.

Yuri was still kneeling on the mat; Makoto had given him. How could he be so stupid?

"I... just... had to know." Yuri muttered.

"Makoto has the rankest feet in the school. I couldn't believe you'd rub her feet let alone go in for a whiff..." Ibuki said with her arms crossed.

"Go ahead talk your way out of this one, please." Ibuki asked gleefully.

Yuri couldn't stand to look at Elena or Ibuki, once again he choose to look towards the ground. "I had to know..."

"What they smelled like? Know, what?" Ibuki interrupted him and laughed out loud.

"Tell me, Yuri... Did they not... smell like cherry blossoms?" Ibuki teased and continued to laugh.

"Enough please. Look at him, this isn't what we wanted." Elena finally stepped in.

"Makoto is a dear friend but our commonsense tells us that if he still isn't convinced of who he is then nothing will convince him... because her feet are indeed very smelly." The last line caused Yuri to further blush with his head in his palms.

"Yuri, look at me." Elena asked softly.

But he couldn't...

Elena got into the chair in front of Yuri and begun to remove her socks and shoes, airing out her long, smooth, looking feet. "They're yours for today. Do whatever you want." Yuri finally looked up to see both her legs crossed and a perfect smile across her lips.

Elena rubbed her legs together. "I think you might prefer cocoa butter over aged cheese, Yuri."
11311211212123112111111.title: Ibuki's impact?

113112112121231121111111.content:
Yuri slowly wrapped his hands around Elena's long foot and began to rub. Both Elena and Ibuki stayed quiet and just watched on while he did his thing. Yuri paid close attention to her beautiful brown soles for the majority of the massage and every time Elena would wiggle her toes a bit he would notice. The warm feeling he had with Ibuki the day before came back...

"Yuri..." Elena called out but Yuri didn't hear her.

"Yuri." Elena called out a bit louder the second time.

"Ummm... Yeah?"

"I don't know if you like my feet or not but... look down." Elena's toes pointed downwards.

...There was an obvious tent. In front of these two girls, the shame hit him like a truck.

Yuri quickly got up and was going to run away... but Elena grabbed his wrist before he could dart to the door.

"We aren't here to embarrass you, Yuri. Do you still not trust me?"

"I do--- I don't know!"

"My friend might be giggling but that's because like you... she's also confused. You have two beautiful schoolmates with you and you have an erection. You want to run away? Why, Yuri?"

"Sit down, Yuri. C'mon." Ibuki said.

Defeated, Yuri sat back down.

"Maybe it isn't feet, Yuri." Elena said.

Ibuki continued. "Maybe you like the two cuties in front of you."

Elena added. "Serving us, maybe."

Ibuki leaned over Elena's shoulder. "The teasing."

Elena extended her foot in front of Yuri's face and gave him a cute and innocent smile that he could barely see. "Just give it a try. If you don't like it, we'll stop."

Yuri stared into the sole of Elena's foot for a couple of seconds... In a rush of lust, Yuri started lapping at her foot sloppily.

"About time." Ibuki exhaled.

Elena signaled to Ibuki. "Shh, quiet friend."

Yuri still focused on the sole of her foot. Elena wiggled her toes, Yuri noticed and blushed. Elena brought up her other foot and Yuri's tongue gave it attention too.

Yuri's tongue made its way all over both of Elena's tan soles but avoided her toes. Elena wouldn't dare complain, there was always later. After 10 minutes of service Elena dropped her feet to the ground.

Ibuki ruffled Yuri's hair. "Not so disgusting, huh?"

Yuri didn't reply. "The shyness will go away soon, Yuri. You were clearly indulging yourself." Ibuki told him.

"Thank you, Yuri." Elena smiled.

"...You're welcome, Elena." Yuri uttered under his breath.

"Can you tell me? Did you like it, Yuri? My feet?" Elena asked whilst putting on her socks.

"...Did you like it?" Yuri answered with a question.

Elena gave him a genuine smile. He had some puppy dog eyes. "I loved it, Yuri."

He blushed. "Then... it was fine, I guess."

"It takes a big man to admit that, Yuri. We'll see you tomorrow." Elena slipped her shoes on and met Ibuki at the door to the clubroom.

Ibuki opened the door and Elena followed her out. "Thanks for the help, Elena."

"No need to mention it, I feel energized after a foot bath. He'll only get better over time." Elena said.

"Our very own, foot boy. I can't believe it..."

Tomorrow was gonna be a blast, she couldn't wait to see Makoto's reaction.
113112112121231121111111.title: Ibuki's impact and a cute smile.

1131121121212311211111111.content:
Ibuki grabbed a hold onto Makoto's hand and just started walking. "Wha--- What the heck are you doing Ibuki?"

Ibuki kept dragging her along. "No time, no tiiiime. Just c'mon, I gotta show you something cool."

"St--- Stop trying to drag me! I'm going! What's the rush!?" Ibuki smiled. Her phone was ready to capture her friends reaction.

"That stupid grin, again. You're up to no good." Makoto began to walk along side Ibuki.

"Hahahaa... nah." Was Ibuki's response.

They kept walking until they got to their clubroom. "Hey... Makoto, before I open this door. Elena asked me to not freak out... kay?"

Makoto just stared at her friend, deadpan. Ibuki replied. "...kay."

She opened the door and Makoto instantly had a look of disgust... with a lack of surprise. Makoto mumbled, "...Loser."

Yuri didn't react, he wasn't listening... He was licking up the soles of Elena's feet. Elena waved towards her friends.

"Does this mean, I can stop being nice to him?" Makoto asked Ibuki.

"Don't ruin it for the rest of us, Makoto. You aren't going to tell him anything he doesn't already know. You still get your feet rubbed by the only kid in the school that... can." Ibuki referring to Makoto's feet.

Makoto walked towards Elena and Yuri. "Having fun?"

Yuri just realized, Makoto had joined them and his face flushed red. "Yes!" Elena answered with glee.

"I... wasn't asking you!" Elena's face made, Makoto blush. Her face was unlike the one she had during their spars. Both expressed enjoyment but still very much different.

"So, Elena and Ibuki was right about you the entire time, huh? This entire time---"

Yuri cut Makoto off, still holding Elena foot in his hands. "Makoto before you continue... yeah. I know. I know what you want to tell me. I could say... I'm sorry but... I don't know if I am. I don't know what is... happening but still... I know. I don't blame you for thinking less of me. I would in your position."

Makoto stared blankly at Yuri. His honesty confusing the young fighter a bit. She then crossed in arms in an act of defiance. "Pfft, whatever... As long as you get that liking a girls smelly feet is weird."

"...Makoto. I... don't like the smell of your feet." Yuri confessed.

"Excuse me?" Makoto asked, even more confused.

"Yuri will sniff up our feet. Your feet reek girl, I offered you some scented oils and lotions. A trip to the mall but, yooou ignooored meeee." Ibuki added.

"Did I ask you, Ibuki?" Makoto was legit angry... but even she didn't know why.

"Makoto... I don't mind the smell of your feet, but I don't like the smell. Take off your shoes and socks and I'll rub your feet like always after I'm... done with Elena." Elena gave him a smile but Makoto, still peeved, did not.

"You like her feet but not mine?" Makoto asked.

Yuri attempted to calm down Makoto. "I..."

"The smell of pretty flowers, girly stuff but not what a girl actually smells like?"

"Why... Why are you this a-angry?" Yuri stuttered.

Again... she didn't know either. Again... she was confused. "...Hurry up and keep licking the girls feet... I want my massage."

Ibuki knew when she was like this it would be unwise to laugh... and she really wanted to. Makoto was a hard as steel tomboy but some times she was just... so unbelievably cute... in Ibuki's eyes anyways, Yuri looked like a scolded puppy.
1131121121212311211111111.title: A new day, a new life...

1141.content:
Ryu’s life was dedicated to the art of fighting, it was his entire. He lived for the challenge; he loved the challenge. Though not one to ever underestimate any challenger that came his way... he never would’ve thought he would find himself in a situation like this one. Ryu was hunched over on one knee trying to catch his breath... this challenger he has never met before until now was good... very good.

As Ryu was trying to regain the strength in his legs he quickly looked up toward the sky to see an incoming dive kick... but not just any dive kick, her foot encompassed with what looked to be some kind of purple energy.

Craaack Quickly scurrying out of harm's way, Ryu evaded the attack which easily destroyed the street pavement beneath her.

“Hahahaa!” The woman came out of the shadows and into the streetlights laughing loudly.

Her hair was up in a way that made both of her bangs look like black horns. She was wearing baggy, white colored pants and purple tights, with long, fingerless gloves complete with a dudou that formed a spider like look. Fingers and toes look to have a fresh coat of pink paint... she didn’t look like a traditional fighter but judging from her kicks, attire, and the way she moved, Ryu guessed she had to be some form of a student of Taekwondo.

“Come on... You're not done already, are you? Aren't you supposed to be... powerful? You are Ryu, right?” Juri asked, looking at the exhausted Ryu. Ryu was still struggling to stand; he was hurt and the threat in front of him knew it as well as he did.

“Who... are you?” Ryu asked.

The woman walked over closer to Ryu and slowly raised her leg high above her head. An evil smile appeared on her face.

“Me? Name’s Juri.” Just as she gave her name, a lightening quick kick struck Ryu right in the middle of his skull. The second time within the short span of 10 minutes Ryu was in complete shock. He knew her strike was coming... but he still couldn’t block it. Has he unknowingly grown weaker or was this woman just too...

“Damn was this disappointing, I’ve heard so much about you. Man... If only you were as half as powerful...”

Juri sniffed the air “as that scent you got going on.”

Ryu grunted and attempted to shake out the stars in his head.

“But believe me... for wasting my time, you will make up for it...”

As Ryu tried to gather himself again, stumbling onto both feet “...Until I break you.”

Whap

Ryu’s lights were out as Juri hit him with a roundhouse kick to the gut. Ryu’s unconscious body fell, laid out in front of Juri’s feet.

Ryu was face down struggling hard just to breath. He knew he had to get out of this alley as soon as possible, make for a strategic retreat. Though it hurt his pride to admit it, the condition he was in right now... there was no way he could keep up with this woman’s pace.

“Hey now... where are you crawling to?” Juri slowly made her way to the downed fighter.

Stomp

“You’re my victim. I’m considering taking that glove off of your hand and continuing because your screams soothe my soul. Seeing you limp out of this dirty ass street with a crushed hand... Try convincing me otherwise warrior.” Her cold threat sending shivers down Ryu’s bruised back.

“If you don’t entertain me another way then we can always go back to plan 1. I’m not going to wait long... entertain me.” Ryu confused, looked back up into Juri’s eyes.

As they looked into each other’s eyes, Juri looked down towards Ryu’s hand. Ryu understanding Juri’s suggestion looked down toward his trapped hand, Juri tapped her toes playfully on top on his glove.

Ryu looked up at Juri as she quickly confirmed what he had feared... “Pucker up loser.”

Ryu turned his head right only to see Juri's barefeet lifting off of the cold steel ground, leaving very slight but visible sweatprints beneath them before looking back with her usual smirk and hitting the light switch, closing the sliding door leaving him alone in the dark... with her shoe and her scent.
11412111221.title: Juri lowers her shoe...

114121112211.content:
Ryu was alone... he had time to think... but didn't. He just took in the stink of his captors insole. Ryu attempted thinking about what he did wrong. Was it one thing he did wrong? Two things? Three? Four? But everytime he would think about this all he could remember was the outcome... kissing a mysterious woman's feet in some street. Meanwhile as the memory haunted him he was inhaling her smell. A constant reminder... he couldn't forget even for a second... she wouldn't let him. Ryu closed his eye's.



3 hours later...

The sound of a mechanical door could be heard opening, letting in the outside light "You still in here?"

"Still enjoying the smell of my hard work?" Juri continued to taunt, flicking a light switch on.

Juri sliced the duct tape off of Ryu removing her shoe "Are you ready to play ball yet?"

His lungs on fire, his head on fire. Ryu utettered the word... "Y-Yes."

"Y-Y-Yes?" Juri taunted.

"Yes, please stop this..."

"You'll play nicely? I don't need to break you some more?"

"No... I'll play nicely."

"Hahahaa! My feet are quite the deadly weapon I'm sure you'd agree." Ryu groaned, agreeing.

"Look into my eyes, Ryu." and he did.

Juri studied, looking into his heart. "Hmmmmm."



Is Ryu broken in enough for Juri?
114121112211.title: Ryu gives him to the smell...

114121112212.content:
Ryu was alone... he had time to think... but didn't. He just took in the stink of his captors insole. Ryu attempted thinking about what he did wrong. Was it one thing he did wrong? Two things? Three? Four? But everytime he would think about this all he could remember was the outcome... kissing a mysterious woman's feet in some street. Meanwhile as the memory haunted him he was inhaling her smell. A constant reminder... he couldn't forget even for a second... she wouldn't let him. Ryu closed his eye's.



3 hours later...

The sound of a mechanical door could be heard opening, letting in the outside light "You still in here?"

"Still enjoying the smell of my hard work?" Juri continued to taunt, flicking a light switch on.

Juri sliced the duct tape off of Ryu removing her shoe "Are you ready to play ball yet?"

"....I will never... never... give up those how have trusted me." Ryu answered.

Juri lifted Ryu's face forcing him to look directly into her eyes "Are you a masochist? Do you plan dying here with a damn shoe on your face? You're not going anywhere. You are going to tell me what I want... You are my toy. The last 3 hours of your ass taking in my foot's perfume, I coulda been kicking a friends ass... hoping they weren't as disappointing as you were. So... now you're getting my full attention."

Juri hopped onto the reclined back chair yet again, not caring what she stepped on. "It seems like you want to play..."

Stomp

Juri left foot came down hard onto Ryu's stomach "...So let's play."
114121112212.title: Ryu doesn't give in...

1141211122121.content:
"Even if you are a freaky masochist..." Juri slowly raised her still right foot, still bare, which naturally picked up dirt from the ground over the 3 hours she left Ryu alone in this room.

"...I can promise you, this is gonna hurt."

Stomp

The very first strike, instantly reminded Ryu of his first encounter with this demon of a woman. The beat-down he gotten. Interrupting this painful memory came...

Stomp

Stomp

Stomp
