Three consecutive painful stomps. His head, stuck in place, was secured to take the full force of every blow. Juri then taunted by messing with Ryu's hair with her right foot. When she was done she lowered her foot beside his head, Ryu's head in-between both of her deadly feet while Juri looked down analyzing him.


Stomp

Stomp

Stomp

...Again, Juri analyzed, watching, waiting for the moment she knew would come. Ryu's face started to show pain, swelling began to occur. Wearing down his will, slowly but certainly...

"I'll try and avoid you nose... don't wanna break it. Might have some use for it afterwards Hahaa!"

Stomp

Stomp

Stomp

"You really like getting kicked, don't you?"

Stomp "Break..."

Stomp "Break..."

Stomp "Break!"

Juri placed stomps onto his arms, legs, midsection, but mostly his face. She continuously stomped everywhere she could but the nose.

"I can feel your body giving up, boy. They'll be no passing out, just you, me, and my feet." Ryu knew he was stubborn. He knew there was no escaping this...

Juri jumped into the air. Ryu looked at both of her soles as they came down onto him and stayed there. Juri maintaining balance on the head of Ryu for a few seconds before very painfully stretching Ryu's face on there way down next to his head.

"You stupid sonuva!" Stomp

"Making me sweat!" Stomp

"Break!" Stomp

"Break" Stomp

"BREAK!" Stomp
1141211122121.title: Juri tramples Ryu's will... and his face

11412111221211.content:
After about 15 minutes...

"...Okay." Ryu uttered.

"...Okay?" Juri questioned.

"Okay."

"Hmm, Okay?" Stomp Stomp Stomp

"Please! Stop... you win. I'll tell you what you want." Ryu pleaded

Juri raised her right foot preparing another strike and brought it down... right before it's contact, Ryu flinched. Juri placed her foot on his face, bending over relaxing.

"About damn time, my freaking feet were starting hurt." Juri thought to herself. Seeing Ryu's flinch helped out.

"It was only a matter of time. Only a matter of time you broke until I tracked down your buddies and only a matter of time until you gave in to hours of my torture. If it makes you feel better, I would of found them and got them where I wanted and you lasted longer than a lot of others in your position have." This didn't make Ryu feel better. What he was about to do, is irremediable. It didn't matter the circumstances.

"...But before you give me all the intel I need, I need you to show me you're willing to work with me without violence being involved. Can't go crushing your face for every new detail can I? I mean I can... but I'm willing to give you a 2nd chance to corporate with me." Ryu didn't like where this was going... has he not suffered enough?

Juri flopped on Ryu's midsection, making herself comfortable. His midsection still weak from Juri's constant abuse, her simple flop caused shocks down to his abs down to his toes.

Juri teased Ryu's chin with her purple toes "Now comes the really fun part..."
11412111221211.title: A broken Ryu...

114121112212111.content:
Juri placed her right foot onto Ryu's face and let her left foot dangle to the side.

"Stick out you tongue." Ryu kept his mouth closed, knowing what was coming. Whether he liked it or not, he was getting to know this sadistic woman.

"...Are we really doing this again. I need to stomp your face in more, really?" Juri rolled her eyes.

She was right. What was the point? His friends weren't coming...

Ryu hesitaly dragged out his tounge.

"Make it flat" Juri further demanded.. and he did as ordered.

"Stings, doesn't it?" Juri questioned.

"That ego of yours... being deleted. This will all be sooo much easier if you just... accept it. You're mine, Ryu." Ryu still with his tongue out, knowing how ridiculous he looked.

"Here's what's going to happen next my little boytoy... because of you my feet are dirty. You being a naughty stubborn boy convinced me that you should keep my shoes for a while, which caused me to walk barefoot in this weirdly dirty ass lab. I'm all about appearances so that brings me back to you..." Ryu knew what was coming. Ryu has learned this lady loves to hear herself talk.

"Seeing how it was your fault... clean my feet. Make them presentable before I put them back inside those shoes I was kind enough to lend to you... get started" Ryu tried leaning upwards at an angle, slowly pressing his tongue against her sole. Immediately he withdrew his tongue in reaction.

"You've run down my patience, get that tongue moving or else." Juri threatened Ryu. Knowing she would Ryu tried to get back at it slowly dragging his tongue across the middle of her foot.

"Hurry the Hell up!"

Ryu dragged his tongue against the sole of her foot even faster, putting his ego aside.

"Don't forget the heel dumbass... you still have another foot to go. If you're not done within 15 minutes then I'm going to leave again... but not before stomping the shit out of you." Again Ryu picked up the pace...

The taste of dirt in general ran throughout Ryu's mouth but of course it was so much of the taste that hurt... it was the act. How low he has fallen in such a short time...

About 10 minutes of footlicking Juri inspected his work "Hmmm decent enough, I wouldn't expect anything more from someone as pathetic as you."

"Open up wide." Ryu was quicker to follow this time around.

"You're going to do my toes next, you have about 5 minutes left."

Juri stuffed her left toes into the open mouth of Ryu "Start sucking."

All the dirt and sweat here made it seem like licking the rest of her foot seem easy. Ryu sucked as ordered, for the next 5 minutes he made sure to cover every toe. The embarrassment was crippling but why would he put himself doing it again?

With a popping sound Juri removed her toes from Ryu's mouth "Not bad for a first timer. Not bad at all, I was going to stomp your lights out anyway but you've convinced me otherwise."

With that Juri stood up "You see how easy that was?"

"...." A silent defeated Ryu had nothing.

"It was easy right?" Juri asked again expecting an answer.

"Yes, Juri." Ryu droned.

"You're done with all that macho facade shit now right?"

"Yes, Juri."

"Good, gooood." At this moment Juri knew...

Juri smiled down towards Ryu "Hey Ryu... kiss my feet."

Ryu placed a soft kiss on both shiny, slick, wet soles...

Juri's eye lit up as she returned her feet into her heels "Peeerfect."
114121112212111.title: Juri demands something more...

1141211122121111.content:
"Alright my boytoy, I'm gonna take off these straps. I shouldn't need to tell you this but this lab is on an island and you have no friends for backup and no idea where you are right now... and even if you did I'd kick the shit outta you again and tighten up those straps much tighter than before... and permanently injure some part of your body and you know the whole deal." Ryu was well aware. This woman had this all planned out. These weren't threats, they were promises.

Ryu was happy to finally flex his wrists and ankles. They were of course very numb due to the hours of being restricted. Juri grabbed a computer chair that was already in the large room to sit down, rolling her way over to Ryu.

"Hmmm... What the Hell are you expecting of me? What could I possibly tell you, that you don't already know?" Ryu asked whilst rubbing his wrists.

"I'm going to use you as bait and you can sit on the sidelines hoping your friends put up a better fight than you did. We're going to get into contact with each of your buddies one after other, step by step. You're not the only one who loves challenges, difference is I don't fight above my skill level... because there is no one above my skill level. You and your friends are weak, I treat every fight as if it's my last. That warrior good guy spirit bull that you all keep is why you'll never beat someone like me."

"...I admit, you took my by surprise. It was my loss... it was a moment of weakness and you took advantage... But do you really think you're going to handle my friends as easily as you did me?"

"Yep." Juri very confidently replied.

"You won't."

"I hope so. You were so weak. So... super disappointing." Juri said not even looking at Ryu.

Juri grabbed her tablet filled with information and placed a closed fist under her chin "Anyways... Who are you setting me up with a date first, buddy?"
1141211122121111.title: On to Ryu's friends...

11412111221211112.content:
"A-America..." Ryu mumbled.

"Who's in America?"

"A warrior named... Chun Li."

"So.. you pairing me up with someone you couldn't bang or something? Anyways... she better she strong, I better not be flying and wasting my time for no reason..."

"Don't worry... she's strong." Ryu hoped Chun Li would succeed where he had failed.

"Guess I can't leave you here alone. You'd get yourself killed by that blue bastard or something. You can carry my bags. We can talk about our plan to meet this chick on the plane but before that..." Juri got up and went outside the room. She quickly returned with new cuffs.

Juri grabbed Ryu's hands and secured the cuffs and did the same to his ankles. "I like to keep you locked up."

"Stay here for a while, while I dress up." Ryu stayed silent as Juri left the room again. A couple minutes later she returned looking like she did when Ryu first laid eye's on her...

"Follow me, bitch." Ryu did as told...
11412111221211112.title: Ryu gives up Chun Li...

114121112212111121.content:
Ryu felt low... Really low. On the ride across the sea Ryu told Juri all he knew about Chun Li. What she often looked like, where she would most likely be, and some of her techniques. Ryu kept the minimal amount of information from this woman giving Chun Li leeway in the fight Juri, no doubt would start later... Juri never meeting her, would know no better.

Juri described the plan to Ryu. "I'll put out a little word of disaster for this noisy girl scout. We'll make sure she cares... we'll make sure she comes to the rescue."

Juri took her cellphone out to make her plans a reality. Ryu was confused on the amount of power she had but if it was enough to pull this plan off then she was smarter than he thought...

5 hours later...

"Disperse! Disperse! Get out of here!" It was the Interpol agent herself Chun Li, waving her hands in a panic towards young adults.

Chun Li was wearing her traditional outfit. Being in the area, she was alerted to a Drive in crowded with people and large cars. It was loud but she was louder. She continued to yell but the people just continued to party and drink the night away.

"Heeeeey!" Chun Li screamed, finally getting some of their attention.

Chun Li raised her badge. "You're all in serious danger here! Leave right away!"

"I think we should stay!" A voice came from the back.

A woman came forward... I way Juri. Chun Li knew right away she was different from these rowdy kids; she could sense her off aura. She could also see she was dressed differently from the crowd. Chun Li was prepared...

"Hey! You're all about the see something kickass and special, make sure you get your refills now..." Juri smiled and tossed her empty cup behind her shoulder.

Chun Li slid her badge back into her pocket "Do you have something to do with---"

"Those alerts beeping on your phone? Nope." Juri tapped her foot on the ground.

"...Right. I think I'm going to take you in." Chun Li got into fighting stance.

"I hope you have a pair of handcuffs on you Ms. officer." Juri also got into a fighting stance and licked her lips.

"I'll give you one fin---" Juri quickly kicked at Chun Li's head slicing the air but missing the intended target.

Ryu made sure to stay hidden behind the crowd watching fight, silently cheering for his friend with a hip-hop inspired baseball cap on...
114121112212111121.title: Juri & Ryu, in America...

choices: Juri's offense breaks through Chun Li's defense.
1141211122121111211.content:
"...Fine, I gave you a chance!" Chun Li threw a punch at Juri. Juri crouched, avoiding it.

"Hahaa! That's it... enough talking." Juri slid up back into position before walking menacingly toward Chun Li."

Chun Li traded her fists with Juri's feet. Juri was having a blast, while Chun Li was progressively getting more annoyed.

"Don't you dare disappoint!---" Chun Li cut off Juri's taunt with a roundhouse kick directly to Juri's lower Abdomen.

"Were you saying something?" Chun Li said stone faced.

"Kah!" Juri spit out some blood onto the ground.

"Yeah... this is the stuff." Juri smiled, holding her stomach.

"Enough talking." Chun Li, said holding her fighting position.

"Heh heh, I like you." Juri quickly ran toward Chun, sweeped at her feet prompting her to hop into the air and at that moment Juri twisted her body putting everything into a flying roundhouse kick...
1141211122121111211.title: Juri Vs. Chun Li

11412111221211112112.content:
While in the air Chun Li raised both her hands in attempt to block the powerful kick and she did... to a point.

It hurt... a lot and sent her body flying into the crowd from the force.

The gathered hoodlums grabbed hold onto the fallen Chun Li.

Juri walked toward Chun. "Let her go losers... she's not done yet."

They let Chun drop to the ground with a thud.

"Dammit!" There was no time to recover, Juri was already standing over her, looking down.

"...You aren't finished after a single hit right?" Chun Li still kneeling, Juri softly pushed the right side of her face with her foot, taunting her to get back up.

Chun Li swiped her foot off of her cheek and stood back up.

"Ahh, there we go. Let's start round 2. Hey everybody if Ms. Officer beats me, I'll cover everyone's tab over at that trashy diner." The crowd erupted in cheers, while Chun Li gritted her teeth.

While Juri was distracted by her new fans...

Crunch

Chun Li delivered a knee striking, again, Juri's lower abs.

Juri was now on her knee's and Chun now knew better to let up as she followed up with a right hook. Juri was face first unto the ground...

"Hahaha!" Chun Li's eyes widened.

"You're already proving more interesting than my last victim. You have an edge, lady." Juri slowly got up, her jaw leaking blood.

Juri spit unto the ground again. "You're gonna need to hit harder than that, girl... Give me your all. Don't you dare hold back."

Chun Li was disturbed... and a little impressed. Chun ran over to the now bloodied Juri and stopped when she believed the distance favored her.

Keeping up the momentum, Chun went out to drain Juri. She was rocked after her hook.

"Gah!" Chun Li uses her lighting kicks, forcing Juri to block... Now!

At this point Juri's arms must feel like Hell. "Spinning bird kick!"

Juri wasn't blocking this technique, not after that... and she didn't block.

Juri's straight kicked Chun's ankle stopping her mid motion. Chun Li was now in a split like formation...

"...How did you know?" Chun Li had to know. The speed... the power behind her devastating technique put to a halt in such a fashion.

"I do my research... You mighta had me if I was as clueless as you though." Juri gave Chun Li a backhanded compliment.

"You know my techniques?" Chun Li asked.

"I studied for this test a little while ago. I think I've earned a passing grade." Juri smiled wiping the rest of the blood off of her lips.

"...How?"

"Oh... I'll reveal my secrets... later." Juri laid looking down at the confused and defenseless Chun Li.

"As for now, I'm going to need to disappoint these people by taking away their free meals."

"Wai--"

Stomp

Juri laid out Chun Li, still split legged, out. Half the crowd still hype, while the other half groaning over not getting free snacks.

Juri picked up the unconscious Chun Li and picked her up over her shoulders. "Now where's dragon boy?"

Ryu kept his head down... he knew because of the boo's what likely had occurred. The crowd he was hiding slowly shrunk, until it was just him alone.

Juri made her way over to Ryu. "Let's catch up Ms. Officer here on the details eh? Follow me. We're flying away from this dump."

Ryu followed Juri... still with his head lowered in shame.
11412111221211112112.title: Juri Vs. Chun Li Part 2 (Offense)

choices: Juri continues to have her way with Chun Li... (Foot play)
Juri continues to have her way with Chun Li... (Something else)
114121112212111121121.content:
Chun Li's eyes fluttered...

She had a pounding headache but was slowly coming to...

When she had finally opened her eyes the first thing she seen was...

"Ryu?" Chun Li softly called out.

Ryu didn't turn his head.

"Ryu!" Chun Li now yelling.

"Quiet down officer before I call a noise complaint." With that voice Chun Li was aware of the type of situation she was in.

Juri was lounging on the jet's seats. "Juri!"

Juri peeked her head over her dangling foot. "...What?"

"Where... Where are yoiu taking me!?"

"...You'll find out soon. Patience."

"Untie me now!"

"Why the Hell would I do that?"

"People will know I'm missing. You're in over your head." Chun Li warned.

"Sure, they'll know you're missing... but they won't know where to look."

Juri was right. Chun Li herself, didn't know where she was...

"...What did you do to Ryu?"

"Beat him in battle... took away his pride as a warrior." Juri said bluntly.

"Ryu... you're just letting all this happen?"

"..." Ryu still was quiet.

"He can't talk without my permission. It's kinda a new rule I made up about 30 minutes ago while you where taking a snooze."

"...That's not the Ryu I know."

"I killed the Ryu you knew."

Juri wiggled her toes. "Stomped that Ryu out with these.... and loved it."

Chun Li looked away from Juri's feet "...What are you going to do with me?"

Juri bounced her left heel off of her right toes. "Good question, I haven't decided..."
114121112212111121121.title: On the Jet...

1141211122121111211213.content:
"Want something to drink, officer?"

"...What?"

"Water, green tea, beer?" Juri got up out of her seat and walked over to a cupboard which hid a couple bottles of water among other drinks for her rides.

Chun Li stared at Juri "I won't spit in it or anything, promise."

Juri grabbed herself a beer and a water bottle.

"Here!" Juri tossed the bottle of water onto Chun's lap.

"...And how to you suppose I'm going to drink that?"

"Well... I can either sit on your lap and pour it in your mouth or... I can untie you."

"Hmmph... untie me?" Chun Li was trying to figure out Juri's endgame.

"Sure, why not. This jet has a badass autopilot and I can assure you... you wouldn't be able to figure out what it takes to turn it off, we're trapped up in the sky, and you wouldn't want to hit me."

"Why wouldn't I want to hit you?" Chun Li questioned.

"You seem a tad smarter than dragon boy over there."

"...Right."

"I trust you wouldn't do something you'd regret and you can trust I didn't pill this water."

"We have a nice little understanding, Ms. Officer."

"...Sure."

Juri stood in front of Chun with a sharp knife and cut the plastic tying Chun Li's arms and legs together.

"Drink up." Juri walked back to her seat kicking her feet back onto the armrest.

Chun Li kept her eyes on Juri whilst she opened the water bottle. "What's your game, Juri?"

"Fight around the world." Juri sipped on her beer.

"Why am I here then?"

"Nothing you need to worry about... yet. You lost fair and square just like your boy Ryu. I get the rewards, my reward being you."

"I'm not going to be your toy."

Juri giggled. "Yeah, okay Ms. Officer lady."

"When we hit the ground, I got something special for you. A conversation, I think you'll enjoy having. Until then, sit back and relax." Chun Li took a drink of her water...
1141211122121111211213.title: A peaceful ride to SIN Labs.

11412111221211112112131.content:
"Dragon boy, you know where to go!" Juri yelled as they got off the jet.

Chun Li looked in confusion at what was in front of her. A huge weird looking dome. She had no idea where this woman had taken her.

"We're here." Juri gestured to the giant doors. Chun Li was curious, now she had to know what it looked like inside. It was dark, it was...

"You're with SIN!?" Chun Li entered her fight stance.

"Calm down, Ms. Officer. I said we are having a conversation. Follow me." Juri walked and Chun Li followed. Chun followed until Juri opened a door to what looked like a science lab... evil science lab. Ryu was sitting quietly by himself at a table, a rectangular metallic table with two long benches for seats.

"What do you want with me!" Chun Li asked as Juri took a seat by Ryu at the table.

"Hey, Ryu, beat it while me and your former friend talk it out." Ryu robotically got up a walked out.

Chun Li couldn't help but pity the sight... even after he betrayed her. "What did you do to him?"

Juri dangled her foot. "Stepped on his pride. Helped him realize all he was good for was losing to me."

"You mean, just like me?"

"Come on now. Don't be stupid. You're not like him and you know it. I could tell with my first glance that you had it."

"It?"

"The same bug that I got. The same urge."

Chun Li shook her head. "No... No! I'm nothing like you. I would never work for SIN; I am an Interpol officer!" Chun Li got up out of her seat.

Juri also got up from her seat to stand behind the angry Chun Li. "I'm not particularly with SIN... This is just a place with a bed and a man to entertain. I've read your files... the one's Ryu gave me. I know who you are..." Juri placed her hands on Chun's shoulders easing her back into her seat.

"...You're a badass." Juri didn't remove her hands. She started to give her a massage.

Juri whispered into the ear of Chun Li. "All that rescue work must be tiring."

"Of course, a badass like you would never get physically tired, oh no... You must get tired of the same old shit. Today's fight... I could see it in you. That Ryu... held back and paid dearly for it. I know damn well he was capable of more and yet..."

Juri stopped the massage and joined Chun on the bench. Juri laid her right foot across the lap of Chun Li. "You actually gave me your all... and you enjoyed it, having someone of my level to fight. You want to fight."

Juri continued to whisper in her ear. "You know I'm right. You can fight Ryu... You can fight me again... I can even get you someone blue."

That got Chun Li's attention. "Blue?"

Juri smugly smiled. The reaction told her that Chun knew who she was referring to. "He's nothing but my prey, he just doesn't know it... He can be our prey."

Chun Li stayed quiet in thought processing all that was happening.

"Did you like our conversation?"

"No... I didn't and I don't like you."

Juri laughed. "That was my best impression of being a good host."

"...Where is Ryu?"

"Hey, dragonboy, get your ass in here!" Juri yelled.

Waiting just outside the room, Ryu opened the door. Chun Li got up and attempted to look him in the eye but Ryu kept his head towards the ground. Out of nowhere...

Whap

Chun Li jacked Ryu hard in the jaw bringing him to his knees, palms over his mouth. "You better not be lying, Juri."

Juri pleased, leaned on her shoulder looking down at Ryu...
11412111221211112112131.title: Back to SIN Labs.

choices: David begins to feel... not so lucky.
11522.content:
It was a nice, but hot, summer day, not a cloud in sight as a young man walked down the street.

He went to wipe a bead of sweat from his brow and groaned.

"This damn heat, home. Hooome." He whined out loud to himself.

The young man continued his groaning. "Still a while to go. I should've checked the weather app before heading out in this dry sweaty Hell... At least no flying rat's are shitting on me this time."

As he continued to walk, he became more and more sweaty and sticky. The rays of sunlight draining his already low stamina. He continued to walk until he felt a very pleasant breeze come from a small shop.

"...Ms. M's Fortunes, huh? ...Alright, if I'm going to sit down it's going to at least be a place that can afford some air conditioning." He thought to himself as he walked toward the building with a cute sign featuring a black kitty and a blue orb.

There was a long hallway with lights that lead to a dark circular room. "...Hello? Is anyone here?"

"Ahh! A... customer?" A cute voice could be heard in the distance.

Out from the right side of the room the black curtain blending into the room slid open revealing...

A beautiful young dark skinned woman wearing very... unique clothing. Unique and expensive looking, a lot of dark purple & gold, head to toe, complete with a beautiful purple sash that both, laid across her shoulders and made for a very short skirt. Clearly Egyptian styled. Walking around wearing in attire like that must of been... comfortable.

Struck by this beauty, he stuttered. "Ummm, H-Hello there!"

"Come to get your fortune told? That'll be $50, please." Ms. M took a seat in front of a blue orb on a table in the middle of the room.

"Pffft... $50." The young man couldn't help but smirk a little.

"...Yes, trust me. You won't be disappointed." Ms. M ignored the rude gesture and continued.

"I'm sorry Ms... M. I didn't come here to get some... $50 fortune. I just wanted to look around a bit." The young man forced a smile.

"Ms. M is just a shop name, please, my name is Menat." She smiled.

"Okay... Menat. You have a beautiful shop here... and nice cool."

"Yep, it's quite nice actually."

In attempt not to make things awkward as he used her shop to relax. "...How's business?"

"Umm, to be honest... quite poor here in America."

"And... why's that?" The young man knew why but decided to ask anyway.

Meant smile was replaced with a frown. "People over here... think this is some kind of fraud."

"You... actually blame them? Wait... you think what you do is real?" David stifled a snicker.

Menat made a cute, but serious, pouty face. "Seeing how my master has been doing this her whole life among other reasons, yeah. I'd say I do. It's easy to not believe in something you haven't tried because you're too cheap."

"Have you tried maybe... lowering the price?" David suggested.

"It's cheap if anything. It's one fortune." Menat was getting annoyed.

"...I'm not trying to offend, it's just that... it's not possible and is fake." David grabbed the back of his neck.

Menat stood up. "You're sure?"

"Yes... very." The young man kept sitting in the cushioned chair.

"Are you sure you're sure... Davie."

"100% sure... Wait... How do you know my name?"

Menat rubbed the orb in front of her.

"I... think I'll be leaving now." David said flustered.

"Apologize!" Menat raised her voice.

"I'm out..."

"I'm warning you!" Menat yelled as David continued to walk away.

Menat pressed both of her palms to the mystical orb. "If you thought me finding out your name was creepy then you're going to really be surprised, very soon..."
11522.title: David... A curious onlooker

choices: David goes back to Ms. M's Fortunes.
115221.content:
David got what he wanted, to feel nice and refreshed. He didn't mind the fact that he had insulted a girl's profession, he only cared about getting back home.

David made his way out of the hallway and into the street. "What a weird girl..."

Plop

"...Goddamnit." A pigeon relieved itself directly onto David.

"Fuck this city and it's birds." David wiped the disgusting bird shit off of his shoulder as he continued to walk.

Only about 10 minutes later...

Droooom

"...Are you serious?" The sound of thunder made David pick up his pace and just within seconds he felt a sprinkle.... and a few seconds later after that he felt... more than a sprinkle. The bright and sunny day quickly turning into a dark stormy day... Summer weather in New York.

"Ahhh, Hell!" David with no umbrella in hand began to run with his not so light baggage.

Drenched, sweat seeping into his eyes, David finally arrived at his apartment. He opened the door and tossed his bags in the kitchen.

"Amazing day..." David removed his wet clothes and put on some new clean ones.

"Time for some me time." David thought to himself as he turned on his PC.

"...." David pushed the button again... and again.

"Really!?" The PC wasn't turning on.

David turned around looking at his kitchen oven's clock. It was the correct time; it wasn't the storm outsides doing, the power didn't go out.

David turned away and grabbed a seat from his compact kitchen area. Before David could even think...

Cruuunch Snap

The wooden chair had been destroyed under his weight as he sat in it.

"Ooouch! What the Fu---" David yelled.

"I'm warning you!"

"...No. That's not... realistic. It's all bullshit." David had seen things like this happen in films before. He couldn't help but think it was every similar to what was happening right now.

"No internet... no chair, maybe I should... see that weird girl again..." David thought to himself.

"...What!? No! What the Hell am I thinking? These are just insane occurrences."

"...But I was kinda a dick to her and I have nothing else to do right now... maybe I should talk to her again about my perspective on magic and shit." David continued to argue with himself in his mind.
115221.title: David begins to feel... not so lucky.

choices: David wakes up... and wants to go to Ms. M's.
1152211.content:
It was getting late... David had to make a decision soon.

He got up from his bed, put on a white hoodie and opened the door into the rainy New York streets.

His mind was blank walking back to the store. He would figure out what he was going to ask or do when he seen the young ladies face again. Hearing the crack of a loud thunderbolt, David quickened his pace.

David was there... The store didn't look this scary earlier, but it had a different feel now. David walked in once again, shielded himself from the heavy downpour.

David walked down the long hallway, still lit, to the circular room at the end.

"Ms. M... or Menat, whatever!"

"Take a seat, I'll be with you in a second!" The voice echoed from... somewhere.

Menat made her entrance, carrying the blue orb. "Oh... it's you. Decide to get that fortune?"

...She knew. "What did you do to me?"

"Do you want your fortune told?" Menat ignored him.

"Enough shit, you know whatever you did isn't legal. I could have this place closed by the end of next week." David shivered.

Menat not fazed by the threat, looked at David's hoodie. "You remind me of someone, another silly stubborn fool. I suggest you sit down and let me do your fortune."

"Fine... shit. Do your damn fortune!" David sat down.

Menat placed her orb in the middle of the small table and sat down across from David. "Don't worry... this one's one the house, Davie."

David looked into the orb as Menat placed her palms onto it. A blinding light pierced his eyes, giving him an immediate headache.

"Your lasers are giving me a migraine!" Menat ignored him and continued to look into the orb.

The glow disappeared, David tried opening his eyes. He rubbed them, when he got his vision back, he saw Menat standing to his side.

She placed her hand on his shoulder. "What I see in your future is..."

She whispered into his ear... "You coming back here tomorrow, same time."

"What!?" David yelled.

Menat walked away as David stared.

He knew this would be a waste of time... at least he didn't get robbed of $50.

David shook and wrung out his hoodie before walking down the hall.

He made his way back home, halfway there he noticed it stopped raining... "Hmmm..."

Cold and shivering, David went straight to bed for the night...
1152211.title: David goes back to Ms. M's Fortunes.

11522111.content:
Dave woke up and got out of bed. He still had a migraine thanks to the flashing seizure lights from yesterday, but he still spent his day as he would. He relaxed and searched the net, wasting time until the sun was about to go down. David put on his jacket and his shoes and went outside and began to walk to Ms. M's. In his mind, there was no argument. He wanted to leave, he wanted to go to Ms. M's. He didn't know why, and he didn't care.

The back of his mind was scared. The back that was completely out of control. The back of his mind got progressively louder as he got closer to the store.

David walked into Ms. M's and took a seat and waited.

"It seems my fortune telling isn't what you said it was." Menat appeared as she always had and took a seat. She had a huge smile with a smug aura.

"What did you do to me, lady?" His mind had returned after the fortune was complete.

"Read your fortune."

"Enough! Do you know what you're doing!" David yelled out in anger.

"I'm helping an arrogant young child know his place. Helping him understand."

"Helping?!"

"You're going to give me $50 with a smile on your face. You're going to give me whatever I ask for."

"...Like... Hell."

"And you're going to thank me, for it."

"You're a crazy bitch."

"In your future I see you being a lot less vulgar... a lot less talkative." Menat picked up her crystal ball.

"And every day, till you give me $50, you will come here at around 7 to 8 p.m. Do you still doubt my power lil Davie?"

"Fu--- Freak... you" David muttered, his brain censoring his mouth.

Menat giggled. "Your rudeness knows no bounds. Kind of cute though, I admit."

David's body shook. He was scared and annoyed... He couldn't believe what was happening...
11522111.title: David wakes up... and wants to go to Ms. M's.

choices: David attempts to fight the control
115221112.content:
A devilish cheshire cat grin emerged onto Menat's face. She looked in amusement as David's body shook. She had the rude, jerk of a boy right exactly where she wanted him. All he had to do was be nice to her, and this could have all been avoided.

Menat thanked the stars that it wasn't avoided however, as thanks to David's arrogance, she had earned herself her own personal boytoy.

"Now..." Menat began, raising one finger into the air, twirling it a bit as she admired her handiwork...

David could do nothing. He was scared, almost paralyzed by Menat's power of him. He could do nothing, a helpfulness fly in her web. He watched as Menat turned around, looking over her shoulder with a smug, yet pouty smile.

"Every day..."You're going to give me $50 with a smile on your face around 7 to 8 PM......and every day..."

Menat slowly lifted her tight black skirt to a bit above her hips, exposing her beautiful tan backside, clad in only a tiny purple thong...

"You will kiss my butt. Every day you will greet me by kissing my butt, and I reward you with your fortune. Every single day, how does that sound, Davie-Wavie?"

Menat wiggled her thong-clad butt as she admired the power she had over David. She was looking forward to this. David, meanwhile...trembled in terror. What...what was happening to him?!?!
115221112.title: Menat has fun with David.

choices: Menat obliges David to find that $10.
1152211121.content:
This girl was playing with his mind and their wasn't a damn thing he could do about it. His free will was drained whilst in front of Menat... and even if he did have it... What a beautiful ass... but money wasn't something David had plenty of. David's stuttering hand enter his pocket to grab his wallet, 2 $20's and a $10. His arm only shaking more as he was seemingly forced to offer this girl his hard owned.... and limited, money.

Menat quickly grabbed the money and fit it into the large golden jewelry around her neck for safe keeping.

"...Oh, you may kiss my butt now." Menat leaned her rear even closer to David's face.

He didn't want to... out of principle. Doing this every day? Literally impossible for many reasons... but as his mind told him "no" he felt his body reject it. His neck craned towards the young lady's behind. He tried so very hard... but still, his lips pursed.

A long drawn out kiss was laid upon her right cheek. Menat could feel the arrogance leave his body and she didn't hid the fact that she loved it. A rude boy literally kissing her butt, what wasn't to love?

"That alone was worth $50, we can agree! ...but you still have your fortune to look forward to Davie." Menat slid her skirt to cover up her assets.

Meant sat back down behind her fortune telling setup and placed her palms onto her crystal ball. "Ooooh my, I see so much. I see... You dreaming over my super cute bottom. I seeee, your confusion upon going home. I see, you getting Chinese before meeting with me again tomorrow. I seeeee..."

Menat's smile left her face. "You only bringing me, $40... David... care to explain?"

He didn't feel like it. He was angry and fed up. He had his free will again and honestly explained to her. "I probably couldn't find a $10 laying around genius. You didn't think this plan through did you?"

Even after kissing her butt, the stubborn boy still didn't get it...
1152211121.title: David earns his fortune?

choices: David dreams; Time to apply for jobs
11522111211.content:
Menat's eyes narrowed for a moment, before a wry smile returned to her face. "Like I said earlier, I see you being much less talkative and more obedient...." she began. "While yes I am a genius, I see you never again referring to me as, 'Genius'..." Menat said. "I see......I see you referring to me as Goddess Menat and only Goddess Menat, understood?"

"WHAT?" David said, continuing to be fed up. "LOOK, I already...kissed.....your butt...", David said, trailing off as he realized he actually did do that, a blush appearing on his face. "I'm NOT go-"

David was cut off when Menat put her soft finger to his lips, pressing down to shush him. He stop speaking.

"Ah...ah ah ah....David~ Where was I? Yes. Please don't interrupt. The $10. I will forgive you this once and give you a pass Davey.......but tomorrow, I expect $60. You will beg your friends, family, anyone you know. You will lie and say you need gas......if you cannot......" Menat continued, her finger still on his lips.

"You will find a job and use that to give me the $50 that you will give to me every day, do you understand?".


David still was stifled by Menat, his mouth still covered by her finger, as she finally removed it.

"Y...yes....fine."

"Yes fine, ? Yes fine, who?"

David grit his teeth. "Ye....yes......G...Goddess Menat..."

Menat gave a clap of her hands. "Much better! I look forward to seeing you tomorrow! You will get another fortune, and you will also get more of this~" Menat said, standing up for a moment to lift her skirt for a moment, flashing her thong clad backside with a wiggle, before sliding her skirt back down. She had him. She was his, and she could feel it. How exciting!

"Repeat everything you will arrive with tomorrow..." Menat said, testing his trained memory.

"$60, and ch....chinese..." David stuttered.

"What time?"

"7 PM On the dot and no later..."

"Very good!" Menat said, a Cheshire cat grin on her face. "I will see you then! You may leave now. Oh, and sweet dreams Davey~" Menat said with a wink.
11522111211.title: Menat obliges David to find that $10.

115221112111.content:
David's mind fluttered whilst sitting down in his dark kitchen. He couldn't eat, didn't want to. So many thoughts entered his head about what he was going to do tomorrow. His panic soon drifted away as he passed out, his table's place mat substituting as a bedroom pillow.

In David's dream was the sound of crackling thunder, the same thunder from his first visit. David would mindlessly wonder the streets, he was so cold... and out of nowhere, there she was. The cute dark skinned girl who was soaked just like he was. While David was moody and walked through the storm with a slightly hunched over back... she walked as if it was completely normal to her. David stood still in awe as the young lady made walked closer and closer to him, her mostly bared feet making ripples in the puddles beneath her. She stopped when she was directly in front of him and placed both her hands onto her hips, looking up at David as David looked down at her. Menat had a look as if she was waiting for something... before David knew it, similar to real life, he couldn't stop himself from taking a knee. When one knee touched the ground, soon the other proceeded. Menat smiled and as she did... the thunderstorm stopped roaring and was replaced, unrealistically quick, with a bright sun. Still very much wet, water slowly dripped off of her purple bangs as she slowly slid her thumbs into her skirt and sensually let it drop to her ankles, as she began to turn around...


Beep Beep Beep


David quickly punched his alarm clock so hard it stopped working. He was sweaty... more so than usual that is. "The dream... was so freaking real." He thought to himself as he got up from his bed.

David proceeded to get dressed... but had nowhere to go. He didn't have a job...

"You will beg your friends, family, anyone you know. You will lie and say you need gas" ...He didn't have anyone to lie to. No friends or family to beg. His only family passed away years ago and that's how he was getting along in life... the money he left him. They didn't ever get along but just enough to get into his will. Slowly, he was running dry, trying to avoid buying anything unnecessary. The little amount of money he made on the internet wasn't going to be enough. Nowhere near enough... He pissed off some girl, yet another mistake to add to the list.

"You will find a job and use that to give me the $50"

"Yeah... just find a job!" David kicked the remains of his already broken alarm clock.

Time would pass and David would do nothing but worry... He picked up $40 from the ground and decided to get some Chinese food for dinner before making his visit to Ms. M's.

When David arrived Menat was sitting and ready with a smug smile. "Did you pick me up an eggroll, Davie?"

"Umm... no?" David answered.

Menat got out of her seat and pulled down her skirt just a bit to tease David. "Not much of a gentleman, are you? Let's hope this humbles you." Menat pulled her skirt down a bit more and bent over. You could still see her annoying smirk past her beautiful ass.

Powerless, David walked over to Menat and planted a soft kiss on her left cheek. "Keep your lips on my butt as you hand me what's mine." David did as told, his arm reaching out, handing her $40.

Her fortune telling was never wrong... in her hands were 2 $20 bills. "Davie... I even had you repeat." Menat acted surprised but she already knew this was coming. Now for his excuse...

"Menat..." David mumbled.

Menat crumbled the bills in her palm and cutely stomped her foot to the ground. "Goddess Menat!" She corrected.

"Goddess... Menat... I can't give you $50 a day."

"When you get home, you will send out some applicat---"

"I've been sending out applications for months now." David interrupted.

Menat cleared her throat. "Do not, interrupt your goddess."

David held his face in his palms. He legitimately looked troubled... Menat wasn't evil. Menat rolled her eyes.

"You're really pathetic Davie, you know that right?" Menat said standing over him.

"...Yeah." He replied honestly.

"What are we going to do with you?" Menat asked herself.
115221112111.title: Mind on Menat.

choices: Menat orders David to bring in customers.
Menat tells him to go under the table...
1152211121111.content:
"Your uselessness is cute in a way, but that cuteness won't last for long." Menat handed David some papers.

"You are to start handing these flyers out for me around this city before coming here... I shall, permit you to give me $25 per visit for the time being. You will not abuse my good will I'm sure right, Davie?"

David grabbed the papers from the very serious young lady. "...."

"I said... Right, Davie?"

"I don't think I can handle that either..."

Menat blankly stared. "You see, the cuteness is gone already. How the heck have you been living, exactly?"

David, ashamed, didn't answer. Menat rolled her eyes. "I was planning to bleed your pockets dry... I guess I did. Didn't think it'd be this soon."

David still quiet, just looked at Menat as she continued to berate him. "Sooo... What are you going to do to make up for this, Davie?" Menat asked.
1152211121111.title: Menat's Pity

11522111211112.content:
Menat's index finger pointed downwards. "Go under my table, Davie."

"What for?" David asked.

"Do you still not know the trouble you're in right now, David? I'm being nice, doing you a favor. Get under my table." Her cute smile gone.

'Doing me a favor?' She was taking this too far; her power trip was only going to get worse as time went on but... What could he do about it? ...As David thought to himself, he released the answer... make this girl happy. David got out of his chair and lifted the red velvet covers on the table off of the ground as he slid under. It was pitch black, it was already dark in the room but being under the table, as the cloth behind him touched the ground he was enveloped by the darkness.

"Now... follow my voice, Davie." Menats voice came from above.

The table seemed to have much more room than he'd thought it had. Her table wasn't small... but it wasn't that big either. Maybe it was just the darkness.

"Follow..." David moved forward.

"My voice, Davie. Don't get lost, now. You're getting warmer" David used his palms to press on forward until he bumped into something soft.

David couldn't help but flinch a little. Menat giggled. "So warm, move foreword just a little bit."

He did as told again and bumped into the object but this time didn't flinch... it wasn't until he felt something tap against his temple that he had released what he collided with. It was the bared foot of the fortune teller.

Menat giggled again. "Your little nose is tickling my foot, are you shivering down there?"

David did not care for the position he found himself in, his face resting against the sole of his new nemesis.

"David, I think I know a way to cool yourself down. Go ahead and kiss my foot a little bit." Menat laughed.

David backed himself up. "No way in Hell, girl."

"...Now, now. Don't be like that, Davie. You know there are worse things you could be doing than kissing a cuties feet. This isn't up for some kind of discussion. You'll need to earn my pity. My feet aren't stinky or sweaty, get your face back there and give them a nice little smooch and you'll get out of paying what you owe me." In the darkness, Menat propped her right foot upwards using her left foot's toes as she waited...
11522111211112.title: Menat tells him to go under the table...

choices: You're going to be my maid for a month...
You're going to kiss my shoes...
115321.content:
Karin whiffed an open palm thrust to the upper right of Sakura's head.

"Give it up Karin, you'll never win again! I'm just too good!" Sakura yelled towards Karin as she did a quick dash backwards creating distance between the two.

"Hmmph! Quite cocky as of late, aren't you?" Karin replied.

"If you had the amount of sessions with Dan as I have then you'd be just as confident!" Sakura said with a toothy grin.

"There's only so much you can do with... Dans training. Do you actually think I have just been sitting down sipping the finest teas as you trained?" Karin looked slightly annoyed.

"...Yes, actually. That palm thrust was lazily thrown, if you don't be more careful you might really hurt the air."

"Grrrr..." Karin wasn't the type to take such an insult lying down.

Karin arms eased to her side. "You think you're a better fighter than me?"

"Yes, I do. We're buddies Karin but... let's be honest."

"Okay... You seem so very sure. How about a bet?"

"Sure, whatever you want Karin. What's the bet?" Sakura answered quickly, in her zone and ready for anything.

Karin smirked...

"If I win..."
115321.title: Karin Vs. Sakura

choices: Karin brings Sakura to her estate...
1153211.content:
"If I win, you're going to be my maid for an entire month."

Sakura cutely chuckled, still not taking her opponent seriously. "...and what if I win?"

Karin wasn't concerned about that possibility. "You can decide... if you win. Fair?"

"Sure, sounds fun. Ready when you are!"

Just as Sakura finished talking Karin threw a flurry of palm thrusts. Sakura quickly dodges them. They knew each other so well.

"Hadoken!" A blast of blue energy shot out of Sakura's palms.

Karin leapt over it and waited.

"Shunpukyaku" Sakura's long legs attempted to create more distance seeing Karins face. She was serious and attentive.

"Hah!" Karin caught Sakura's foot in mid rotation.

Karin lifted toward the sky flipping Sakura into a moonsault, landing on her feet. The arrogant look on Sakura face slowly diminished.

"Still feeling cocky?" Karin gestured Sakura forward with her finger.

Sakura answered with a quick Midare Zakura. A move which has finished many of her matches. Some of those many matches being against Karin.

Karin never leaving her fighting stance quickly back-dashed many times in a row avoiding her uppercuts.

Sakura was now defenseless in mid-air "That speed... How?!" Sakura thought.

Karin waiting directly below her, spreading her legs slightly.

"Hou... Shoooou!" As Sakura came down, Karins palm went up into her abdomen. A crushing blow that took any and all air out of her system.

"Hmmph! After all this time as rivals... You didn't learn to take me seriously at all times and never question my fighting ability." Sakura's forehead was on the Japanese street as she held onto her stomach.

"Well... I'm sure you'll understand this time after you honor your bet. I trust your a woman of you're word... yes?" Karin smiled down towards Sakura.

"Let's get you cleaned up now, shall we?"
1153211.title: You're going to be my maid for a month...

choices: Karin dresses up Sakura to look the part...
11532111.content:
Day 1

Karin raised both arms and softly clapped her hands, barely making a noise. It was more of a signal then anything... like magic, a long limo came in the distance after just a few seconds afterwards.

A butler came out through one of the doors and opened a door for his young mistress. Karin walked towards the limo. Sakura stood in awe of what was happening.

"Well... don't keep me waiting!" Karin raised her voice for Sakura to hear.

"...Yeah, yeah, keep your stockings on." Sakura made her way over to the limo.

Upon getting into the large ride, again Sakura was in awe. This was her first time being in a car of this caliber. Karin noticed her reaction and simply smirked as Sakura took it all in.

"Like what you see, Sakura?" Karin asked, still smirking.

"This thing must've cost like... a million dollars."

"Well... I don't like to brag." Karin replied as Sakura rolled her eyes.

"Where are you taking me?"

"Hmmmm... to my estate of course."

"You... own an estate?" Sakura raised her brow.

"Aren't you only like..."

"You know I stay very busy Sakura. You don't need to worry about my income, I assure you."

Most of the ride Sakura eyed the inside of the limo here and there and the other she spent time looking out the limo's windows.

"We're about there..." Karin announced.

Sakura noticed the roads looked nicer and nicer the closer they got to their destination. Finally the car came to a stop and a butler opened up both Karin and Sakura's door.

"Holy heck!" Sakura reacted to seeing Karin's house for the first time

"This place is huge!... and beautiful"

"Indeed it is. Let's not waste any time. You'll be seeing plenty later as for now let's head inside..."

Sakura followed Karin, making sure she didn't get lost somehow in this massive new environment.
11532111.title: Karin brings Sakura to her estate...

115321111.content:
From within the Estate walls there was countless rooms, high ceilings, with a royal design. Obviously Sakura had never seen anything like it before. Her constant state how awe made her forget the predicament she was currently in...

After a small walk Karin opened a door into what looked to be a gigantic wardrobe room. Walls of what looked to be closets.

Karin snapped her fingers "Strip."

"What? ...Right here? W-Why? ...someone might see." Sakura blushed.

"This is my estate, there are a few maids and nobody else. Take those clothes off this instant." Karin demanded.

"T-Turn around!"

"You're off to a very poor start maid. Fine, hurry up." Karin crossed her arms and turned around.

Sakura slowly stripped down to her underwear.

The door to the wardrobe opened up. It was a female maid, responding to Karin's snap from earlier.

Sakura shocked, covered up but the maid paid no attention making her way over to Karin.

"Ma'am."

"Grab some appropriate fitting maid attire for Sakura here."

"Yes, Ma'am." The female maid grabbed Sakura's discarded clothes.

"H-Hey!" The maid made her way down the hall with her clothes.

"Quiet Sakura." Sakura gritted her teeth toward the still turnt around Karin.

The maid quickly came back with French maid inspired outfit for Sakura.

"Good. Make sure everything fits."

"Yes Ma'am." The maid made her way over to Sakura.

The maid pushed and gestured Sakura "H-Hey! Seriously! C-Calm down! Don't touch me Th--"

Karin just nodded her head.

It took about 5 minutes for the maid to dress up Sakura.

"...This is such a joke. I look absolutely ridiculous." Sakura was wearing long white socks with black frills, fancy expensive black shoes with an even more expensive black dress. Sakura was used to miniskirts... but not without spandex or something to go with them.

Karin turned around "No, you look like a maid. The best maid in the world actually. I make sure I have the best servants."

"Anyone can be trained with a good enough teacher to guide them." Karin's eyes gleamed.

Sakura gulped...
115321111.title: Sakura's costume change up

1153211112.content:
"Luckily for you... I am that teacher." Karin said smugly.

"...Greaaat. Look Karin..."

"First lesson, it's mistress to you."

"...Nope." Sakura deadpanned.

"Angela!"

The maid from earlier swung a slick looking riding crop smacking Sakura on her bottom, not too hard just to let her know she was there. "W-What the Hell!? Do that again and I'll shove--"

"You'll do no such thing! Are you a woman of your word or not? I thought you followed the honorable Ryu..." Sakura groaned.

"Second lesson, don't be stubborn and listen well to your teacher. Don't make Angela swing again."

"F-Fine... Sorry, I guess." Sakura mumbled.

"Speak up, Sakura."

"I said, sorry..."

"Who are you apologizing to?" Karin crossed her arms.

"Sorry, ...Mistress Karin."

Karin smirked "Hmmm, very good Sakura. Angelina you can put that nasty crop down and leave us."

"Yes Ma'am" Angelina made her way out of the room.

"...Why doesn't she need to call her mistress?" Sakura thought to herself as Angelina closed the door shut.

"Now, follow your mistress. Ohohohoo!" Karin laughed out of the room.

"Yeah, yeah, yeah... mistress" Sakura slouched her shoulders as she followed...
1153211112.title: Karin's first... and second lesson

11532111121.content:
Karin led Sakura outside again. Sakura didn't get enough of the stunning scenery. Beautiful cherry blossoms, beautiful wooden bridges across beautiful rivers. Beautiful.. everything.

Karin clapped twice "Stephen! Please fetch me a chair, a small coffee table, and a glass of tea!"

Quickly a male maid came along with a very comfortable and regal looking chair, the coffee table and little tea glass looked regal as well. Everything seemed to have a theme.

"Thank you, Stephen. That'll be all for now." Stephen bowed and left.

Karin took a seat "...Now, lesson 3. Your posture, it's horrendous."

"My wha? What do you mean?" Sakura raised an eyebrow in confusion.

"Look around you. You see these maids and servants. Straighten up your back, I mean for goodness sake be a proper lady." Karin said taking a sip of her tea.

Sakura attempted to straighten her body.

"My goodness you can't even do this? I said I'm an amazing teacher but..." Karin put her tea down, got up, and placed her hand flat against Sakura's back shaping it into position.

"Like that and keep it like that. If you slouch forward anymore I'll find a whip for your own good. You'll thank me later."

The positioning Karin wanted was incredibly uncomfortable. She wondered how the Hell the people here could do this all day long.

"Now lesson 4... Oh wait just a second. I'm out of tea, already. Seems our fight left me quite parched." ...Sakura was thirsty too.

Clap Clap

Stephen came right away yet again.

Stephen bowed "Madam Karin?"

"Hmmm, yes. I'm out of tea."

"I'll make sure you get some right away, Madam" Stephen grabbed the tea glass.

"Wait, Stephen. Let Sakura help. Guide her to where the tea is and have her bring it to me."

"Yes, of course madam. Madam Sakura if you'll follow me."

"Nonono, Stephen. She's going to be a maid for a month here. It's just... Sakura." Karin said smirked at Sakura.

"Understood madam. If you can follow me Sakura."

"Sure, he looks nice enough... and kinda cute too." Sakura thought to herself as she followed Stephen inside.
11532111121.title: Karin corrects Sakura's posture...

115321111211.content:
Sakura followed Stephen inside until they reached the kitchen. Of course, it was massive like everything else.

"What's the point of even having a kitchen this big?" Sakura wondered.

Stephen looked over at Sakura. "The mistress often has parties with up to thousands of guests"

Stephen reading her like a book.

"Okay... where's the tea?"

"The tea's are in the overhead cupboard" Stephen pointed out.

"and the pots for the tea as well as the proper sugar are just above it."

"There's like... 30 cupboards in this room, how am I supposed to remember this?" Sakura thought.

"Umm, okay got it!" Sakura feinted confidence.

"The direction for making the tea are on the package... I'll leave you to it. Please use this tray to deliver the tea when it's finished." Stephen handed Sakura a silver tray and made his exit.

"Wh-Wha? ummm..." Sakura stood alone in the large kitchen holding the tray in a flustered confusion.
115321111211.title: Sakura get's Karin's tea.

1153211112111.content:
Sakura turned on the slick oven top to the proper suggested temperature and got to work. She grabbed a kettle, poured some water, she had everything ready as she began to make Karin's tea. Sakura was no pro but of course she has had tea before... she has made it before, the concept wasn't new to her. She took her time making sure everything was right.

"Perfect!" She was finished. Sakura puffed out her chest.

Sakura put the tea onto the tray and walked out outside to where Karin was still sitting.

"Finally done, are we?" Karin raised her eyebrow.

"You're going to need to be quicker in the future, set the tray down." Sakura proudly set the tray down onto Karin's end-table. The adaption of the maid life was going to blow Karin's mind.

Karin raised her tea cup to her lips and took a sip. Sakura looked down at Karin, ready to analyze her thoughts.

"Hmmm." Sakura's eyes widened in anticipation.

Reserved
1153211112111.title: Sakura's tea taste... eh

1153211112112.content:
Sakura turned on the slick oven top to the proper suggested temperature and got to work. She grabbed a kettle, poured some water, she had everything ready as she began to make Karin's tea. Sakura was no pro but of course she has had tea before... she has made it before, the concept wasn't new to her. She took her time making sure everything was right.

"Perfect!" She was finished. Sakura puffed out her chest.

Sakura put the tea onto the tray and walked out outside to where Karin was still sitting.

"Finally done, are we?" Karin raised her eyebrow.

"You're going to need to be quicker in the future, set the tray down." Sakura proudly set the tray down onto Karin's end-table. The adaption of the maid life was going to blow Karin's mind.

Karin raised her tea cup to her lips and took a sip. Sakura looked down at Karin, ready to analyze her thoughts.

"Hmmm." Sakura's eyes widened in anticipation.

Karin with her teacup in hand, poured the rest of it onto the ground.

"Below average, far below my standards."

"Wh-What?"

"I didn't expect anything more. You'll learn, I'll make sure of it."

"I-I followed the instructions perfectly, Karin." Sakura explained.

"At least tell me what's wrong with it!" Sakura yelled.

"Don't raise your voice at me, maid!" Karin's reaction to her outburst sent a chill down her spine.

"I-I'm sorry..."

"Don't let it happen again." Karin warned.

Clap Clap

Stephen seemingly came out of nowhere "Stephen, please give me a good cup of tea."

"Of course Madam."

Sakura went to follow Stephen inside.

"Maid, where do you think you're going?" Karin stopped Sakura.

"Umm... to see how he makes your tea, to see where I went wrong?"

"Not until to clean up this puddle. Don't bother Stephen while he does his job, quickly ask him where to find the cleaning supplies."

"...Yes, Karin"

"Yes, who?" Karin asked, annoyed.

"...Yes, Mistress Karin... sorry Mistress Karin" Sakura said with her head down as she went inside to find something to clean her mess.
1153211112112.title: Sakura's tea taste... meh

11532111121121.content:
Sakura gave a quick shoulder tap to Stephen to get his attention, concerning the cleaning supplies. Stephen gave her simple directions for a not so simple mansion. He had quite a way with words as Sakura quickly found what she needed following his instructions.

"He must've worked here for a long time" Sakura pondered to herself as she made her way to Karin.

Karin pulled out her high tech phone and tapped away. Maybe handling business or maybe just passing time playing a videogame. Sakura didn't care enough to bother her about it.

Sakura put the cleaner, bucket, and the rag below the puddle of tea that was slowly expanding south towards Karin's propped up feet onto a footstool that matched the chair.

Sakura sprayed some cleaner onto the cloth and started rubbing it into the ground. Absorbing the puddle into the rag and wringing it out into the bucket.

While she cleaned up, Sakura eyes often looked forward. What she saw were the soles of Karin's most likely absurdly expensive heeled shoes. Sakura's mind wondered off... wearing shoe's like those. They must be comfortable, wearing them in her battles it only makes sense. The way Karin moves in heels... she moves with a certain grace, with ease. Sakura couldn't imagine pulling off all of her moves wearing shoe's like those. Karin's tights... never ripping. Sakura's never thought of these things before... she was... impressed.

"Sakura!" Karin snapped Sakura out of her daze.

"...Hmm what?"

"...What do you mean what? Are you finished? If so put that stuff away where you found it."

Sakura gathered the supplies.

"Sakura..."

"Yes?"

Karin crossed her legs "Despite the tea blunder... you're not the worse maid I've dealt with."

Sakura couldn't tell if Karin was teasing or not but... a certain warmth came with the compliment "umm, thanks, Karin."

Karin dramatically cleared her throat. Sakura smiled "Alright, alright... thank you... Mistress Karin."

"We'll work on it. I'll get someone to show you your room."

"M-My room? I'm staying here!?"

"Of course you are, all of my maids do. You'll be staying here for a month. No need to worry about your job or anything else, believe me. I've got them covered."

Sakura groaned. Did Karin think all of this through? "I guess staying here won't be... too bad though."

Sakura went inside what looked better than any hotel on the planet as she waited for further directions...
11532111121121.title: Sakura cleans up.

115321111211211.content:
Another maid, this one a young woman with brunette hair, showed Sakura to her room.

"Your card, Sakura"

"Oh... thanks ...umm"

"My name's Sam. You can call me Sammy if you like."

Sakura smiled. "Thanks, for the help Sammy."

"No problem, good night Sakura." Sammy smiled back.

Sakura closed the door behind her as she checked out her room for the month. White accents with a redish wallpaper. The room looked to almost match up with Karin's usual attire in a way. Sakura never would have imagined a maid's room would be this spacious. Spacious enough to have a king sized bed, end-table, a glass coffee table, and some chairs. Everything within the room was nicely put together, showing off everything without looking too crowded or too spacious.

Sakura stretched her arms into the sky and kicked off her shoes. They weren't as comfortable as her chucks but they weren't as awkward as they appeared. Sakura continued to strip until she was in her underwear.

Sakura sniffed her underarms "I didn't even get to... What the!?"

Sakura checking out the room came across... a bathroom. A bathroom that was quite large. Every maid got their own to themselves?

"...Not bad. Not bad at all." Sakura grabbed some fresh underwear that a maid stocked up in her dresser prior.

After a warm shower Sakura went to bed...
115321111211211.title: Sakura's room

1153211112112111.content:
Day 2

Ring Ring Ring

An alarm rang loudly waking Sakura from her blissful sleep on the cloud of a mattress.

"I-I-I'm up!" Sakura drooled.

Sakura looked behind her, it was 8:00 a.m. in the morning. Sakura groaned.

Knock Knock

"Hmmm?" Sakura droned.

Knock Knock Knock

"Yeah, Yeah, Yeah! I'm going!"

It was Karin dressed in a white sun dress with redish pink low heels... no pantyhose.

Karin looked annoyed "What's taking you? You are to be dressed at 8:15."

"Sorry... you didn't tell me."

Karin walked over to Sakura, face to face "That lesson 4 was... no excuses."

"Yes... Karin. Sorry... mistress." Sakura replied, intimidated.

"Meet me where we spoke yesterday immediately after you've dressed." Karin closed the door shut behind her.

There where plenty of maid uniforms already in here room which made Sakura feel a little uneasy but grabbed everything she needed ignoring it not wanting to keep Karin waiting more than she already has.

Sakura made her way down the path she used before getting her where she needed to be. Karin sat crosslegged as she tapped away on her phone. A phone that very likely wasn't available in stores yet. It wasn't any model she's ever seen.

Sakura waited for Karin to look up before... "Umm, Mistress Karin?"

"About time, maid. Are you ready for today's duties?"

"I think so."

"Grab my chair and follow me." Sakura grabbed her chair, making sure it didn't drag against the ground and follow Karin to a new part of the estate she hasn't yet seen. As they walked, Sakura noticed they scenery change. They kept walking until they both reached the pool. As anyone would expect it was very large.

"Today, you're on pool cleaning. Set up my chair in front of the pool." Sakura did as told.

"More to the left, Sakura." Sakura picked up the chair but her first instinct was to just push it over to the left.

"Ugh, hmm. Never mind, move it back where it was" Sakura wanted to give a stink eye but kept her head down and moved the not so light chair where it originally was.

"Is that good?" Sakura started to sweat. The walk carrying a chair in this weather was a tiny workout in itself.

"It's fine. You'll find everything you need in the shed." Karin sat on her chair and crossed her legs and pulled out her phone again.

"Do a good enough job and maybe I'll let you have a dip after your shift." Sakura did have the desire to do a cannonball into a pool of this magnitude. Sakura walked off.

"Excuse me? I offered you a swim in my pool and you... walk off?"

"Oh, sorry Mistress Karin. I... just wanted to hurry and work at it."

"Hmmm, well go ahead."

Sakura headed towards the shed as Karin got some sun.
1153211112112111.title: The next morning...

11532111121121111.content:
Sakura skimmed the top of the Kanzuki pool. Overall this was very easy to do. The maid outfit didn't help but she dealt with it. Sakura's thighs sweat under her black pantyhose as she made her way around the pool.

This mindless job had Sakura's mind flutter yet again. She wondered if the pay for the usual staff was well. She didn't see Karin not paying the people around her handsomely for everything they do. After those thoughts tired out her eyes drifted towards Karin who was still lounging. A beautiful and simple dress that wonderfully complimented her. Sakura wasn't used to seeing Karin dress this formally. Her long legs bare. No long spats... no socks. All that lean muscle being shown off.

"Was she always this..." Sakura spent about an hour making sure the pool in front of her was clean.

"Are we finished?" Karin asked snapping Sakura out of her daydreaming.

"I think I did a good enough job."

"You took a little too long but it's clean enough for now. Ready for your next duty?"

"Sure, let's go."

"Nice enthusiasm. Being my maid isn't too bad is it?"

"I-I mean... it's fine enough, I guess." Sakura said looking to her right avoiding eye contact.

"Sure, well your next duty is very important... actually, never mind."

Clap Clap

This time Karin's clap summoned an older man, in his 30's unlike Stephen who had to of been in his 20's.

"Madam Karin." The man bowed.

"I'll have my massage."

"Yes, Madam Karin. Would you like any oils?"

"No, thank you. You're fine Bob."

Bob placed his hands unto Karin's shoulders and started the massage.

"...Oh, Sakura. You're still there. Right... you can go inside and wait for further instructions." Karin dismissed Sakura.

Sakura confused herself as she couldn't help but watch Karin's shoulders be rubbed...
11532111121121111.title: Pool cleaning duty

115321111211211112.content:
"You chose now to go easy on me Mistress Karin? I'm sure can rub some elbows"

Karin turned around to look at Sakura "I would hope you can, maid. You're below my standards for this task."

Bob continued to rub Karin's shoulders ignoring Sakura.

"I had no idea how to make your tea either." Sakura argued.

"And you messed it up, Sakura." Karin stared.

"...." Sakura was beat.

"...I can handle a massage." Sakura said looking towards the ground.

"Your pride shows even now, Sakura."

"...Fine. You get a try." Sakura looked up.

"Should I take my leave Ma'am?"

"Oh no, Bob. You can keep rubbing. Sakura will take care of my feet."

"Wh-What?" Sakura panicked.

"Bob will handle the shoulders and you can handle my feet." Karin recrossed her legs.

"K-Karin, y-your feet. I..." Sakura stuttered.

"Get inside, Sakura. Someone will give you something more on your level."

"W-Wait hold on!"

"I'm growing very tired of you breaking not only lesson 1 and 2. You're trying my patience."

"Wait... I'm sorry. I won't... forget again. I'm really sorry Mistress. I just... never rubbed... someone's feet before and..."

Karin seen the legitimate sorrow on Sakura's face. Karin rolled her eyes. "You have 5 seconds to get on your knee's, Sakura."

Sakura smiled "Y-Yes!"

Sakura quickly got in position in front of Karin's chair, on her knees before Karin.

"Umm, so okay..."

"Take my shoes off, Sakura" Karin looked impatient.

"R-Right... Right. A-Alright..."
115321111211211112.title: Sakura... objects?

1153211112112111121.content:
Sakura stared into the sole of Karin's pink shoe. Her hands stuttered towards the buckle; she could feel sweat start to form on her forehead. She had no idea why this was so difficult for her...

Sakura undid the buckle and slowly lifted the shoe off of her bare foot. Her foot was... perfect, which made sense. Her wardrobe, her hair, her estate, everything was to her standard. It all seemed to come so easily to her but Sakura knew better. Karin was constantly busy juggling various tasks just like her maids. One of those tasks must include taking very good care of herself.

Sakura gazed at Karin's barefoot, this is the first time seeing it, or at the very least, this up close. "...Other... shoe... Sakura!"

"Sorry, sorry!" Sakura quickly took Karin's other shoe off and placed the pair off to the side of the lounge chair.

"Look at Robert and how he caresses my shoulders whilst adding pressure. Use Bob as your teacher for now." Karin could tell Sakura needed a bit of help.

"...I'll try Mistress."

Sakura took Karin's fair skinned foot and slowly rubbed it with both her thumbs. Her foot was as soft as it looked. Sakura couldn't help but wonder how much effort she put into making them this way. Sakura trained very hard, so hard her entire body would be drained and blistered... Karin had to of trained a similar amount. Her foot was slightly moist but didn't smell despite the heat coming down on her. It wasn't too hot out, it felt nice but being trapped inside those shoes...

"Apply more pressure to the sole, right above my heel." Karin ordered with her eyes closed enjoying her massage.

"Yes, mistress." Sakura carefully applied more pressure. Not knowing how much pressure would be perfect scared Sakura a tad bit but she trusted Karin would steer her right.

"Mmm." Karin let out a soft moan. The moan could've been from Bobby's work but Sakura smiled at the thought of it being her.

Karin lifted her left foot over her right, floating in front of Sakura's face. Taking the hint Sakura delicately dropped her right foot onto the lounge chair and grasped her left repeating what she has done prior. Karin's silence most likely meaning the amount of pressure she had applied to her right foot was at the very least acceptable. Sakura gave her full attention, most of her rub focusing on her sole but she also made sure to softly squeeze her toes and softly knead her heel.

About 10 minutes later... "Shoes."

Karin just uttered a single word as she took her foot out of Sakura's palms and lifted her foot directly in front of Sakura's face. Sakura looked up; the sole of Karin's foot took up most of her view but she had noticed Bob was gone. He must have finished earlier before her. Sakura grabbed Karin's right shoe slid her foot in and buckled it up and then did the same with her left.

Karin didn't say anything; she just crossed her legs.

"...Did I do a good job, ...Mistress?" Sakura shyly asked avoiding Karin's eyesight.

"Sakura, kneel for me right here" Karin pointed directly to her right.

Sakura took a knee, positioning her face to face with Karin. Karin grasped Sakura's chin lightly in her palm. No surprise... her palm had the texture of a baby's bottom too. Sakura needed to ask her what lotion she buys later...

Karin had a slight smile. "Hmm, Sakura..."
1153211112112111121.title: Sakura gets to rub Karin's feet.

choices: Follow Sakura as she helps out.
11532111121121111211.content:
With Sakura's chin still in her grasp, Karin was eye to eye with her. She had a pair of puppy dog like eyes anticipating what Karin had to say...

"for your first time giving a massage... You were acceptable." Sakura would take it... she did it!

"Haha! I knew I could do it!" Sakura beamed with pride.

"You can create a ball of energy with your hands, surely you shouldn't be completely worthless when it comes to a little foot massage." Karin tried to settle Sakura down.

"But you can do better, and you will do better in the future won't you, Sakura?" Karin asked but wasn't really a question.

"Of course Mistress Karin, the training I went through to learn how to Hadoken will make the perfect massage a breeze." Sakura still on a high after her praise.

Karin giggled at her high energy "With my as your guide I'm sure it will be. Head inside and ask a maid if they need any help. I'll call you later before you head to sleep, Sakura."

"Where you going?" Sakura asked.

Karin got up out of her lounge chair "A little training."

"...I can't go with you?" Sakura softly asked.

"Not today, Sakura. Maybe another time... Go on now, inside."

"Yes, Mistress Karin." Sakura said bummed out.

Sakura went in doors and asked around the very friendly servant crew if she could help out...
11532111121121111211.title: Sakura earns Karin's praise

115321111211211112112.content:
Sakura helped around the estate with little tasks here and there until it came time to clean up and put everything away. Karin called Sakura and walked her to her room, where Sakura would have an amazing night's sleep. The comfort of her bed along with the work she put in made sure she's be out within a few minutes.

Day 3

Ring Ring Ring

"Yeaaah, Yeah, Yeah..." Sakura slapped the snooze button, hopped out of bed and got dressed up.

Knock Knock

Sakura quickly got the door. It was Karin... wearing a stunning swimsuit. A large elegant hat, sunglasses hanging from her top, and heels fully showing off her feet. She looked more and more beautiful the longer you hang around here...

"...8:10 and dressed already?" Karin said snapping Sakura out of her inspection of her body.

Sakura looked into Karin's eyes but quickly looked to her side "Well... you said to be dressed by 8:15, so..."

Karin giggled "Indeed, I did. You actually have until 8:30 to get dressed, that was just a little teasing on my part. I'll be sure to keep you on your toes. But anyway..."

Karin unzipped her white and gold handbag. Karin took removed a white and black swimsuit, no doubt maid inspired. "Here, put this on and meet me outside at 8:30."

"May I ask, mistress? What's going on?"

"We're going to head out at get some real sun using my personal beach out in Malaysia."

"M-Malaysia?"

"Don't worry, we have a jet. Get dressed, I'll have some maids grab everything necessary and put it outside your room."

"...Okay, got it, mistress Karin." Karin walked away as Sakura sneaked a little peak...

"...She has a nice ass too!? Damn!" Sakura, somewhat annoyed thought to herself.
115321111211211112112.title: The Next Day...

choices: Karin invites Sakura to play volleyball.
1153211112112111121121.content:
Sakura put here maid attire neatly away back into the drawers and slipped into her frilly swimsuit. It exposed more skins than she was comfortable with but everyone else would likely be wearing similar clothes. Sakura wondered who else would be accompanying them, Karin wouldn't go to a home away from home without helping hands.

When she was done dressing she walked, barefoot to the door. There was a bag with lotion, sunscreen, flip-flops, and other items needed for a hot spot just like Karin said. Sakura dropped the flip-flops in front of her and placed her feet in them and made her way out. At 8:25 Sakura made her way over to Karin's usual seat in the middle of the state, she was sitting and casually dangled her left heel while waiting.

"You're ready? Good, grab my bags and let's head out." Karin began to walk off. Sakura picked up both, not so light, bags of luggage along with her own bag as she caught up behind Karin.

Up north of the estate was the jumbo jet. Metallic white with a bit of gold, not as big as most jet's Sakura has seen. Behind Sakura were about 12 maids, both male and female, all wearing some variation of swimwear. Some of the suits were black and white like hers while some others were not. They must've bought their own, Sakura wasn't sure how many times they've taken this trip. Sakura continued to walk until she got inside and took a seat across from Karin by a window. Alternating between glances at Karin and the beautiful up high views from the plane, everyone arrived in no time.

Karin got out of her seat. "When we drop, make sure to grab my bags out from the Jet's storage."

"...Do you come here often?"

"Just whenever I feel like it. We'll be landing in about 5 or so minutes." Karin lowered her sunglasses.

When the jet landed, Sakura got in line as she made her way out. She followed the other maids to find the storage compartment, letting everyone else get their bags leaving Karin and hers left. Sakura picked them up over her shoulders as she continued to follow the other maids to a wooden lounge. Sakura put her bags with the other maids.

Sakura leaned over the balcony. There were living animals here. Some turtles, some fish, enjoying this luxurious beach. "I'm getting tired of being this impressed."

"Do you like?"

"M-Mistress Karin?" Sakura said surprised.
