"Hmm? We'll leave by dusk and head back to the estate by night." Karin said praising the speed of her jet.

"Nice!"

"Before you run around and have fun with the other maids, follow me. I need a tan and this sun is more pleasant on my skin. You can rub some suntan on me." Did she bring the maids along... to have fun?

"Yeah, sure. No problamo, mistress." Sakura hid her giddiness. She'd never been to many beach's and the one's she's been to weren't even close to half as amazing.

Sakura followed Karin down to the sand, where there was already a lounge chair with a drink to the side prepared.
1153211112112111121121.title: To the beach...

choices: Sakura relaxes until it's time to leave...
Sakura has some fun in the sun.
11532111121121111211211.content:
Sakura squeezed some suntan lotion into her hands and rubbed them together. Karin flipped onto her back.

"I'm sure you don't need instructions for this."

"I'm fine." Sakura assured, her hand gliding across Karin's shoulders.

As she continued rubbing the lotion in, Sakura attempted to start a conversation. "...You bring these maids along with you every time you come here, mistress?"

"Not every time but often enough. This beach would go to waste, I share the spoils with people close to me. You can move on to my legs now." Karin raised her right leg.

Sakura moved onto legs, first doing the right.

"Not too bad of a job is it, Sakura?"

Sakura caressed Karin's legs "Yeah, I guess it has some perks... Does it come with dental?"

"I make sure all of my servants are healthy and happy." Karin gave a serious reply to Sakura's joke.

"Now my front." Karin turned around on her lounge chair.

Sakura squirted more suntan lotion into her palms and repeated her task. Sakura made sure she got every inch covered, she definitely didn't want to be the cause of Karin getting a sunburn or anything. It didn't take long to finish her task.

"Is this good mistress Karin?" Sakura got off of her knee's.

"Yes, Sakura. You may of some fun with the others now or just sight see."

"...Are you sure you don't need me for anything else?"

Karin giggled. "Yes, I'm sure I'll be fine without you. I just want to get a very slight tan."

"You... You look fine as you are, Mistress Karin. I-I'll see you later!" Sakura said running off, hiding her face of embarrassment. She couldn't believe she just said that...

Karin relaxed her body and smiled as Sakura went on her way...
11532111121121111211211.title: To the beach... 2

115321111211211112112111.content:
Sakura relaxed, talked, and had fun with the other maids until it was time to leave. Despite being a maid for her friend... this was one of the most fun and relaxing days she could remember. Sakura sat close to Karin again on the way back home. She was still dressed in her designer swimsuit. Her manicured fingers tapping away on her slim laptop.

Everyday Sakura learned more about Karin's character. She thought she knew her well through all of the fights they've had but that was but one side of her. Sakura let her mind wonder off during the flight, eventually her eyelids got heavy...

Sakura...

Sakura...

Maid!

Sakura eyes opened with a towering Karin in front of her.

"You can sleep inside. Get up, we're here."

"Yes, mistress Karin... I guess these seats are a bit too soft." Sakura gave a ditzy laugh.

"You had a lot of fun today... You seem to be enjoyed your punishment." Karin slyly smiled.

Sakura got up "You could of made me eat a hot pepper or something instead... that's what I woulda did if I had one."

"You weren't going to win... Go on to your room and call it a day. I'll see you tomorrow." Karin made he way off the plane.

...and Sakura did.
115321111211211112112111.title: Sakura relaxes until it's time to leave...

choices: Sakura talks to the other maids...
1153211112112111121121111.content:
Day 4

It was only the fourth day since Sakura had lost her bet against her friend but it felt much longer...

Like the previous days, Sakura woke up and got dressed up in her uniform. Today there was no knocks at her door. Sakura opened up the door and walked over the where the other maids usually worked this early in the morning.

Sakura walked up to a maid she wasn't very familiar with yet. "Umm, is there anything I can do? I haven't been assigned anything today."

"Hello, you're Sakura, right? We usually do the same duties very week unless we're told otherwise by the mistress."

"Do you know where mistress Karin is right now? ...ummm."

"The name's Jessica, or Jess for short and the mistress is working near the pool. I can give you directions if you need them." Jessica gave a warm smile.

"Thank you, Jess. I know where the pool is but thank you so much." Sakura smiled back and waved as she made her way to Karin.

There she was, on her lounge chair cross legged with her laptop on her thighs. A blue variant of the white dress she wore a few days ago, working this early in the day.

"...Mistress?" Sakura quietly tried to gain Karin's attention.

"Hmmm." Karin continued to type away.

"Is there anyth---"

"Remove my shoes." Karin interrupted.

"O-Okay." Sakura slid Karin's red shoes off her feet and placed them near her chair.

Karin lifted her left foot high enough for Sakura to get the point. She got onto her knees and began to rub her feet.

"...Good." Karin said under her breath, not taking too much attention from whatever she was currently doing on her laptop.

Karin's feet again without sweat or smell, well not a bad smell. Her feet smelled... good. Karin likely lotioning up her feet before coming out here. The fragrance of the lotion was almost mesmerizing, like the best flower in the world being used by the best... lotion maker people. Sakura rubbed Karin's foot identical to way she handled it the first time but applying more pressure this time around. Karin lowered her left foot and lifted her right. Sakura got to work on her other foot.

Breaking the silence. "Sakura... I've treated you well? Have I not?"

"Hmm? Umm... I'd say so mistress Karin." Sakura answered confused, looking into Karin's sole.

"Look at me Sakura." Karin demanded.

Sakura slyly tilted her head up. It was still embarrassing to look at Karin while doing something like this.

"It's only the fourth day, you have a while to go... You shouldn't accept anyone's bets. It's foolish." Karin advised.

"...I know... mistress."

"You're extremely talented, Sakura. You know that as well as I, but talent will never beat hard work... That's why you're my maid."

"...What're you trying to say, Mistress?" Sakura could sense a point forming.

"Sakura... think about being my maid after the bet's finished." Karin said with a stern face.

Sakura scoffed. "And why would I want to ever do that mistress?"

Karin retracted her foot out of Sakura's hands and placed each foot to the side of her chair. Karin leaned forward, inches from Sakura.

"Why wouldn't you?" Karin's eyes drilling into Sakura.

"I-I'm a fighter, Karin..." Sakura couldn't keep eye contact.

Karin grabbed Sakura's chin with her left hand forcing eye contact. "It's mistress Karin. Do not make me tell you again, maid."

"O-Okay, fine. Sorry, mistress!" Sakura tried calming her down.

"You can still be a fighter and be my maid. I'll ask again... Why not be my maid?"

"...Mistress please."

Karin kept her grip tight. "Answer me, maid."

"...I-I don't know."

Karin released Sakura's face "I can give you a home here, top notch training, and a vacation spot to die for and you turn it down... why? I know why, that pride of yours... I'm not mad Sakura... just a bit disappointed. You have so much untapped potential."

"...The rest of my life living... being under you mistress Karin. I mean... you're right, it probably is pride but..." Sakura mumbled.

"Maid... whether continue being my maid after this month or not... you'll be under me because..." Karin raised her right foot directly in front of Sakura's face.

Sakura grasped her foot ready to rub again. "...I'm Karin Kanzuki."

Sakura quietly finished up the massage while thinking...
1153211112112111121121111.title: "I'm Karin Kanzuki"

11532111121121111211211111.content:
Karin removed her foot from Sakura's hand. "You're done."

Karin not even bothering to look at her dismissing her... kind of hurt. She didn't even tell her what to do next. Sakura was kicking herself. She didn't want to be Karin's maid permanently but she could've handled it better. She didn't mean any disrespect. The maids she talked to over the past few days were happy... and they had every reason to be. Sakura walked around the estate looking to help out other maids for the rest of the day. Most denied the help being in their grooves of daily tasks but a few needed an extra hand to catch up. She didn't see Karin for the rest of the day...

Day 5

Sakura repeated her daily morning ritual of getting ready for the day...

Knock Knock

Sakura went to answer the door... it was Karin dressed in the same outfit she had fought her in.

Sakura stuttered. "Mistress---"

Karin interrupted. "Sakura... You won't hear me say this often but... sorry."

Karin kept eye contact (as usual) "...You don't have anything to be sorry about Mistress."

"I wouldn't be apologizing if I didn't, yesterday... it was wrong of me to use that tone. To be that abrasive... I'm a classy woman and I should always act like it. That spoiled brat cliché is far beneath me."

Sakura looked up into Karin's eyes. "You don't have anything to be sorry about because you had a point... being your maid wouldn't be so bad... at all. A lot of people would love being in the position that I'm in. You had every right to be upset..."

"...I guess we'll agree to disagree" Karin said, crossing her arms.

"...So, what's on today's schedule?" Sakura broke up the awkward silence.

"I'm going to train, want to come along?" Karin asked.

"Yeah, sure." Sakura never got to see what Karin's workout looked like.

"Go to the kitchen, grab two waters and find two towels. The water should already be in the fridge. Ask someone directions for the dojo, I'll be there and ready."

"Got it, mistress!" Sakura went off to the kitchen to get everything, happy that Karin wasn't angry at her anymore.
11532111121121111211211111.title: Day 5

115321111211211112112111112.content:
Sakura followed the directions of a maid to the dojo of the Kanzuki estate, carrying towels and two ice cool water bottles. The dojo looked small in comparison to everywhere else here. The outside looked very Japanese styled complete with sliding doors. Sakura slid the door open and walked in, the inside was also very Japanese. Wooden floors and lots of doors to let in air with maroon and gold accents to make it look beautiful as well as traditional and down to earth.

Straight ahead was Karin. "Beautiful dojo Mistress Karin!"

"Shoes and stockings off before you walk any further!" Karin voice echoed.

Sakura slipped her shoes off and placed her black silk stockings inside of them by the door she entered before walking towards Karin.

Karin cut through the air with her palms. "Mistress Karin, what're doing?"

"Hah!" Karin striked again. "I figured I'd walk you through my daily training, show you what you're missing."

"I could also learn more, what should I do?" Questioned Sakura.

"Kneel over there and pay close attention, this won't last too long and hand me my towel and water when I say." Karin pointed toward the section of the dojo where there where pads along the ground.

"That's all? Got it..." Sakura sat, somewhat disappointed.

She sat and paid close attention like Karin told her. There was a lot of the usual, her signature moves, jabs, kicks, and very fluid dash's. Her barefeet sliding across the dojo's floor as if the floor was coated with a layer of ice. Of course she wasn't sliding all over the place, just sliding when she needed the momentum. Sakura had to admit... she didn't think she's be able to pull this off. While watching she realized... she relied a lot on ending a fight quick using her power. If Karin would just dodge over and over, she would have no strategy but to... try and hit her again. Such an obvious flaw in her approach to fighting... and Dan never called her out on it. She had fought Karin more times than she could count, Karin knew her moveset and what she was capable of. If Karin concentrated then she would beat her every time. She's already learned this much, simply from watching Karin.

Sakura sat, silent for about an hour as she took in the knowledge Karin was providing.

"Towel!" With that Sakura got up with a towel and a bottle of water and handed each to Karin.

Karin opened up the bottle and drank it all in one go.

"That... was kind of amazing mistress Karin." Sakura took Karin emptied bottle.

"Are you drinking yours?" Karin, soaked in sweat, asked eyeing Sakura's bottle of water.

"You need it more than me after all that." Sakura handed her other bottle over.

Karin opened it up and took a few sips. "Did you pay attention like I told you to?"

"Y-Yeah... about that." Karin looked over at Sakura.

"Yet another thing you were right about... watching you, I now know why I lost that bet."

Karin, accomplishing her goal, smirked. "Do you now?"

"The way your fee--- the way you move, is so much more advance than mine."

"Ohoho! Go on..." Karin untucked her top and wiped her underarms, whilst asking for more praise.

"You're every move has meaning, no wasted movements. I wish I could be that fluid in my movements."

Karin now wiping her legs and feet of sweat. "Sakura, look at me and listen well..."

Karin placed her used towel over Sakura's shoulder and grabbed the towel Sakura had around her neck to place on her own. The smell very strong but Sakura did as ordered. "Fixing me tea, doing some dishes, cleaning an already spotless estate, giving me massages every now and then... Is that really too much for you?"

Sakura said nothing but looked softly at Karin. "You can have an amazing place to stay, not work too much, get paid handsomely, and learn with me here."

Karin like a predator slowly walked over to Sakura, the sound of her wet barefeet lifting off the wooden ground echoing off the walls. Karin was inches away... "So, I'll ask again... why not stay employed to me?"

"I-I'm not even a good maid..." Sakura mumbled as she looked down toward Karin's feet.

Karin raised her head softly and brushed a few strands of hair out of the way. "It's nothing to worry about, you're doing just fine for a newcomer."

"...May I think about it mistress Karin?"

"Well, of course you can. I just wanted you to use your head and make the right decision for yourself. Let's go, I need a cool shower. 25 days to go, Sakura... I'm not forcing your hand." Karin made her way over to the entrance that Sakura used.

"Don't you want you're stockings and shoes, mistress?" Sakura noticed she left them behind.

"Oh yes, be a dear and fetch them can you?" Karin gave an order disguised as a question.

Karin pointed to the left of the dojo and Sakura saw her stockings and shoes tucked away off to the side and picked them up and returned to where Karin was standing.

Staying silent Karin lifted her left foot off the ground. Sakura knelt without hesitation and slipped on her black stocking and then her shoe to match. Karin then lifted her right barefoot with a warm smile... Sakura returned the it with an awkward smile of her own and put on her other stocking and shoe.
115321111211211112112111112.title: Karin shows Sakura her training...

choices: Sakura doesn't do it... but Karin makes her.
1153211112112111121121111122.content:
The next 25 days were filled with more of the same. Some days Sakura simply cleaned up the estate, some days she'd give Sakura a shoulder or foot massage, and other days she would watch Karin train... it never got too boring. She would get better with each day, the maids were very nice and easy to talk to, and every time Karin would practice, Sakura would pick up something new from it.

Today... was the last day of the bet.

First things first Sakura made her way to Karin. She wasn't hard to find; the estate was beyond huge but there were spots she would frequent. This time, Karin was in her patio which was between her room which Sakura has never seen and the kitchen which Sakura has seen plenty of. Karin was without her laptop, looking out at the distance, perhaps the sun. It was still early so she was probably still waking up but she was still properly dressed in her white dress with pinkish shoes.

"Hey, mistress Karin? You busy?" Sakura asked standing over her.

"Not at all. What do you need Sakura?" Karin smiled.

"It's... It's my last day."

Karin not breaking eye contact. "...Is it?"

"...." Sakura didn't like that answer.

"Did you give it thought?"

"Give what thought?"

"...Sakura." Karin raised her eyebrow at Sakura playing dumb.

"I... I j-just..." Sakura mumbled.

Karin dramatically exhaled. "No offense, Sakura but... you don't know what's best for you."

Sakura raised an eyebrow, taking some offense. "What?"

"Thinking was never you're strong suit. We're friends, Sakura. I'm going to be brutally honest with you... what do you gain leaving her today?"

"I..."

"You'll be your very best here. You won't watch me train anymore; I'll personally teach you. Guide your hand. Imagine... your potential. That potential being halted by... pride. My maids are healthy, my maids are happy, and you think you're above them."

Sakura would of considered some of the maids she's hanged out with over the past month to be friends... "I do not think I'm above them Karin!"

"Tch!" Karin angry at Sakura dropping her title. She was still on the clock.

"So... tell me why." Karin got up out of her chair, getting into Sakura face.

"I don't know!" Sakura yelled, fed up.

"...I know you don't, because you don't think." Karin sat back down disappointed.

"What... What do you want from me?" Sakura said, defeated, confused, and tired.

"I want you to suppress your inner stubbornness and do what you know is right." Karin said not bothering to look at Sakura.

"T-There's a lot I need to think about here, Karin." Sakura pleaded.

"This is your last day... I'm going to make this easy for you. Either walk out that door and kneel beneath me and kiss my hand... no... give my foot." Karin crossed her left heel over her right.

"H-How does that make things easier! That's beyond embarrassing!" Sakura said frantic, almost in a pout.

"You're going to stop yelling, Sakura. Either toss away your pride and lay a single kiss on my shoe or get your stuff ready."

Sakura really did think it over, over the tenure of the bet. Before the bet she was doing a lot of various things. She would train with Dan and others, have fun, and be free to train or goof around as she pleased. Here at the estate, she would constantly have something to do, of course there was a chance of returning to that gorgeous tropical island but most of the time it was maid work. There were pros and cons... but the more she thought about it. The cons were maybe... on the lazy side. Sakura didn't like the idea of working everyday(even if the maid work was easy to handle).

'That is ...lazy isn't it.' Sakura thought to herself.

'Ryu would never complain about something like that... but he would also never be a maid.' Sakura gripped her forehead.

"Sakura, you have about 5 seconds." Karin rhythmically tapped the air with her left foot waiting.

Sakura stood over Karin working up a cold sweat...
1153211112112111121121111122.title: The last day on the job...

11532111121121111211211111221.content:
"Hmmm..." Karin's patience thinned.

Sakura looked toward the door to the patio.

"5, 4, 3..." Karin became to countdown unenthusiastically as her foot dangled in the air.

Sakura stood still. "2... 1. Bye Sakura."

Sakura's lip quivered as Karin's foot stopped dangling and rested along her other foot at the end of her chair. "W-What?"

"Pack up your stuff. I want you out by the time I leave the patio." Karin said still not looking at Sakura.

"Wait..."

"I've waited for you to come to your senses long enough. I'm done being patient. Leave on your own before I get someone to force you out."

"Kar---... Mistress..." Sakura looked like she was on the urge of crying.

"Leave now!" Karin uncharacteristically yelling with a look of pure anger.

Her body shaking, Sakura got on her hands and knees. Slowly, she crawled toward Karin until she was at her feet. Sakura looked up at Karin with teary eyes and grabbed hold on her right foot.

"Please... Mistress Karin." With that, Sakura placed a kiss right in the middle of the top of Karin's foot. After the kiss, she looked up at an unimpressed Karin... she then laid many more soft kisses. Staying silent, Karin placed her left foot in front of her right. Sakura quickly placed her lips on her left foot as well. After Karin got her fill, she rose from her seat. Sakura looked up...

Seeing her watery eyes, Karin laid her soft palm on Sakura cheek. Sakura began to blush. "Two more kisses, one on each foot."

Sakura bent over again and did as told. Sakura laid a delicate long kiss upon her left foot and did the same for the right.

Karin again palmed Sakura's cheek. With a finger with caught a forming tear... "My... are we really crying?"

Sakura couldn't hold it in anymore... this was hard for her to do. "You did the right thing, Sakura... I'll take good care of you and you'll take good care of me in return."

Still on all fours, Karin handed her a napkin. Part of Sakura was worried. Karin's words were scary... but the way they came out felt... loving and true. Not some lie.

Karin walked toward the door, and held out her hand. "...Come."

Sakura grabbed her hand, getting off of her hands and knees as they both made their way out of the patio.
11532111121121111211211111221.title: Sakura kisses...

115321111211211112112111112211.content:
One month later...

Sakura was dressed up in a new maid outfit custom designed to look similar to what she had worn prior to her job as a maid but without an ascot. The top looked the same but with gold accent instead of pink, her skirt was more frilly, she kept the maid footwear that Karin had given her and Karin let her keep her hand pads and headband but were both black. Of course she had to take off her hand pads off for certain tasks but often they were left on. Sakura wasn't just a maid.

"Can I get you anything mistress Karin?" Sakura brightly smiled.

Karin smiled back, and raised her glass of lemonade. "No, Sakura I'm quite fine at the moment. Grab your notebook later at about... 6."

"Got it, mistress... I'll be around." Sakura ran off in the distance.

The notebook included notes whenever Karin would take time to spar or train with her. All of those thoughts in her head, everything she'd learned there would be later studied. Every session with Karin would be an amazing learning experience. 10 minutes before 6, Sakura awaited in the Kanzuki dojo, stuffing her socks into her shoes before heading further in. Sakura took a seat onto her knees until Karin made her arrival. Sakura hearing the doors slide open snapped her head up. It was indeed Karin, wearing her usual fighting (If you can really call it that) attire. Her beautiful red dress. Sakura's gaze lowered as Karin, slid off her shoes and her pantyhose. Sakura wasn't a lesbian but even she had to admit... Karin had legs. Muscular and at the same time incredibly womanly.

Karin barefeet made that sound Sakura loved to here as she made her way to her. "You know, Sakura... You could be a tad more subtle."

"W-What do you mean... exactly?" Sakura gasped dramatically, never being able to hide her emotions.

Karin crossed her right foot over the left. "...Right. Are we ready?"

Sakura stood up "Yeah! Ready when you are, mistress!"

Karin got into fighting stance. "You first..."

Sakura threw a straight towards Karin as she crouched and dodged it...

1 hour later...

Huff Huff

"Whew... good stuff, mistress. Thank you yet again."

"You're very much welcome. I'm learning quite a bit as well. You're a good sparring partner... you've always have been."

Sakura's grin grew wide.

"But you're still far below my level." Karin returned Sakura's smile with her own devious smile.

"I know, I know... but one of these days mistress you might regret helping me out." Sakura tightened her hand pad.

"Ohohoho, I look forward to it..."

"...But for now, let's head over to the pool."

"Nice!" Sakura loved the pool but nothing beat jumping in it after working up a sweat training.

"But you're giving me some well-earned attention before taking a dip."

"Oh, alright..."

"Are you still putting up this act, Sakura?" Karin asked, putting on her shoes.

"Yes... act. Fine... Here." Karin draped her pantyhose neatly on Sakura's shoulder.

"Put those away for me before meeting me at the pool. The smell is unpleasant."

"...sure." Sakura really struggling, left the dojo quick.

"...So, cute." Karin muttered to herself, opening to dojo's doors...
115321111211211112112111112211.title: Karin & Sakura (Part 1)

1153211112112111121121111122111.content:
The warm sun shone down upon Karin and Sakura as Karin once again took her seat her the edge of her pool. It wasn't rare for Sakura to massage Karin's feet whenever they would visit the pool. It was a weekly routine, sometimes more than once a week even... What wasn't routine was giving her a massage straight after her training. The smell was a mixture of her fancy lotion and soap, sweat, and whatever the inside of her shoe was made of... they wasn't as smelly as they appeared. The sweat making Sakura's hands glisten like the pool beside her as she pressed her fingers into her arches.

"You're doing amazing, maid but... open up." Karin said looking directly into Sakura's eyes.

Sakura groaned... this wasn't the first time; she knew what was coming. However, this was the first time doing so, right after training. Sakura opened her mouth slightly. Karin dipped her toes against her wet tongue as Sakura continued rubbing her other foot. Karin's shoulders relaxed further into her lounge chair.

"Madam Karin..." Showing up quietly like some kind of ninja, it was Stephen with a large clipboard. Sakura quickly slipped Karin's toes out of her mouth, hoping he didn't see too much.

"I don't believe you're done yet Sakura..." Karin looked down past her knee's.

"M-Mistress... c'mon..." Sakura looked off to the side.

"...Maid." Getting Sakura to look at her. Whenever Karin called her maid that usually meant she didn't want any opposition.

"Right... now." Karin said sternly.

Sakura looked over at Stephen who had a look of someone who couldn't care less. Slowly Sakura leaned over a continued to suck Karin's toes and then rub the other.

Waiting until Sakura got over Stephen's presence, she turned toward Stephen. "...What is it, Stephen?"

"That tournament you had me look into... I have an important update regarding its time and place."

Karin smiled. "Very nice news... it has been a while. Sakura... switch."

Karin presented her dry(aside from a little sweat, that didn't stick to Sakura's palms) right foot directly in front of Sakura, cutely wiggling her toes causing Sakura to blush. Sakura took Karin's toe into her mouth as she grabbed hold of her wet left foot and repeated the same. The lack of hesitation this time made Karin smile.

"Would you like me to go into detail now, madam?"

"Oh no... There's plenty of time, just make sure my name... and Sakura Kusanagi's get onto that list for me." Sakura ignoring her name being dropped, too focused on her massage.

"Consider it done, madam."

"Thank you very much, I'll see you soon." Stephen walked away in the distance.

Karin again looked down beneath her knee's at Sakura slowly rubbing and sucking her toes with her eyes closed. She didn't need to tell her where she missed or what needed more attention... she was a natural and Karin knew why. Karin wasn't one to tease, nor would she blame her. Karin continued to look down placing her chin in her palm for several more minutes...

"Sakura." Sakura stopped sucking and looked up into Karin's eyes.

"Next time, no hesitation. None of my maids will judge you, I assure you. Other than that... good job as usual."

Sakura made a cute popping sound as she took Karin's toe out of her mouth. "...Thanks, I won't. I was just..."

"I know Sakura... Give each foot a kiss."

Sakura placed a soft kiss onto each big toe and stood up.

Sakura gave Karin a puppy-dog look. "...You can swim now." Karin waved her off.

"Hahaa! Thanks, mistress!" Sakura ran a did a cannonball splashing water onto Karin.

"..." Karin would normally be upset... but not today. Today it's fine. Maybe, she'd join her...

The tournament Stephen spoke of was coming up soon in Japan and it was a tag team bracket of various fighters from around the world... sadly no noticeable names of been confirmed but Karin always sought out new faces and new talents. Regardless it was an easy win, Sakura and her synergy would be too much for anyone to handle. Even if they didn't work well together, with Karin's training Sakura was at her best and improving every day. Karin and Sakura were amazing apart but would be unstoppable together.
1153211112112111121121111122111.title: Karin & Sakura (Part 2)

11533312.content:
It was a beautiful sunny day, very much common in the amazing country of Brazil.

All the windows were open as breeze came through as well as the vibrant rays of sun.

Sean was sitting on his couch relaxing playing on his CPSP.

"I'm hoooome!"

His sister, Laura, walked in the small house. Loudly announcing she had arrived as if Sean couldn't hear her close the door shut. She loved to be heard. Her energy seemed to be endless... no doubt that helped her be the fighter she was. She walked into the living room where Sean was, dripping with seat... not bothering to wipe herself down first. Today she was wearing her sleeveless green gi with matching green pants, both with a bit yellow added. Black belt, Black footguards protecting her feet, one side of her hair braided and the other long, some of it sticking to her forehead. All together, she looked like her country's flag... a flag that doesn't like to wear much clothes.

"Are you not going to welcome me home, little bro?" Laura peeked over Sean's CPSP.

Sean just tried to ignore her. He tried not to give her the attention she sought... she got plenty of attention from anyone that laid eyes on her. Laura walked away...

Sean put the game down... surprised that actually worked. He hoped she would go straight to the bathroom. But only a few seconds later...

Before he could stiffen his lower body his sister quickly jumping, behind first, onto it. Forcing the air out of his body.

"Seeeaaaaan! Did you forget to greet your big sis?" Laura bounced up and down. Even if he wanted to, right now, he couldn't give her the greeting she wanted.

"I'm out all day sweating my butt off while you play games and I can't even get a 'Welcome back, Laura?' Hmm?" Laura asked rubbing her rear into Sean's lower ribs.

"Get... off... me! You're sweaty!" Sean tried to move her legs.

Laura grabbed hold of Sean's head and put him in a headlock. "That didn't sound like a warm and brotherly greeting!"

The sweat from under her arms was getting into Sean's hair. He was going to need to take a shower as well...

Laura didn't let go of his head as he continued to struggle. "Alright, alright! Welcome home!"

Laura squeezed harder "Welcome home who? Did someone else come home, I couldn't hear?"

"Welcome home big sis!"

"Nice to be home, little bro!" and with that she released him and walked away but not before ruffling his hair up.

It was always like this... she always treated him like this, and she was, for the most part, oblivious to her own teasing. At home, in front of people... in front of his friends. This was the daily life of Sean Matsuda... but it wouldn't always be like this. He was going to embarrass her... for her own good of course. Beating her in a fight!
11533312.title: The daily life of Sean Matsuda

choices: Laura's perspective. (The rest of the day)
115333121.content:
Sean could hear the sound of water running down the hall, in the bathroom. She had enough sense to take a shower... after rubbing her stink into him.

Sean picked his CPSP back up as he waited for his sister to get out of the shower. Waited for his turn but also to confront her on her way out. When he heard the water stop Sean put down the game onto the end-table to his left and sat up. He got up from the couch as he heard the bathroom door open.

Dramatically stomping he made his way towards the bathroom before bumping into Laura. Sean stared... She was more naked than usual, not bothering to get properly dressed after her cool shower. She had lounge pants that looked very much like her normal fighting attire... and just a towel draped across her shoulders barely... barely covering her nipples.

"You taking a shower, bro?"

"C-Can you not put on a shirt!?"

"I'm relaxing in my home, move outta the way, I needa drink." Laura walked past him.

"H-Hey!" Sean grabbed her shoulder.

"What!?"

"I... I challenge you to a fight!" It was difficult issuing his challenge like this, but he tried to ignore his dumb sister's exhibitionist tendencies.

"Hmmm, sure. Why not? Can't play with you today, still got things to take care of. I'm a busy woman. A busy woman that needs to spread the word of the Matsuda Jiu-Jitsu." Laura dismissed him but her reaction was still a win. She walked to the fridge and drank straight out the orange juice carton.

What Laura didn't know was, Sean hadn't just been playing Megaman... He was looking up techniques. He was a fan of many fighters from around the world, he was studying. Not only studying but also trained when he knew his sister wouldn't be back for a while in secret. She thought he was too young... she probably thought the challenge was a joke. He had to prove himself. Sean sniffed the air around him...

"No more headlocks, under her rank pits!" Sean thought to himself.

Laura put the carton of juice back into the fridge. Sean asked. "So... Tomorrow?"

"Hmph, yeah, kiddo. Tomorrow." Laura smirked.

"You won't be smirking tomorrow when I---" Sean's inner monologue was interrupted as Laura opened the front door...

"Sis! Put on some clothes!"

Laura groaned. "I was just drying off, Sean. I wasn't staying outside..."

Sean blushed and facepalmed...
115333121.title: Sean challenges Larua (she accepts)

115333332.content:
Today was her first day of her new career, a Highschool teacher.

Christie had been looking forward to this day ever since Highschool, going back to a school to help others succeed in life just as her teachers had done for her. The school where she landed her job wasn't her first choice but that didn't really matter, she was doing what she loved. She had heard this school was diverse and... different but that was about it. At the end of the day, school is school and she was lucky to have landed the job as early as she did.

Christie wore a nice professional outfit, mimicking her favorite school teachers' apparel. A white blouse, her hair in a bun, a dark brown skirt, and dark stockings to match.

Christie took a deep breathe, grabbed her coat and satchel filled with everything she'd need and drove to work.

Christie parked her car and made her way to the front gate. "Wow!" The school was much larger in person.

"Room 605... 8 A.M." The rest of the school could come later, right now she needed to find her room. So she quickly asked for directions and found her classroom, making sure she was there early.

Still setting things up, someone opened the door. It was a pretty young lady with twin braided hair, stylish glasses, and wearing a variation of the school's uniform. The uniform was a lot brighter and overall more expensive looking than the other students she had seen today. Christie thought she dressed up a little too 'professional' but this young lady looked like she owned the school.

"Oh... Hello!" Christie greeted.

"Hello... Ms...."

Ms. Christie extended her hand to greet her. "Please, it's Ms. Christie. Nice to meet you."

The young lady took her hand and shook it. Her hand reflecting her disposition, soft and warm. "Welcome to the school, Ms. Christie. My name is Chun Li, I'm the school council president. Sorry if I'm bothering you by coming early."

"Not at all, although I'm surprised to see someone come in so early."

"First in, last out." Chun Li smiled, laying her textbooks and some pencils onto her desk.

Ms. Christie continued to setup her desk, as well.

While time passed more and more students came in... including a boy who looked rough around the edges, wearing a long black jacket with no shirt underneath, matching black pants, and a red headband... Not up to the school's uniform code. He sat in the back next to the window. He seemed nice enough, Ms. Christie wasn't going to write someone up on her first day. As long as her students didn't cause trouble she would preferably leave them alone. The class was about filled so she decided to get started.

"Hello, all. I am Ms. Christie, very nice to meet you all... Is this everybody?" Ms. Christie asked the class.

"...There's one missing." Chun Li said with little enthusiasm.

It was 7: 57 a.m. "We'll wait for 5 more minutes. Please bring out your english textbooks... and we'll start on page 213."
115333332.title: Street Fighter Academy (Ms. Christie)

1153333321.content:
Ms. Christie into the lecture began writing subject material upon the blackboard behind her.

"...So, there aren't any questions? It's not too difficult if you keep in the back of your mind that---"

Before you could even hear the doorknob turn...

Slam!

A gothic menacing looking girl slammed the classroom door open and entered. "Hahaha! A new teach? Heeey, why didn't anyone tell me?"

There she stood... waiting for an answer, wearing a collar around her neck, studded bracelets around her wrists, two-toned hair, a black blazer, plaid skirt, ripped black stocking, complete with combat boots that somehow didn't kick a hole in the door.

The pink and blue haired girl, left the door open, as she took her seat in the class. "What happened to Mr. Smith?" Juri asked as she kicked her heavy shoes up onto her desk... The dirty scratched up desk was hers. This girl completely distracting Christie, the loud bang of the door being blown open still shocking her.

Some of the room shared their reaction with the teacher but Chun Li didn't, she kept her composure around the late student. "You know full well, what happened. Quiet down, Juri."

"It's rude to assume, Ms. Prez." ...Ms. Christie didn't know anything about a 'Mr. Smith'.

Trying to regain the class's attention. "...So you're the last student?"

"Yeah, what of it? Am I late?" Juri smiled, trying to get a rise.

"Yes, you are but it's fine. I'm Ms. Christie, nice to meet you." Ms. Christie returned her smile with a far less wry one.

"Yeah... alright, Christie." Juri purposely leaving the 'Ms.' out.

Juri got out a nail filer as she continued to relax with her feet propped up. Rude but... at least she was quiet.

Ms. Christie continued her lesson.

Near the end of the class, Christie asked. "Are there any questions over any of the material we have went over?"
1153333321.title: The late student

choices: Skip to the end of school...
11533333211.content:
Chun Li raised her hand. "Not a question but you did a very good job, Ms. Christie. Can I help you after school has finished?"

Still with her eyelids shut and heels relaxed on top of her desk, Juri mumbled. "Kissass..."

Chun Li's attitude surprised her. "T-Thank you for offering, but surely you have prioritizes as school council president."

"I'm sure that my council can more than handle a day of me not being present. I would love to show you around and answer any questions you have." She smiled.

"That would be nice, Chun. I'll be here, whenever you're ready, preparing for tomorrow as of now, class is dismissed. Thank you all for making my first day, memorable." Juri was the first to get up, giving a cold stare towards Ms. Christie on the way out...

Next in line was the boy with the headband, he exited with his head down and then the rest of the class followed.

"Don't worry too much about Juri, she likes attention. Her bark is worse than her bite, don't let her get to you." Chun Li said as she left.

"...Right." Ms. Christie said softly to herself, wondering how true that was.

All in all... nice class. Diverse.
11533333211.title: Chun Li raises her hand.

115333332111.content:
Ms. Christie cleaned the blackboard, organized her papers, and made helpful sticky notes for tomorrow's class. She loved being prepared, it was an excellent way to reduce any possible stress. She relaxed while she did this and waited for her appointment with her new student, the president, Chun Li.

Minutes after the last of the school's classes were over, Chun Li opened up Ms. Christie's door and stood in front of the desk her she was sitting.

Ms. Christie stood. "Are we ready?"

"I am, if you are ma'am." Chun Li smiled.

Chun Li walked along Ms. Christie as they both went sightseeing. The walls were clean, as were the floors. The school in whole, was in terrific condition as if the school was made only years ago.

Christie asked the young student. "How old is this school?"

"About 10 years old." Chun Li answered.

"10 years... hmm. It's in quite the spectacular condition for a decade old school."

Chun Li giggled with her hand over her mouth. "You could find some dirt I'm sure. The school has high quality janitors, I presume."

"...Chun Li, about something you said earlier today." Ms. Christie stopped walking.

Chun Li looked at Ms. Christie. "What happened to this... Mr. Smith."

"I could tell you but... it sounds worse than it actually was."

"I'm very curious... I've been thinking about it. No one, told me anything about him."

"He was just the teacher before you, teaching English. I guess he couldn't handle the new environment. Some of the students can be a little intimidating."

"...Like the boy with the headband?"

"No... maybe. He's actually quite harmless. His name is Ryu, by the way."

"Like... Juri."

Chun Li rolled her eyes. "She's not as bad as she looks. If I can be brutally honest with you, she got to Mr. Smith but I can tell you're stronger and brighter. She'll stare at you trying to intimidate you but just ignore her. She won't do anything more than that while I'm around."

Ms. Christie thought to herself... 'While I'm around?'

"Well... as of right now, that was all the questions I had. Thank you so much for showing me around. I can't wait to try the cafeteria tomorrow." Ms. Christie smiled.

"No problem Ms. Christie, see you tomorrow!" Chun Li waved as she left, down the hall, towards the exit.
115333332111.title: Chun Li catches the teacher up to speed.

1153333321111.content:
Ms. Christie woke up early, had an egg crescent, and brushed her teeth. She gathered her materials and walked out of her home, ready for another day.

She entered the school, now with new knowledge of where everything was for the most part anyway. This removed some of the new day jitters, now she felt like this was her school. Christie opened the door to her classroom with a smile and got ready.

The first to enter was Chun Li who greeted her smile and a wave. Next came the rest besides Ryu who was the last one in... unless Juri came late again.

When it turned 8:00 a.m. Ms. Christie decided to get started. "Please open up your texts to page 227. This new material is similar to what we just went over yesterday but a tad more difficult. I'll be sure to walk you all through it."

Class went smoothly... Christie didn't want to think it but... perhaps due to Juri not being present. She was a student and she genuinely cared about her students, after all, not everyone was going to be an angel. A rough student was just a part of the job.

As time passed. "Now... if there's any questions at all, I'll be here after class for about an hour. I'll be happy to help you all out."

Again, Ryu was the first to leave and the class left soon after him.

"You're a wonderful upgrade from Mr. Smith, Ms. Christie." Chun Li said.

"Oh... Thank you? Was there more, Chun?"

"You're welcome... There's one thing, but I don't know how to say it without coming across crass."

"I'm open ears." Christie smiled at her student.

"Well... May you please refer to me as Ms. Li."

Christie's eyes shot wide open. "Excuse me?"

"I know how it sounds but I am the student council president... among other things and I take it very seriously. Everyone... besides the filthy side of this school, does as much and I just didn't want you coming across as better than the other faculty members or anything."

"Oh... I didn't know Chun." Chun Li stared.

Ms. Christie cleared her throat. "Ms. Li."

"Thank you... I know it's awkward but in my belief we should show each other respect where it's needed."

'Where it's needed.' Christie felt like cringing. This young lady was very intelligent... but she was still that, a young lady... but then again, some people would refer to her being a young lady as well being only 26 years old and in a teacher position.

Before Chun Li left the classroom, she turned around to look at Ms. Christie. "Again, thank you... I knew you'd understand."

Ms. Christie couldn't help but feel a little insulted... but if everyone else refers to her as 'Ms.' It would indeed be weird not to follow. The school was just... different than what she was used to. She didn't want to over think it, after all, today's class couldn't be any more perfect.

Ms. Christie looked forward to another day of it...
1153333321111.title: A peaceful class (Tuesday)

choices: Skip to next week. (The results of the quiz are graded)
11533333211111.content:
The last two days were wonderful. Ms. Christie, couldn't have wished for more... although she didn't like Juri disappearing from her class, missing out on her education. She still remembered their last meeting and the stare that her student had given her...

"Today we have a short quiz of 30 questions, going over what we have studied this week." Ms. Christie passed the quiz around making sure everyone had a copy. There was mumbling as she handed them out.

"A test already?" A student let out.

"It's not a test... it's a qu---"

Chun Li interrupted Ms. Christie mid-sentence. "Don't complain, Dan."

"W-What!? but..."

"If you actually paid attention and took notes during class then there would be nothing to worry about."

Dan looked off to the side, embarrassed. "Wh-Whatever..."

"The quiz should be about to start, stop talking." Dan's eyes widened but his mouth stayed shut.

Chun Li's attitude was starting to worry Ms. Christie...

"You... may begin the quiz class, I hope you all do well." Ms. Christie smiled.

Ms. Christie gave the class an hour to finish. Ms. Christie collected the quiz and went over some material from her textbook until the bell rang.
11533333211111.title: 3 days later... (Friday)

115333332111111.content:
Over the week, Ms. Christie graded the quizzes. The scores were overall impressive, the average being a C+, which brought a smile to her face. Her class was listening, this was a quiz on her teachings... This must mean, she could really do this... and do it well! The next average would only get higher and higher, she was proud of herself and her class.

It was Monday and class started the same as usual with no surprises. Everyone sat down and Ms. Christie handed out the papers. After that, she got started on today's lesson.

After the lesson was finished and the class was about over, Ms. Christie said. "If you'd like to talk about the lesson or about your quiz, as always, I'm here after class."

Ryu walked out as the rest of the class followed. The rest of the class... besides Chun Li, how must have wanted to talk to her again. "Ms. Christie?"

"Yes, Chun?" Chun Li's eyes narrowed.

"I thought we had an understanding, concerning our names, Ms. Christie."

"...Oh... Oh, of course, I'm sorry Ms. Li." She gave a, not so legitimate, apology.

"...Right. About the quiz..."

"Yes?"

"There might be a mistake..." Chun Li handed her, her quiz. A B+ paper.

"Very nice, Ms. Li." Chun Li stared into her eyes. No smile... a scary face.

"I-Is something wrong... Ms. Li."

Chun Li cleared her throat and straightened her glasses. "...Do I look like a B+ student, Ms. Christie?"

"I... I'm s-sorry?"

"Do I look like a B+ student."

"I wouldn't... The questions were tricky. 80% of the class got those questions wrong but I did go over th---"

"I don't get B's, you must not have go over the content of the quiz well enough. I don't get B's." Chun Li walked closer to her teacher.

"Wh-What do you want me to do?"

"You can correct the issue here. I'm an A class student, an A+ student."

"I can't change the grade Chu--- Ms. Li."

Chun Li shook her head in disapproval. "Oh my... I had faith in you. Your reply makes me feel like a 'B' student, maybe I was wrong... even Mr. Smith knew better."

"E-Excuse me!?"

"We'll talk again soon, Christie..." Chun Li walked out of the room.

Ms. Christie felt a mix of annoyance, anger, shame, and... fear. What happened to Chun Li? The Chun Li that walked with her through the school. Chun Li was right... They needed to talk again.
115333332111111.title: The results are in...

1153333321111111.content:
Another day of class had finished up, Ms. Christie struggled to keep herself together in front of her class. Meanwhile, Chun Li acted as if nothing had happened, yesterday. "If there are no questions, you all may take your leave." and they did... besides Chun Li.

"Shall we talk?" Chun Li asked nicely.

"...Sure." Ms. Christie stayed seated.

"Did you sleep on it? Did you decide to change my grade?" Chun Li asked, not making eye contact.

"No." Ms. Christie replied sternly. She wouldn't let her student trample over her. She was the teacher; she was the boss.

Chun Li giggled. "My... Ms. Christie, I'm going to tell you a story... When I arrived here this academy was beyond a mess. It was violent, dirty, an overall train wreck. What you see today, is mostly my product. I fixed this place... I had help but without me you would've been robbed 4 times before the end of your first week. I stopped fights, the robberies, the delinquents, your class is my class. They are behaved because I'm watching. They wouldn't dare slip up to their bad habits within my presence. I also have club that is trusted to report to me. Do you understand why I'm telling you this?"

"...To respect you?"

"That's a nicer way of putting it but yes. All I'm asking is for you to give me what I deserve. What I work so hard for."

"Ms. Li... it was just a 'B' I'll remove any tricky questions in the future."

Chun Li shook her head. "How did you become a teacher?"

Ms. Christie offended, stood up out of her chair. "Excuse me!?"

"Take a seat, Christie."

"I will not!"

Chun Li stood up, eye to eye with Ms. Christie. "Don't make me repeat myself."

Ms. Christie did as told... intimated. "You were so... nice to me when I arrived."

"That was when I was a A+ student... why are you being so stubborn?"

"Regrading a paper for the reasons you have is not what teachers do."

"Do you think you're above the other faculty here?"

"Wh-What!? ...no, I-"

"I have brought up the mistakes of theirs a few times in the past and they all did what they needed to do."

"I don't 'need' to do anything. You are a bright student but you're also an arrogant bully."

Chun Li sighed. "Not arrogant, confident. You're the one who is arrogant... hope the rest of your day is pleasant, Christie."

With that, she got up and left. Little did Ms. Christie know, tomorrow she was going to see some SFA 'classic'.
1153333321111111.title: The history of SFA (Chun Li)

11533333211111112.content:
Christie woke up with the same routine as usual, not letting her student get to her. She had some cereal, did her hair, and got ready to go.

She arrived early as usual and waited for her class to join her. They were a bit late, but they didn't need to be in class early like she was, there was still time. Time continued to tick down...

There was 2 minutes until class would start... no one was there. She knew there was school today, she had her schedule in her head.

2 minutes later, she was still alone in her classroom...

Christie hadn't been this ticked off, this frequently, since Freshman year in Highschool. She began to pack up her things...

The doorknob turned as someone came in. "Sorry, I'm late... Did you cancel?" It was Chun Li carrying her books. Christie gave her a knowing eye.

"Oh, color me surprised that you were smart enough to deduce that I was behind all this emptiness." Chun Li smirked.

"...and you're still not getting an 'A'."

Chun Li's smirk disappeared. "Even if you did, we would still have a problem."

Christie's temper finally got to her. "Listen here! I did not go through---"

"Raise your voice one more time, and I will turn you into a whimpering child!" Chun Li's voice overpowered hers. Not because it was louder, it had... more behind it.

Christie cringed in her seat, as Chun's threat sent a harsh shiver down her spine.

"You're a younger teacher so I am showing you an astounding amount of leeway but if you continue to show me disrespect, you won't only be out of classmates, but you'll be out of a class."

"...What do you, mean?"

"This school is wrapped around my finger. One snap of my fingers and they'll toss your butt out of here."

"What the Hell do you want?" Christie said, defeated.

"Right... That question is a good start." Chun Li smiled and laid her textbooks unto a desk behind her.
11533333211111112.title: Tomorrow (The class is empty)

choices: Ms. Christie runs out of her classroom.
115333332111111121.content:
The student council president turned around and lifted her long blue skirt. "Kiss my butt."

Ms. Christie tightly grabbed a hold of her desk, astonished. "Wha-What!? Chun Li!"

Chun Li lowered her skirt and turned her direction back to Ms. Christie.

*Whap*

Chun Li backhanded her. Not too hard but not soft, the actual act is what shook her the most. "Every time you forget to address me properly, expect something to help you remember."

Ms. Christie said nothing in return, still stunned.

"You're not better than our staff here, they kiss my butt and so will you." Again, Chun Li lifted her dress, turned away, and bent down showing Ms. Christie her elegant white panties through her pantyhose.

Ms. Christie stared not believing the situation she was in...

"I'm not going to stand here like this for long, get out of your desk and kiss!"

Ms. Christie just continued to stare into her students rear end.

"You have 10 seconds, Christie..."
115333332111111121.title: Chun Li lifts her skirt...

choices: Ms. Christie goes home to think...
Ms. Christie bumps into someone in the halls... (Juri)
Ms. Christie bumps into someone in the halls... (???)
1153333321111111211.content:
"You want me to kiss your ass... or you're going to get me fired."

"I never said, fired. You'll be out of this school one way or another before the week is over... Also watch your mouth. Keep the vulgarity at home, try and pretend to be professional in this school."

"...Whatever." Ms. Christie leaned over her desk and gave a small peck to her students rear end.

"Do you not want this job?" Chun Li questioned.

"I did as you ordered."

"You're testing me... If I don't feel you lips on my behind in the next 3 seconds, I'm leaving and so will you."

Again Ms. Christie leaned in. She just wanted this to be over... to move on. She laid her lips onto Chun Li's behind and softly kissed for a good 5 seconds. "...There, is your ego trip over?"

"Hmm... for now that was acceptable." Chun Li walked outside.

Just a few minutes later...

Chun Li came back into the classroom... followed be her class. Before taking her seat, she whispered into Ms. Christie's ear. "If you need help putting together a quiz next time... don't be afraid to ask for a little help."

"The nerve of this..." Christie thought to herself. Even in her mind she couldn't finish what she currently felt of 'Ms. Li'.

Ms. Christie tried to gather herself in front of her class. The class likely knew about... everything and was guided by Chun Li but she wasn't going to fret about that right now when she should be doing her job...

After her class was over and the bell had rung...
1153333321111111211.title: Ms. Christie kisses up to Chun Li.

choices: Ms. Christie asks for her help.
Ms. Christie asks Juri to come to class.
11533333211111112112.content:
Ms. Christie quickly grabbed her things, not wasting any time, and left the classroom. She didn't even bother to put her books into her backpack, she wanted out... now.

She wasn't really watching where she was going, her head down. Pacing through the hallway until...

She bumped into someone. "Watch where the fu--"

It was Juri...

"Oh... check who it is, the new teach!" Juri looked down on her as her teacher gathered her dropped supplies.

Once she gathered her things she tried to walk around Juri. Juri then smacked all of her things back onto the ground. "Don't be rude, Christie. I was talking to you."

Ms. Christie's eyes were starting to tear up as she looked at her things splayed across the ground beneath her.

"Pl-Please... stop." Ms. Christie whimpered.

"Why should I exactly?" Juri replied.

"I... I never treated you with any disrespect. I-I... need to leave!"

Juri put her spiked bracelet to Christie's neck. "This seems like quite the over reaction to me knocking your shit onto the floor."

"Did someone piss in your coffee, miss teacher?" Juri asked.

"Ch-Chun Li..." The name slipped from her mouth. She was still angry and just replied to Juri's question without thinking.

"Queen bitch is pissing in peoples coffee now? I thought she got her goons to handle that shit." Juri said bringing up the student council presidents... council.

Ms. Christie placed her head in her palms as she continued to cry. "That bitch is really starting to get in my way of causing teachers to cry!" Juri palmed the side of her head as she leaned on a wall.

Ms. Christie continued to cry, ignoring Juri's comments. "Oh my god, stop crying! Aren't you a damn teacher?"

She was right but right now she didn't feel like a teacher... because of Chun Li.

Finally Ms. Christie said something to her student. "Juri..."
11533333211111112112.title: Ms. Christie bumps into Juri

115333332111111121121.content:
"She... She made me kiss her b-butt!"

"Butt? What are you 12?"

Christie ignored her and continued to vent. "I... thought she was my friend!"

"There's your first mistake, Ms. Sensei. Not even her student council cronies are her friends... not really."

Christie then sat down on the cold floor of the hallway with her head in her palms, not caring who saw her in this moment of weakness.

"...Miss prez really got your panties in a twist, huh?" Juri looked down at her broken teacher with an awkward stare.

"Listen... I don't like the bitch. Never did, never will. If you want her out of the picture for a while..." Christie looked up at her student.

"I could cause some trouble." Relying on another student... that's not what grown woman would do. That would be wrong... but she was angry.

Not in the best mood or mindset, Christie asked. "...What do you want from me."

Juri laughed. "Oh... you know, a lot of things. Taking down that bitch won't be easy, I mean I could but even I can't handle 4 women all at once. The price of my help will be costly but worth it. Mama needs her new shoes and all."

"So... money?"

"Maybe..." Juri teased the desperate teacher.

"...This isn't right." Christie mumbled to herself.

Juri started to tap her foot on the ground. "I'm not going to play, doctor. Do you want my help or not, lady?"

"...Yes, please help me." Christie said again, not thinking of her actions. Letting the emotions of the moment win.

"Give me your wallet." Juri ordered.

Christie dug into her pocket and handed it over. She was too far gone now...

Juri took out 3 bills, Christie guessed two $20's and a $10... the rest were $1's for the school's vending machines.

Juri then tossed the wallet on the ground. "The rest will come after the show." Juri then walked away, $50 richer.

'The rest'? $50 wasn't enough? 'the show'? Instant regret hit Christie like a truck... She struggled to get herself off of the ground.

...What did she just do?
115333332111111121121.title: The services of a deliquent

1153333321111111211211.content:
Ms. Christie went to class with a shiver that just wouldn't go away. Every so often, she thought about what happened yesterday. Everything she told her student... what she asked of her.

She tried to not fret about it the best she could. She wasn't a big coffee drinker but today was different. She laid her drink onto coaster on her desk and laid out her materials. After a while students joined her, including Chun Li. Still acting as if nothing happened between them... maybe she should've done the same, but that road is closed because of her erratic actions. Losing herself like that right in front of a student was embarrassing... but not as embarrassing as what Chun Li put her through though that's for sure.

After about 30 or so minutes...

The door to the classroom opened, and in came Juri with a no nonsense look upon her face. This entrance perhaps scarier than her first. She stared at Chun Li who was sitting with her attention still towards Ms. Christie.

"Hey Prez bitch!" Juri directed at Chun Li, finally getting her attention.

"Are we doing this again?" Chun Li droned.

"I can't seem to get enough of you." Juri said with a sly smile as the class just watched on, waiting for some fireworks.

"Juri..." Chun Li said as if exhausted.

"I think I finally got tired of you being top bad bitch. I think... I want this class to be mine... just like it was before you came to this school."

Chun Li sensed a change in her mood... she was serious this time. "Dan, get up and restrain her." Chun Li casually ordered.

Dan's eyes shot open. "Wh-What!?"

"You heard me. I will not repeat myself... Do it."

"You touch me, Danny boy, and not only will your forearm be snapped but you also won't 'restrain' me."

Dan started to panic as Juri gave him an order of her own. "Instead, you and the class can arrange the desks in a circle. Pretend you have a pair, she's just one girl. Her entourage ain't here."

Chun Li looked at Ms. Christie to assess the situation. As Chun Li expected... she could tell the teacher had something to do with this. Ms. Christie's face during class and right now gave it away. "I see..." Chun Li said out loud, not taking he eyes off her teacher.

"B-But... Her girls are gonna kill me!"

"Her girls are going to busy cleaning the prez's broken face." Juri said walking towards the middle of the room.

"...Fine. Move the desks... it's about time I settled you down, Juri." Chun Li got out of her seat and the class moved the desk around to make a ring.

Chun Li entered her fighting stance and so did Juri. "Try not to bore me..." Taunted Juri as she sent a high kick towards Chun Li.
1153333321111111211211.title: Juri's Mutiny

choices: Follow Chun Li in the school infirmary.
11533333211111112112111.content:
Ms. Christie silently watched on, her hand covering her mouth, as her two students fought.

Their bodies being slammed against the desk that were being held in place by whatever students they were near. Every student... looked like they have seen this before. The amount of time it took them to arrange the desk... the looks on their faces as the fight went on. Some were making noise and others looked on in awe. Sure, some seemed scared but... they just didn't have the proper reaction to... this.

One kick whiffed and nearly knocked the head off the shoulders of a boy, instead the kick just crushed the pair of glasses he was wearing...

Juri locked up with Chun Li and few short punches towards her mid-section. This wasn't some honorable fight; nothing like it, this was just a street fight in a classroom. Even Chun Li's regal disposition was missing, her hair a mess and some of her clothes ripped. Chun Li forced Juri's body to the ground, putting her on her knee's.

*Slap*

Chun Li laid a strong stinging slap to the cheek of Juri. At this point, Ms. Christie wanted to speak up, to stop this... but she didn't want it enough because she just continued to watch like the rest of the class.

"...Alright." Juri spat on the ground and got back up on her feet. Both her and Chun were panting, all the dodging earlier catching up to them.

"Now you gone and pissed me off!" Juri ran towards Chun Li with a lightening quick fierce roundhouse kick which lifting her feet off of the ground. She put everything behind it, this simple attack had downed many of her classmates that were stupid enough to oppose her... and sometimes she'd just kick them for the Hell of it...

Chun Li had seen it before, this kick wasn't anything fancy...

but it worked...

Chun Li's body went flying into a desk.

"Hahahaaa!" Juri laughed at the KO'ed pain in the ass. She placed her boot unto the top of her head teasing her, Chun Li's head being rocked back and forth... not reacting, she couldn't react. Chun Li was out.

"I could cripple you for life, madam president but... I gotta admit, that was fun. Out of all the 'fighters' that go to this school... you definitely come the closest to equaling me in a fight." The sole of Juri's boot pressed down on Chun Li's cheek until her cheek touched the classroom floor.

"Dan... 2 other losers, throw her out of my classroom."

"C-Come on guys..." Dan grabbed the forearms of two nearby students and did as commanded, lifting her out of the classroom and quickly rushing her to the school's nurse.

Ms. Christie ran up to Juri. "Wh-What did you do!?"

Juri wiped the blood from the corner of her lip. "You watched, teach. These kids already know what just happened, the same thing the class prez did before I came along. The crown is mine... and you did your part. You didn't do much of anything but something you said finally convinced me to pull the trigger on 'Ms. Li'."

Juri grabbed, Ms. Christie's collar. "Do you know what I think it was? Hearing about how Chun was treating you..."

Ms. Christie's eyes grew wide. "I was thinking about... how much more fun I'd have with you if I was in her position."

"N-No..." Ms. Christie groaned.

"Good thing... You still owe me, huh." Juri cooed into her teachers' ear.

"See you later Ms. Christie." Juri said before making her exit, leaving Ms. Christie with a lot of things to think about...
11533333211111112112111.title: Juri's takeover (Chun Li loses)

choices: Chun Li's tightened grip on the classroom.
Follow Juri in the school council office.
Follow Juri in the school infirmary.
11533333211111112112112.content:
Ms. Christie silently watched on, her hand covering her mouth, as her two students fought.

Their bodies being slammed against the desk that were being held in place by whatever students they were near. Every student... looked like they have seen this before. The amount of time it took them to arrange the desk... the looks on their faces as the fight went on. Some were making noise and others looked on in awe. Sure, some seemed scared but... they just didn't have the proper reaction to... this.

One kick whiffed and nearly knocked the head off the shoulders of a boy, instead the kick just crushed the pair of glasses he was wearing...

Juri locked up with Chun Li and few short punches towards her mid-section. This wasn't some honorable fight; nothing like it, this was just a street fight in a classroom. Even Chun Li's regal disposition was missing, her hair a mess and some of her clothes ripped. Chun Li forced Juri's body to the ground, putting her on her knee's.

*Slap*

Chun Li laid a strong stinging slap to the cheek of Juri. At this point, Ms. Christie wanted to speak up, to stop this... but she didn't want it enough because she just continued to watch like the rest of the class.

"...Alright." Juri spat on the ground and got back up on her feet. Both her and Chun were panting, all the dodging earlier catching up to them.

"Now you gone and pissed me off!" Juri ran towards Chun Li with a lightening quick roundhouse kick. She put everything behind it, this simple attack had downed many of her classmates that were stupid enough to oppose her... and sometimes she'd just kick them for the Hell of it...

Chun Li had seen it before, this kick wasn't anything fancy...

...and she dodged it just like any other kick. Her slap worked as intended, it worked up the savage delinquent. She never could control herself and that would hurt her in midst of a fight like this.

Chun Li quickly spun and delivered another slap, this one a much stronger backhand, stunning Juri. It could have been over there but to make sure, Chun Li threw out one final devastating kick, the bottom of her shoe harshly meeting the bottom of Juri's chin.

Chun Li looked down at Juri. "Hmph... Hoyokusen."

The fight was over, the attitude of the classroom returned to normal. "This entire class is going to be punished, excluding Ryu, the days of the past are over as are the days of fights in classrooms while the ignorant masses cheer in the back."

Chun Li continued. "Dan... grab two other classmates and remove Juri from the classroom and into the infirmary. Tell nurse Kolin, to tell me when she awakens. She'll be spending some time with council in my office." The classroom cringed, making Ms. Christie wonder what happens in there, judging the class's reaction... nothing good.

"I'm disappointed in you all... but there's one person that I am the most disappointed in." Before Chun Li even gave a glare to her, she knew what she was talking about... She knew. Damn it all...

Returning her attention to the class. "Well... let's call it a day, shall we? ...After of course, moving these desk to where they should be?"

The arrogance of Chun Li to announce such a thing didn't even register to Ms. Christie... she was scared like never before. The class started to move the desk back into an orderly fashion, like they were prior to the fight and then left the class... leaving only two people in the class.

Chun Li walked up to her teacher and didn't have a look of anger like she expected. She told her. "Actions and consequences." before leaving, Ms. Christie's knees gave out as she heard the door close...
11533333211111112112112.title: Chun Li's domination (Juri loses)

115333332111111121121121.content:
The next school day had arrived...

With bags underneath her eyes from lack of sleep and crying, Ms. Christie set up for her class not knowing what to expect... She had messed up...

Chun Li was the first to arrive and then the rest followed her in. As the bell rang. "...Is this everyone today?"

The class was silent. "Well then... let's begin."

"We're going to begin with something different today, Ms. Christie." The voice belonged to Chun Li...

Ms. Christie slowly turned around to face her.

"Today, I will be the one teaching you a lesson. A lesson, you will not forget. Not this time." Ms. Christie's throat dried up.

"I was nice enough to try and handle our issue in private... but it seems that wasn't the way to go about it." The class stayed quiet as Chun Li's eyes were locked to her teachers.

"Chun... Ms. Li..." Ms. Christie pleaded.

"You won't be talking unless I say otherwise." Chun Li warned.

"Dan, get up and guard the door." Dan did as told.

"This class might go on long or perhaps everyone will have a lot of free time but..."

Chun Li began to remove her shoes and gently placed them under her desk. She then slowly slid off her pantyhose to reveal her soft milky thighs and put her shoes back on. Finally, she walked in front of Ms. Christie's desk. "This class is over when you, again, kiss my butt." Chun Li then slid her skirt down presenting her white panty clad behind to Ms. Christie.

"...N-No, don't to this." Ms. Christie again pleaded.

"I said you're not talking; you lost that right. Talk again and you will get a backhand. You wanted to play rough, well... here's the consequence right in front of you. Try running, and I'll gladly smack you down as many times as need be. Go ahead, keep your class waiting. We are going to stay here until you show them what happens in my school when you're disobedient."

Ms. Christie's stomach started to churn. All of the student's eyes were on her...

"How did things turn out like this so quickly?" She thought to herself.

Before today, she would have never believed something could be more embarrassing than the moment this girl forced her to kiss her behind... It was like she was living a nightmare, but she knew it wasn't one. She knew this was very real... and there was no escaping the result. Checkmate...

Ms. Christie arms were shaking as she got up out of her chair and stood in front of her classroom.
115333332111111121121121.title: From private to public

choices: Ms. Christie wants to leave the shool.
1153333321111111211211212.content:
There was no hope and Ms. Christie knew it... She got onto her knee's not wasting any time and looked into Chun Li's bottom as her own, entire, classroom watched. She slowly craned her head toward it's inescapable destination. Ms. Christie pursed her lips and quickly kissed her students behind for the second time, the feeling of shame not hitting her anywhere near as hard as it did the first time around.

"Again, I'm going to feel your lips. You will know when you can stop." Chun Li ordered.

Ms. Christie continued, mixing short pecks along with more long sensual kisses. She ignored all the eyes on her pathetic display as she continued to kiss for what felt like 30 minutes. As Ms. Christie went in for yet another kiss, Chun Li straightened up her back and slid her skirt back up, covering herself up... It was over.

Slap!

Out of nowhere Ms. Christie was struck with a strong slap to her face. She nearly slammed the side of her head against her desk. Before she even had time to collect herself from Chun Li's slap, her hair was gripped in her palm.

"W-Why!?" Ms. Christie asked.

Chun Li let go of Ms. Christie's hair and replied to her question with a backhand. "What did I say would happen if you talked?"

Ms. Christie was shaking in fear holding her cheek on the ground next to her desk.

"I was going to stomp you into submission after I got you to kiss my behind, I decided otherwise when I saw how quickly you got onto your knees. The last time we did this, we were alone, but I thought you knew your place then. You proved me wrong. I won't be embarrassed again."

"I-I won't disrespect you ever again, Ms. Li!" Ms. Christie's voice cracked as she pleaded.

Chun Li looked down at the fallen teacher and smiled.

Slap!

"Now you have my permission to talk, Christie." Chun Li walked over her.

"Class is dismissed." Chun Li declared. Dan opened the door for her as she left with the rest of her classmates.
1153333321111111211211212.title: Ms. Christie's newest low...

11533333211111112112112121.content:
3 months later...

Gone was the "nice professional attire" Ms. Christie debuted in. Apparently, it was not up to Ms. Li's standards. Chun Li has since given her a new wardrobe, to her she looked very similar than before besides her new high heels that killed her feet. She still wore a white blouse, a dark brown skirt, and dark stockings only now they were a brand of Ms. Li's liking. This change looked similar to her... but not her bank account.

Ever since that embarrassing day, Chun Li had left her alone for the most part. The new clothes were worth it. Ms. Christie kept her head down during school hours and made sure she wouldn't get onto Chun Li's bad side again. She was just another part of Chun Li's large alliance... and she was fine with that, after all, she was still teaching.

"My... how are you today, Ms. Christie?" Chun Li smiled.

"Very well, Ms. Li. Can't complain, thank you for asking. Today will be a good day."

"I would very much hope so." Chun Li took her seat as the rest of the class came in.

Chun Li was a devil in disguise, Ms. Christie knew what she was capable of as did Chun Li. Never again did she want to get on her bad side. The first month, Ms. Christie put on a smile in front of her... but over time it became less of a charade.

"Okay, class we are going to pick up where we stopped the last time!"

And so, another day of class began and finished...
11533333211111112112112121.title: Working under Ms. Li.

choices: The vice president of Chun Li's club.
115333332111111121121121211.content:
The bell had rung, and class had finished. "Ms. Christie..."

It was her, Ms. Chun Li. "May I have a moment?" She asked nicely.

"Of course, Ms. Li, what is it?" Every time she had referred to her student as 'Ms. Li' she would she the tiniest grin form on her face.

"I would like you to talk to someone... if you have the time of course."

"I... I'm free, Ms. Li." She had plans after work, but she knew better...

"Hmmm... Good. She is waiting right outside." Chun Li said knowing she would make time for whatever she wanted.

"Okay?"

"I don't believe you two have meet but I believe it's about time for an introduction... you have been very good as of late, MJs. Christie. Very good..." Chun Li turned the doorknob...
115333332111111121121121211.title: Praise from Ms. Li

choices: Ms. Christie and Rose have a chat...
1153333321111111211211212111.content:
The smell of her perfume entering the room along with it came a beautiful, tall, blue haired woman. Simply put... she looked like elegance personified. Her uniform was similar in many ways to Chun Li's but instead of her top having a Chinese flair, it was a blouse with a spectacular jabot and instead of blue heels she had black stilettos.

She slid her small wire frame glasses up the bridge of her nose. She was quiet as she sized down Ms. Christie. Chun Li quietly watched from her seat with a knowing grin.

Ms. Christie stood up and broke the silence. "Umm... Hello?"

"Hello... So, you are new here?" The lady continued to give Ms. Christie the eye.

"Yes, ma'am... I don't believe we have met yet."

"No, we have not. Your name?"

Ms. Christie answered. "My name is Christie."

"And mine, Rose. Very nice to meet you."

"...Same." The awkwardness hasn't went away.

"I am the librarian of this school... Chun Li told me that we should have ourselves a little talk."

"Talk? ...About what?" Ms. Christie looked towards Chun Li. She had a subtle smile.

"Let us leave Ms. Li to whatever she had planned for the rest of the day. We can be alone in the library; it will of course be peaceful and quiet... I'll even make us a little tea." Ms. Christie confused, followed Rose out of her classroom.

"Don't worry, Ms. Christie, I will lock your door." Chun Li waved to her teacher.

Not knowing why, Ms. Christie felt anxious as she continued to follow the librarian.
1153333321111111211211212111.title: The schools liberian.

choices: Ms. Christie starts to feel... off.
11533333211111112112112121111.content:
Ms. Christie had been to the library before, she knew where it was located but yet never seen the one in charge of it. She couldn't imagine the job being too difficult. Being surrounded by bountiful knowledge with beautiful ambiance. There were flowers, plants, loveseats, soft chairs, and windows to let in the sun. Upon entering, you would want to pick up a book off one of the many shelves and just relax.
