"Chun Li has told me about you... What had happened and your adaption to our setting." Rose began the conversation just before taking a seat on a padded chair in front of a glass coffee table and another chair.

Ms. Christie embarrassed looked down towards the table. "...How much did she tell you?"

"There's no need to feel shame, Ms. Christie... not anymore."

"Good to know..." Ms. Christie mumbled.

"She could have been more patient but that's our Ms. Li. Needs things done quick, quick, quick... Would you like some tea?" Rose asked.

"I... guess just a little bit please."

"Menat, could you prepare two cups of tea?" Rose slightly raising her voice for 'Menat' to hear.

"It will be there in a sec!" In less than a minute, a cute young purple haired lady laid down two cups of tea onto two coasters and then quickly left. She was wearing a lovely white blazer with gold trim, a blue school skirt, dark thigh highs, and a cute bow in her hair to match her top. Her appearance more relaxed and comfortable compared to some of the schools students and faculty.

"...That was my lovely aid, Menat." Rose took a sip of her tea.

"The librarian has an aid?" Ms. Christie thought to herself.

"It's just camomile, simple yes but my personal favorite. I hope you don't hate it."

Ms. Christie started to sip her tea as well as she waited for Rose to start a dialogue.

Rose swung her black pump clad foot over her right leg. "You know, not everyone can handle that young lady doing what... she tends to do."

"Forcing people to kiss her behind?" Ms. Christie blurted out with a hint of scorn.

Not at all bothered by the teachers response, Rose continued. "Yes, that does tend to be her favorite activity... but you're still here."

"Yes, ma'am. I am."

"And that means, you truly deserve to be here, correct?"

"...I would like to think so, I love what I do."

"Even with Chun Li around... the way she likes to handle things."

"I do... what needs to be done." Ms. Christie sheepishly replied.

"Good... very good."

"Excuse me but... what did you want with me, Ms. Rose?"

"I just wanted to finally meet you, Ms. Christie... and now that I have I believe we can move on...."
11533333211111112112112121111.title: Ms. Christie and Rose have a chat...

choices: Ms. Christie signs her name down.
Ms. Christie turns down the invitation.
115333332111111121121121211111.content:
Rose slid her a small piece a paper. Ms. Christie picked it up and read it. It was a school council application...

"...What is this?"

"My... it's your promotion, my dear." Rose smiled.

"I'm... confused."

"The council is a group comprised of the best this school as to offer, I guess, Ms. Li took a liking to you." Rose took a sip of her tea.

Rose continued. "...You would also be the first teacher to join."

Ms. Li felt conflicted. "I... don't know."

"What is the issue, Ms. Christie." Rose set down her cup.

"...." Ms. Christie was lost in thought.

"Nervous?" Rose asked.

"...." Again, she didn't reply.

Rose tsked under her breath, annoyed. "She isn't ready... I told Chun Li it was too early!" Rose thought to herself.

"Ms. Christie talk to me." Rose called out.

"Oh... Oh! I'm sorry, this just... came out of nowhere. It feels like just yesterday that... I..."

Rose interrupted. "Ms. Christie... This is a good thing."

"I know but..."

"Look... finish your tea and relax, think it over if you must but honesty, not many get this opportunity."

Ms. Christie took another sip of her tea. "Thank you, Rose."

Christie looked at the application. She knew it wasn't what it seemed, she knew Chun Li was the overlord and this very club is where it all started...

As Ms. Christie read the application Rose gestured to Menat. Menat grabbed her bookmark, shut the book she was reading, slowly locked the doors to the library, and picked up a light blue orb...
115333332111111121121121211111.title: Rose's proposition.

choices: Rose & Menat change Ms. Christie's mind
1153333321111111211211212111112.content:
Rose gave her time to think things over and returned to her seat in 15 minutes later...

"Have you come to a decision?" Rose asked.

"I think I have... I just want to be a teacher."

"...I see." Rose looked to the ground.

"...Thank you for the tea and your time, Rose." Ms. Christie got up out of her seat.

"It's Ms. Rose you foolish child. Sit back down." Rose said, her attitude taking a 180.

Christie gave a knowing groan. "Not this again, listen I followed your boss's rules and---"

"I said sit down!" and Ms. Christie sat.

Rose cleared her throat before speaking next. "You should know by now that Ms. Li hates being told no. She had personally put me in charge in initiating you into our very special club and you have the gall to turn it down. She clearly thought you had changed for the better... like you, she is young. Regardless she trusted me, I don't disappoint and I won't let you disappoint her either."

"You can't keep me here. I made up my mind, let me talk to Ms. Li!"

"You'll talk to her when you leave..."

"Menat!" Rose called.

"Ma'am." The cute aid quickly returned.

"Are you prepared?"

"It's been a while master but I'm ready." The young girl revealed a shiny blueish orb from behind her back.

"Hand me the crystal ball, close the curtains, and get yourself a seat." Menat left them as Rose looked down on Ms. Christie with contempt.

"What are you planning, w-what's going on!?" The terrified teacher yelled for answers.

"Menat! when you come back, bring some duct tape from our lobby's desk as well."
1153333321111111211211212111112.title: Ms. Christie turns down the invitation.

11533333211111112112112121111121.content:
"Nooo, No! mmmppph!" Rose placed a piece of duct tape across the mouth of the loud fidgeting teacher.

"Menat, you may get started." Rose ordered.

"Yes, master." Menat grabbed a chair and put to the side of the coffee table and positioned her orb onto a stand of sorts in the middle of the table.

"You really shouldn't have annoyed Master Rose, Ms. Christie. You wouldn't like her when she's angry." Menat said as she rubbed the orb in front of her.

"Quiet, Menat.... You'll scare her and that's what I'm here for." Rose said with a slight smile.

Menat leaned over and whispered. "Don't fight what's gonna happen next." as Christie's eyes widened further.

"Master, did you want me to handle her or did you want to?" Menat asked.

Rose still standing over Ms. Christie replied. "It was been a while since I have done in such a nice young lady hasn't it... but I wouldn't want to take the experience from my pupil. Choices, choices..."
11533333211111112112112121111121.title: Rose & Menat change Ms. Christie's mind

115333332111111121121121211111211.content:
"I think I'll handle this one for a change, my dear. You may watch and take notes." Rose grabbed a hand full of the teacher's hair and pulled back.

"Th-Thank you master." Menat took a seat to the side of the table. Rose's way of going about this was a little different than hers. She was scary when she was like this. Rose would often get upset when she would screw up but would never reach the high's she got when she got behind the crystal ball. She wouldn't say anything though of course... she was still her teacher and her way of doing things most definitely worked... every single time. Menat hoped, the teacher would take her advice seriously.

"Keep your eyes open girl, or I'll get a little more tape." Rose warned still gripping Ms. Christie's hair.

Rose finally released her handful of hair as she sat in her seat across her.

Rose pulled the crystal ball close to her and started rubbing. Her palm delicately caressing it, as she did the ball would gleam. Ms. Christie watched as this mysterious orb continued to light up in front of her. She had no idea what to think as she watched on, she had never seen anything like this.

"Don't blink." Rose told her as she slid the crystal ball in front of her.

The orb was now bright as if it was full of some kind of energy. Ms. Christie didn't blink.

"Let the colors in, let me in. Don't you dare blink!" Rose commanded. Ms. Christie's eyes were starting to water.

The whole room around her was starting to twirl, the colors mixing. Everything was mixing. Everything besides the woman in front of her. Rose with her right leg crossed over her left.

Rose slowly got up from her seat. "All you had to do was join us..."

"But don't fret, after all... You will still be joining us... After I've had my fun." Rose held a palm to Ms. Christie's cheek.

"In a few seconds I'm going to remove that tape, we can restart our conversation. Understood?" Ms. Christie nodded in a daze.

Rose ripped off the tape from her mouth and despite the pain, Ms. Christie didn't react... She couldn't move.

"That will of yours that Ms. Li saw in you is nothing in my world, sweetie."

Rose continued. "Why didn't you sign the paper? ...You may answer."

"I just want to be a teacher." Christie answered.

"Hmmm"

Slap!

Rose gripped her sharp nails into the cheek of Ms. Christie. "You could've been a teacher with more influence and help more people by simply joining Ms. Li's club. Your goody two shoe's approach is flawed, there are no lies in my world. Try again... why?"

"....I'm still embarrassed after what Ms. Li did to me."

Rose let go of Christie's cheek and sat back down. "...Now we are talking. You see... I understand. I prefer to keep things private and I believe the results are less... complex. But you see, you' are here because she likes you. I've seen teachers and faculty come and go in such a sort time yet, she brought you here."

A tear dropped from Ms. Christie's eye. "Are you aware of the mistake you have made young one? Tell me..."

Ms. Christie mumbled. "M-Maybe."

"You are new here so you don't understand how foolish you are. Ms. Li can open so many different doors. Tell me... why did you want to become a teacher in the first place, surely, it couldn't have been the pay."

"...To help people."

"You can help this school by making it better, what Ms. Li did was perhaps wrong but she had her reasons and that is in the past. Think about your future."

"Look into my eyes, Ms. Christie." and she did, her beautiful violet eyes.

"Let me do the thinking for you. You are wrong." Ms. Christie started to break down even more. Both eyes were watering.

"Ms. Christie don't cry, you ruin that pretty face of yours. You don't know what's best for you... but do you know who does?" Ms. Christie's head was thumping.

"Me and Ms. Li."

"I-I'm sorry!" Ms. Christie broke down.

"Shhh, this is still a library... I know you're sorry but it's not too late." Rose snapped her finger and poof. A piece of paper appeared on the table in front of them. In the real world... Menat, ready, just slid it into place.

"Sign the paper, my dear, and let us help you." Rose triumphantly got out of her seat, placed her palm on Ms. Christie's shoulder, showed her a ballpoint pen and clicked it.

With little hesitation, Ms. Christie took the pen and signed her name down on the line.

"Good girl. I'm no liar, you will not regret this." Rose cooed into her ear.

"Now cloooose yoooour eyyeeees foooor meeeeee." Rose commanded as Ms. Christie dozed off into a slumber.
115333332111111121121121211111211.title: Rose's Mindbreaking (Part 1)

choices: Follow Ms. Christie to meet Chun Li.
1153333321111111211211212111112111.content:
Ms. Christie's eyes shuttered open. She raised a palm to her head; she had a massive headache and couldn't recall where she was and what had happened.

"Master, she's awakened!" Menat called out.

That's right... She had a talk with Rose. The duct tape keeping her in her seat was gone.

Ms. Christie could hear Rose's footsteps get louder. "Enjoy the nap, Ms. Christie?"

"It felt like I've been slapped with a brick..."

Rose couldn't help but giggle. "That is often one of the outcomes of talking to me I've been told."

"How long have I been out for?"

"No need to worry about that, there's no rush but know that you're up I believe someone wants to see you." Rose handed Christie the application she signed.

"...Right."

"My girl, you don't look very excited."

"...."

Rose began to tease Ms. Christie's ear with her finger and whispered into her ear. "You wouldn't like to disappoint us, would you?"

Her question was both seductive and threatening. "...No, Madam Rose."

"Then I suggest you turn that frown upside down and get moving."

"Yes, Madam Rose... will I get to see you again?"

"That would be up to Ms. Li. Do not disappoint her and I'm sure we can have tea again sometime."

"Yes, Madam Rose." In a daze Ms. Christie walked out of the library.

"Was the hypnosis trigger necessary Master? It seemed like you won her over."

"My pupil, always have an ace in the hole. Always be certain. Always... have yourself a little fun."

Rose took a seat and explained further. "The trigger works best when she's with me, her true feelings will slowly release when she's away from me but like you said, it wasn't necessary. She just needed a gentle push but if she tries to be cute again then I know what button of hers to press."

"Can I do the next one, Master?" Menat asked Rose.

"Next one?" Rose asked. "Feel left out my little apprentice?"

Menat blushed. "Maybe a little bit."

"I take my attention off of you for a little while and you get bored wanting to do your dance. Let's get back to training a little, the day is still early after all." Rose got out of her chair.

"Yes, Master!" Menat hugged her crystal ball and smiled.
1153333321111111211211212111112111.title: Rose's Mindbreaking (Part 2)

11533333211111112112112121111121111.content:
The thought of disappointing Madam Rose... by disappointing Ms. Li weighed down on Ms. Christie's heart as she walked toward the student council office, assuming Chun Li would be there waiting. Ms. Christie held her application close to her chest.

"It's... not too late." Ms. Christie thought to herself. First impressions were very important, and she had disappointed Chun Li so many times already. If not for Rose saying otherwise, she would have thought Chun Li would have given up on her. Her anxiousness only increased, and she got closer to the office.

Finally, she reached the office and she slowly opened up the door. There were a couple computers, but no one was currently using them. Instead what caught Ms. Christie's eye was a lone woman who was sitting comfortably in a soft looking chair with her dark stocking feet laid upon a foot stool wearing the school's outfit like most of the girl's that went to school, except that hers was dark green with gold trim. The girl was stunning, she had muscular thighs and an amazing athletic build but most notably golden blonde long ponytail with just a single bang that hovered over her right eye.

Ms. Christie nervously walked up to the very fit girl. "Excuse me..."

The young lady looked up. "Yes?"

"I'm... looking for Ms. Chun Li."

"Are you now?" She replied in a deep British accent.

"She had told me you might come here, have a seat. By the way, I am the vice president Cammy White. Pleasure to meet you." Cammy held out her hand and Ms. Christie shook it.

"I just had to... drop something off... I mean, I guess I don't have to drop it off to her specifically."

"The application papers?" Cammy 'guessed' correctly.

"Yeah..."

"I'm sure you're a busy lady being a teacher and all. I shall take it off your hands and make sure she gets it."

Though she was still nervous, part of Christie wanted to see Chun Li. "Thank you very much, Cammy... Ms. White?"

Cammy smirked. "You may refer to me however you like, Ms. Christie."

Ms. Christie just then, had remembered what Ms. Li had told her... "We should show each other respect where it's needed."

"Thank you for the help, Ms. White." Ms. Christie handed over her application.

"We will see each other very soon, enjoy the rest of your evening Ms. Christie." Cammy smiled as she shifted her legs and put away the paper.

Ms. Christie left Cammy be and went home to relax.
11533333211111112112112121111121111.title: The reformed Ms. Christie

115333332111111121121121211111212.content:
"This one will ought to be a bit more stubborn, we shall see if your silly approach holds up."

"I'll get it done master, just you watch!" Rose never believed in Menat's way of handling people but she has yet to fail. As long as the end result stays the same, she wouldn't tell Menat anything otherwise. Although... Rose's way was typically far quicker.

Menat removed her shoes and socks as Ms. Christie watched. Menat placed her bared feet onto the glass table in front of her. Next, she removed her white blazer revealing a little bit more skin. "Excuse me for a second as I get comfortable."

"You will be paying for that table if you ever break it, little missy."

"Yes, yes. I know, Master." Menat said with a cute pouty face.

Menat sat with her legs crossed and put the crystal ball in her lap. "The ball will soon turn into a rainbow of colors. Capture the sight, let the colors in."

And just like that the orb started to glow brighter and brighter. It was a sight to see. Never had Ms. Christie seen something this... beautiful. Not in person, or anywhere else. The colors slowly got brighter and brighter, Ms. Christie's eyes began to strain. She shut her eyes.

"No, no, nooo. Open those eyes. You wouldn't forgive yourself if you missed it."

"Miss... what?" Ms. Christie thought to herself as she curiously opened her eyes. The blinding colors were gone... and replaced with the beautiful aide's legs. Everything else in the room was gone and the table was replaced with a tiny red velvet stage. No Rose watching over her, no... room, just a cool blueish aura, Menat and her stage.

"What's going on?" Ms. Christie asked, the tape from her mouth was missing.

"You're lucky... I'll show you what's going on. Please... watch me." Menat started to slowly move her hips side to side like a snake. Her bare feet slithering across the velvet floor.

"I hope you'll forgive me for what I am wearing though. Too lazy to change and plus, I figured you wouldn't mind. A teacher like yourself must enjoy her school's uniform after all." She continued her dance.

"Tell me teacher, do you like my dance." Menat asked whilst rolling her midsection.

"It's fine." Ms. Christie attempted to stop Menat's play.

"Hmmph, everyone's a critic... but I know better. I may look young but I have enough experience to see what you really feel. I feel it too. All that humiliation... I understand but what I don't understand is why would you turn down Masters offer. Do you not trust her?" Menat's dance slowed down.

"I..."

"Do you not trust me?" Menat frowned.

"You put me in this spi... spirit realm!" Ms. Christie turned her sight away from Menat's thighs.

"You see this as a punishment... I telling you, it's not. If you were to be punished, Master Rose would be in front of you... We just want to be friends. We wanted to help you."

"...." Ms. Christie looked back up but not at the young lady's thighs but her face. She had a cute smile on her face.

"Bad girls and boys don't deserve my dance." Menat got onto her knees and got up closer to the teacher.

"You were hurt by what Ms. Li did... let my dance ease the pain. Make it go away." Ms. Christie looked at Menat's hips gyrate.

"Watch... and listen." Menat's soles gently pushed against the floor beneath her. Her belly so mesmerizing and her gaze... Her happy smile and green eyes...

"You are the future, the children's future, you had a chance to be more and turned it down... Ask yourself why?"

Ms. Christie knew why... but was it a good reason? Watching Menat dance, her mind was clear... No. It really wasn't... she could talk to Ms. Li, perhaps stop her from doing it to anyone else. She could make a change.

10 minutes later... "Menat..."

Menat knelt as Ms. Christie said. "I... understand. Thank you."

Menat smiled and got onto the teacher's lap. "Did you really like my dance?"

"It was something special, Menat." Ms. Christie's smile and answer removed the dramatic frown on the cute Egyptians face.

"A special dance, for a special teacher." Menat clapped her hands together, all of a sudden all the mist was sucked into her crystal ball. Then a big flash of light... they were back into the library. Menat was still lounging on Ms. Christie's lap with something in her hand... the application. Rose came up behind with a ballpoint pen, resting her hand on her shoulder.

With little hesitation, Ms. Christie took the pen and signed her name down on the line.

"Welcome to the club, Ms. Christie." Menat giggled.

1222.content:
It was Eric's second month on guard patrol for a somewhat large prison. You probably wouldn't get lost but there was plenty of walking. It was easy money... boring as all Hell, but the pay more than made up for it. Eric didn't know much about the prison. Truth be told, everyone including higher management, kept tight lips. He had asked a couple of times when he started for more details but the response was typically the same. "Nothing to worry about" "Don't worry about it" "Just do your rounds and stay awake." This prison was quite suspect... but he got paid when he was supposed to.

"Hey, Eric!" A co-worker called out.

"...Oh, hey." Eric called back... He didn't know the fella's name. There were plenty of other guards, the only name he had memorized was the one he reported to. His anti-social behavior didn't affect him too much in this field.

So far the night was more of the same. Boring, monotonous, and a bit cold. Eric, with his flashlight, made his rounds as time passed.

Beep Beep Beep

The loud alarms shook Eric out of his auto-piloted walk. Those alarms couldn't be good... maybe some idiot elbowed a button.

Eric continued along, the alarm working on giving him a migraine...


5 minutes later...


Beep Beep Beep

The alarms had to stop... Eric was getting worried. Eric started to make his way towards the main security room. The lights in the room where on... and the door was open. Not normal... the door was always closed, the guy who handled monitors likely kept a porno mag as he "watched" over the screens.

Eric walked into the room. "...Hey, what the Hell's..."

There was a man out cold on the ground... maybe dead. Eric panicked, walked backwards out where he came, eyes not leaving the downed coworker.

Eric's walk turned into a fast paced jog as he exited. He had to find someone... and he did.

There was another body laid out onto the ground...

"Holy..." Eric gasped.

His jog turned into a run...

Eric ran down the corridor looking for anyone. He turned a corner... before he knew it... he was next.

Two arms had him in a choke. Just like that, he was fading quick. He never stood a chance, nor did any other poor sap that worked here. Never got to see what had even happened. What had gone wrong...

The arms, of course, didn't let up. Eric knew what was coming and started to panic, clawing at the arms... to no effect.

Lights out.
1222.title: Eric, a security guard.

12221.content:
Eric's eyes fluttered open...

He was in the security room, the blaring alarms had been turned off, he was surrounded by screens that... used to capture many places around the prison. They were currently showing nothing but static.

Eric finally wiggled his arms around to find out that he had been bound, but just his hands.

Scared, Eric stayed still, alone in the room, hoping somebody would come along eventually.

...Until then, he sat with his arms tied.
12221.title: Eric wakes up.

choices: No trouble headed to the parking lot...
A curious guard that was patrolling outside.
122211.content:
Sometime later Eric's eyes lit up.

He heard footsteps...

Entering his vision wasn't a co-worker but instead... A beautiful blonde woman wearing some kind of skintight purple outfit with matching leggings, complete with a bright yellow slash around her waist. She looked into his eyes as she stood in the dark doorway. As she stood there, Eric noticed the black collar around her neck, risk, and a large tracker around her ankle... she was the one who cleared out the prison? How!?

Nina walked into the room, silent, until she stood in front of Eric.

She bent down to one knee and grabbed Eric's throat. Not a tight grip but still threatening. Her hand around his throat, she forced him to his feet. Her cold eyes, scaring Eric into submission.

Her hand still in place, spoke one word. "Name."

"E-Eric!" He struggled.

Her eyes seem to stare into his soul, past his eye's. "What's your job?"

Eric couldn't help but look into her eyes as he answered. "A guard!"

"The rest of the guards are in a room... They won't be getting out of anytime soon. Do you want to join them?"

Eric, honestly, felt like he was going to piss his pants. Did this woman kill those other men? Was he the only one left?

His thoughts distracting him from answering the lady's question. Her grip got tighter.

"N-No!"

She released her choke.

"This..." The woman lifted her foot off of the ground. Eric looked at the bare, red pedicured foot.

"...Is this tracking device online?"

Eric could sense more trouble coming his way... He didn't know shit about his damn place!

"I... I'm not sure."

Like lightening, her grip was again around his neck.

Eric gasped. "P-P-Pleeeease! I'm not lying!"

Still sitting the woman kept her grip and started to pull his hair with her free hand.

Again, Eric was fading... He started to tear up. He couldn't help but wonder... If this was it.

Eric began to tear up... as he would put it but in reality... He was starting to cry.

The woman eased up... "Pathetic... Your friends didn't cry."

"Think before answering me... Where are your weapons?"

Eric wiped the tears from his cheek... He knew the answer to this question... but she wasn't going to like it.

Eric coughed before answering. "There... There are no weapons here."

This was the truth. The only thing this prison gave the employees were garbage night sticks which probably couldn't break glass. They were given to the staff for looks and perhaps intimidation. A lot of the guards left them at home, and no one told them to bring them... no one cared. Fake guns, where undoubtedly, out of this places budget.

The woman got off of her knees and placed her feet beside both of Eric's legs. She menacingly towered over Eric, looking for more.

"This prison is a shithole... They couldn't afford weapons. None of us are trained... You might have ran into some guards with cheap ass plastic sticks... that was all we were given."

The woman didn't reply. Eric did all he could. He wasn't going to lie and get caught.

"...Get up."

Eric struggled to his feet again.

"You have a car?"

Eric knew where this was headed. "...Yes."

"You're going to ride me out of here."

"...." Eric was out of his league.

The blonde stepped up to Eric. "Look at me."

Eric looked into her blue eyes. "I don't need a weapon to kill you. If I sense anything wrong, I will not stutter... not even for a second. Understood?"

"...Y-Yes." Eric felt as if he was staring into the grim reaper... He knew this woman wasn't bullshiting. This job wasn't worth dying over.

"Slowly; get up and start moving." She commanded and he did as told...
122211.title: A woman walks in...

1222111.content:
Eric made his way towards the exit, the hallways still dark.

He shivered, his spine shaking as he made his way... It was so quiet... All Eric could hear was the bare soles of this mysterious woman lifting off the ground far behind him. Eric didn't turn around.

Eric opened the front doors...

Eric kept moving towards his car on the right side of the prison. "Hey kiddo!"

"Shit!" Eric thought.

"Uhh... Yeah?"

"Is everything all right in there?" The man asked with a sandwich in his hand.

"W-What do you mean?"

"What do you mean, what do I mean? What was up with those loud ass alarms going off, shit's all dark in there."

Sweat was starting to build unto Eric's forehead. "Some idiot probably triggered a metal detector... that same idiot probably didn't replace some light bulbs... You know how it is around here."

"God damn bums. All right then..." The man took another bite of his sandwich.

"You going out for lunch?"

"Uh, yeah." Eric jingled his keys.

"You did make sure someone is on patrol, right? You know we got some broad spending more than a few nights, right?"

No... he didn't know. No one told him anything. "You're just telling me this now?"

"Hey, ya'll guys need to communicate. I know what I'm doing."

"What's this woman's name?" Eric asked.

"Shit, I dunno... Nina something?" He sounded like he knew what he was doing...

"...and sorry but I forgot... what's your name?"

"It's Dave, dipshit." 'Dave' replied aggressively.

"...Right, sorry. I'll be back..." Eric walked away from another delightful encounter with a co-worker.

When Eric made his way to his car, he opened the door to get in. Only a few seconds after, he heard another door open. Eric looked in his mirror to see the lady silhouetted in darkness in his back seat.

"Get moving." Nina commanded and Eric started the car.

"Is there a booth up ahead?" She asked.

"Yes."

"Ask about the tracker around my ankle. Make it subtle or I will snap your neck and his and take this crap car of yours."

"Y-Yes, ma'am." The 'ma'am' slipped from his lips.

"Wipe yourself clean before you talk." Eric did as told and used his shirt to wipe himself down as he continued to drive.

"You're... You're name is Nina right?" Eric asked for his confirmation of his predators name.

Nina laid down into darkness of Eric's back seat. She didn't bother to reply...
1222111.title: To the parking lot.

Eric tried his damnedest to hide his emotions, to hide what he was currently feeling as he drove towards the exit, to the booth.

When Eric reached the booth and stopped, Dave paid no attention... He should of, it was kinda his job.

Eric wanted to honk his horn but knew it wouldn't help what came next. "Hey! Dave!"

"Yeah, what?"

"...Speaking of possible troubles around this place."

"...Yeah?"

"If someone were to escape... what the Hell do we have around this dump to actually help out?"

"You takin time out of your lunch for this?"

"I've been worried about it for a while, just curious."

"We got batons, trackers, and me, on watch. No one is leaving without me seeing, these fences have hardcore barbwire."

Bingo. We hoped his passenger caught that. "Do the trackers even work?"

"Are you stupid, of course they work!"

"...Do you know how they work?" Eric raised an eyebrow.

"What? ...N-No, not precisely but that's not an issue. Put one of those on a sumaofbitch and they'll be paranoid as shit." Dave flaunted his ignorance.

"We got one on our visitor, Nina. I was right, that was her name. Nina Williams. Nice piece... I might not even need my mags, just more of some of her the computer."

"...Right. Anyways, lunch ain't gonna eat itself. Later."

Dave picked up a magazine with ass with a red thong on the cover. "Yeah, yeah. Seeya, pal."

Eric drove on out. "You heard that right?"

"I heard it, keep driving until I tell you to stop."

"...You'll let me come back right?"

Nina sat up from the backseats. "You have my name and my location... Should I let you go?"

Eric looked down, depressed, unhappy with her answer as he drove down the road.

Eric continued to drive, not stopping, to nowhere in particular.

He drove in the opposite direction of the prison this woman recently broke out of single handedly.

Nina finally broke the silence. "Alright enough. Go to your house."

"M-My house?"

"Yes, I said your house. You do have a house, right? Wherever you live... drive there."

Luckily Eric lived alone in a small, somewhat run down, house in a bad neighborhood... but he still felt worried that this woman would know where he lived. Knowing better he drove home... with a potential killer in his back seat.

"...C-Can I ask you a question?" Nina didn't answer...

"Why... where you in that prison?"

"Do you want me to kill you in your own car or house?"

"I-I'm S-Sor---"

Nina interrupted. "If I told you... I'd have to kill you."

Eric could see Nina's body loosen up from his mirror. One leg kicked up onto his back seat. Her left foot complete with her tracker. He could see her red toes glisten through the darkness.

It didn't take too long for Eric to reach home. He didn't live to far from the prison. Eric slowed down as he parked into his driveway. Eric wasn't too worried about his neighbors seeing him with this blonde bombshell, it was late at night... and his neighbors have probably had weirder visitors into their houses. Nina followed Eric into his house.

Upon entering Nina wondered around... until finding his kitchen. She opened his drawers and pulled out a knife. Not a butter knife... one that could do damage. Nina slammed her heel onto Eric's table where he ate... he wasn't going to say anything. Nina used the small butcher styled knife to carefully dig around her unwanted anklet.

Trying to make things less awkward... "Would you like anything to drink?"

Nina gave him a scary look but then said. "Water."

Easy enough, Eric got a glass and filled it up.

"Shit!" Nina threw the knife against his wall.

Eric put her glass of water onto the table.

Her foot still on the table, Nina thought to herself. Eric left her be for a while.

About one hour later... Eric wanted her out of his house. "...Is there anything I can do?"
122211111.title: Nina visit's Erics home.

choices: Eric hands his car key over.
Eric reaches for the knife on the ground.
1222111112.content:
Nina brought her other leg across her left. Kicking her barefeet onto Eric's table where he had dinner, treating his home like it was hers.

"...Give me your keys."

"...My keys?"

"I'm taking your car."

"B-But I need it."

Nina looked back at Eric and placed her feet onto the ground. "I could have snapped your neck when you drove me out of that prison and took your keys... The only reason I didn't is because you got me useful information on this tracker."

She was right... She didn't have any reason to lie, even so the casualness annoyed him.

Nina turned away from Eric and again, kicked her feet up. "Walk over here... and hand me your keys."

Eric's heart was beating... He walked towards Nina...
1222111112.title: Nina wants the car...

12221111122.content:
Eric was now in front of Nina... She was so beautiful. Even after everything that has happened... He wanted to know her story.

But... he also wanted her out of his house... he wanted to secure his safety.

What he was about to do was not the way to secure it...

Eric handed Nina his key to his car, she wasn't going to return it.

Saying silent she grabbed the key and got out of her seat and walked toward the front door.

Eric slowly walked toward the knife that Nina had thrown earlier, picked it up, his heart on fire walked toward her... and trusted toward her back...

and she dodged!

Nina grabbed his arm and tossed him over her shoulder with ease, slamming him into his front door. The top of his head slamming onto the ground... no doormat. Eric was seeing stars... stars and Nina's feet.

"Pathetic" Nina looked down and grabbed his arm, dragging him away from the door.

Nina slowly placed her foot onto his neck.

Slowly... she applied pressure.

"S-Stop... P-Pleeease..." Eric begged.

She didn't stop. Eric was going to die to this mysterious stranger... wondering what was going through his mind during his "attack". The same thing that was going through his mind right now, fear.

Nina held Eric's left arm while keeping her foot on the throat. A position that forced him to look up at who was going to end him.

Nina stared into his eyes; Eric returned her stare with tears...
12221111122.title: Eric reaches for the knife on the ground...

122211111221.content:
With a look of disdain, Nina raised her foot and stomped down on Erics neck. Stamping out his life, like one would a bug.

No regret or doubt on Nina's face, she gave him enough chances and he threw them away. It was disrespectful. A spit in the face.

Nina grabbed his knife and checked his pockets. She grabbed his wallet, took the bills, and tossed the wallet to the side.

Not looking or even bothering to hide her "work" she made her way to the front door and moved on.

Nina got in to her new car and started it up...
Back to work as usual.
122211111221.title: Nina snaps his neck.

122211111222.content:
Nina removed her foot from Eric's neck and placed it onto his chest.

"Why would a boy like you try and stab a woman like me?"

With tears in his eyes, Eric honestly responded. "...I-I was scared of you. I-I don't know."

Nina took his arm into an armbar. "Do you realize how lucky you are? How out of character what I'm about to do is?"

Eric looked up at Nina...

Nina pulled her weight back and...

Snap!

"Aaaaaarooooagh!" Eric howled in pain. Nina gave a stiff kick to give ribs quieting him down.

Nina covered his mouth with her palm as she placed herself across him. "Remember this pain. This pain is a remember that you got lucky an assassin spared your worthless life because she pitied you. Imagine all of the others who didn't get the chance you got."

Nina removed her palm and stood over Eric. "You're going to go back to work and tell them what happened. Tell that co-worker of yours that if he decides to call me in that he won't get as lucky as you. I will very painfully kill him. I'm sure the pay won't be worth it... Give me your wallet."

Eric struggled into his pocket with his good hand. Nina took the bills and tossed him back the wallet.

"Good boy... Make sure you tell your friend that bad news before you go to a hospital."

Nina again, made her way to the door, grabbing his knife on the way. "...How am I supposed to get there without my car?"

"Start walking." Nina said before closing the door shut behind her.

Nina got to her new car and started it up...
Back to work as usual.
122211111222.title: Nina snaps his arm.

1222111112221.content:
The work being... The assassination of Heihachi Mishima. The head of the Mishima Financial Group and the host of the upcoming Iron Fist Tournament. There was a very sum of money to whoever could best in a one on one fight in the finals... but this was no concern to Nina. It wouldn't be something to be broadcasted for the old man's entertainment, she will be there and defeat him... not only defeat him but end him. Mishima could be buried with his millions, Nina would get paid after the dead had been done. The embarrassment of getting cooped up in some small jail had been covered up and it was time to move on. Nina drove to her next location; her sources supplied a lot of valuable information but there was more she needed to know.

She had to find someone with information regarding this tournament and how it worked. Nina knew the rules but honestly... she didn't quite know how to begin. She knew her intentions as a competent had to be shown but going into the street and picking fights would gather far too much attention. She had to be smart about this...

Nina continued her drive across town as she found a mob of people in a street in front of a pub. She parked the car and got out to see what had gathered the crowd, it was fight between two fairly strong looking men. One with large shoulder pad getup with blue denim jeans and cowboy boots was currently beating down the other wearing a dirty wife-beater. The crowd cheering him on as he kicked at the downed loser. There were fights like this happening all over the world because of the tournament, men trying to show off their machismo was typical in America trying to get attention, perhaps to get attention from a sort of scout of Heihachi. Nina didn't know the details... but she had a feeling that would some change.

Nina patiently waited for the crowd to disperse; it didn't take long as she caught the end of the fight. A cocky smug was on the face of the man with cowboy boots, still wet from the blood of his laid out opponent. Before he could head back into the pub... Nina pulled him into a nearby alley off to the side, quickly placing him in a choke hold whilst dragging him even further into the darkness. Due to the fight only about a minute ago, he couldn't resist much. In the alley, Nina added pressure until the man went to his knees and Nina followed. They both sat with their spread legs on the ground. The man could see Nina's painted toe's through his blurred vision... He was so sure some jealous guy got the sneak on him.

Nina released the hold and used her right hand to light grip the man's throat. "You were fighting for the Iron Fist Tourney, wee you not? You're going to explain to me, everything I want to know."

"W-Wha? I..." Nina's hand got tighter across his throat.

"O-Okay, okay..." Nina eased up.

"There are countless scouts across the world, so people are fighting 'nd shit, ya know? To get paid... That's all I know..." Nina stared into the man's eyes, her hand still unmoving.

"...Th-There's a dude, super popular right now in 'Merica. B-Badass, he's supposed tah be. His name's Paul, stupid ass hairdo, can't miss em... That's really, all I know!" The man was practically pleading to just get away from this crazy blonde.

Nina, finally content, eased up on her grip on his throat and asked. "...Where?"
1222111112221.title: Assassination target: Heihachi Mishima

12221111122211.content:
Nina drove 2 hours and was nearing her next target. She kept her foot on the pedal as she got nearer to the area the man had told her to look. She knew he wasn't lying and she knew it was accurate. She could tell by the look in his eyes, never in her short career had they lied to her. Paul was currently staying at a hotel somewhere in the heart of New York City and he frequently stopped at nearby bars, either for random fights or the alcohol... most likely both.

Nina had arrived in the city and left her car parked in a subterranean parking lot, leaving on foot to continue her tracking of the target in mind. After various bar visit's Nina got her information... from a pervert. He didn't take long to talk to her after a little convincing outside. Paul was nearby... She left the unconscious body of the informant behind.



At a nearby bar, Paul was chugging down mugs of beer. "Hey barkeep... Any badasses around these parts or just these twigs?"

"...You've made up quite the tab, Phoenix. You do intend on paying me don't you." The barkeep ignored Paul's question.

"You'll get your money... and after I destroy the brackets in The Iron Fist tourney and gonna drink this place dry, no worries. Give me another one." The barekeep hesitantly refilled the mans mug.
12221111122211.title: Interrogation target: Paul Phoenix (In Progress)

13511.content:
"You have always doubted me... My power... My will!" Frost slowly made her way towards Sub-Zero with a spinning drill for a hand as Cyrax had Scorpions attention.

Once his disciple... now a cold blooded cyborg. Seeing his aggressive student turned into this was a surprise to say the least.

"What happened to you, Frost?" Sub-Zero questioned.

"I've always had the skill... now I have the tools to implement them." Frost answered.

"That arrogance has always outweighed whatever skill you've had, Frost."

"Is it arrogance Master?" Frost said while her left hand transformed into a drill, matching her right.

Sub-Zero formed an ice sword with his bare hands "Mechanical upgrades and a few drills won't help you Frost, nothing will."

"...Oh, Master, it seems like I'm going to need to teach you a few things, about the new Frost."
13511.title: Frost Vs. Sub-Zero!

135111.content:
Frost played it safe.. read her former Master like a book. Every move of his was expertly blocked. The first moment of minor fatique and Frost drove her drill into the lower leg of Sub-Zero.

"She knows my every move... How!?" Sub-Zero thought to himself in anger.

"I was a good student, I paid very close attention. I always knew I was great, and now I'm perfect." Frost detracted her spinning drills as she made her way over to the downed, seriously injured, Sub-Zero

When she arrived up close to the now kneeling Sub-Zero she gave him a firm straight across his cheek.

"Tell me, Master... Am I arrogant... Now!?" Frost asked as she delivering another straight to his cheek.

"Grroah..." Sub-Zero panted.

"No? hmph, didn't think so."

Frost formed a sword, one longer than Sub-Zero's, into her palm.

Frost grabbed the back of his head "Do you know how much I'd love to slooowly sever your head right now, Kuai?"

"But you held me back so so damn long, acted superior for years that killing you now would be a waste and just... anticlimactic. There's a side of me that get's it... The power to tell someone like me what to do. I get it... and now I'm thinking I wanna give playing teacher a shot."

"Frost there's still time, you don't----" Crrk

Frost slammed Sub-Zero's head into the ground breaking the pavement and maybe his skull "You're not understanding your position... but you will, very soon. You're done preaching and teaching. You're done acting high and mighty..."

"...and you're done talking."

Frost covered Sub-Zero's mouth with her hand as she froze it shut. Frost gave him a quick but painful kick to the ribs before freezing his wrists and ankles to the ground with her chest beam.

"We've been away from each other for quite some time, let's do some catching up. You know I've changed and some you'll change too. Both... for the better."
135111.title: Frost defeats Sub-Zero...

1351111.content:
Wssssh Crunk

Cyraxs body was thrown harshly unto the ground besides Frost interrupting her.

"I'm not as weak as him... I have no feelings besides contempt for you... Frost."

"Useless outdated piece of yellow metal!" Frost thought to herself.

"It doesn't matter if you're stronger than Kuai, you're nothing in comparison to me and my body given to me by the all powerful Kronika."

"I'll rip her gift from your body before killing you." Scorpion threatened.

"Kuai wasn't the only arrogant one... you'll make for a good slave after I've broken you down. As a thank you, I'll make sure to gift you to Kronika for all that she's given me." Frost stood up and got in fighting stance.
1351111.title: Frost Vs. Scorpion

13511111.content:
Scorpion started off by throwing his signature spear, impaling Frost in the chest bringing her close to him.

"Big mistake" Frost said as her entire upper torso quickly sped around nearly cutting into Scorpion.

Frost threw out what seems to be a grenade under the feet of Scorpion. Scorpion teleported behind her quickly with his sword about to secure the final blow. But... again Frost's upper torso began to spin, Scorpion dashed back but before he could think of what to do next the still spinning Frost quickly walked forward making him crouch low avoiding her deadly limbs. Scorpion gave her a strong uppercut knocking sending her head rolling.

"You did seem to have potential but not the experience, young one." As soon as he finished his backhanded compliment he looked down. Her head glowed white, before he could dodge her head exploded freezing his entire body. He cursed himself. He knew it only took one second and any fight could be over...

Frost's head somehow formed back unto it's body "Urrgh."

Frost groaned in pain but looked back to see if her plan panned out as intended... and it did. She couldn't help but smile under her mask. She knew she could do it but... even she didn't think it'd work out this well.

Frost walked over to the frozen ninja, twisted her torso and gave him a spinning elbow that would kill most people but surely not Scorpion. After the blow, she froze Scorpion in place like she did her former mentor.

"The Shirai Ryu were always weak and you are no exception." Frost dismissed Scorpion as she walked over him making her way to Sub-Zero.

"Are you proud of me now, Sub? I did what you could never do in a matter of minutes." Sub-Zero shown an attempt to talk over his frozen mouth.

"Now we will build the new Lin Kuei up together. A better Lin Kuei, me as the master and you as the obedient pupil."

Towering over Sub-Zero, Frost looked directly into his eyes. "I will be a better leader than you ever was, you will respect me..."

"...and you will fear me."
13511111.title: Frost defeats Scorpion

135111111.content:
"Your friend over there won't be the first robot and certainly won't be the last, Sub..." Frost directed her attention to Scorpion.

Sub-Zero looked around, the horrific bloodied corpses of his fallen clan was what met his eye. He knew what Frost was going to do, he couldn't let the same fate befall his friend. Sub-Zero screamed as loud as he could to regain Frost's attention. Frost stopped walking towards Scorpion and tilted her head back towards her former mentor.

Frost made her way back to Sub-Zero "Hmm? Something you want to say before I convert that trash?"

Frost placed her palm over Sub-Zero's frozen mouth and applied pressure enough to crush it, allowing him to breath and talk again.

"Don't do this Frost... he's a good man!" Sub-Zero pleaded.

"Good... man? He is Shirai Ryu trash. He has single-handedly stumped the process of our clan for years! You've lost it Sub... you're an old embarrassment."

"He helped me, Frost."

"He helped you by again, stumping the process of the Lin Kuei. We are the future, we are strong."

Frost thought to herself. A fun break from her plan to insure Kronica was happy.

"Right now we have enough redeemed Lin Kuei members and I'm not quite sure if I even want a Shirai Ryu bringing us down... especially after everything's he's done to us... he might not even be worthy of redemption."

"This hate inside of you Frost... you need to---"

Whap

Frost jabbed Sub-Zero directly in his nose keeping him quiet.

"I don't need to do anything... you still think to can tell me what to do, even in the position you're in." Frost destroyed the ice keeping Sub-Zero down onto the ground.

"Again, I might not kill your pal. You can try and convince me... convince me by doing what I've been doing to you for years..." Frost turned around and provocatively bent down.

"...by kissing your superiors ass."
135111111.title: Frost's plan into action...

choices: Sub-Zero arrives at the Lin Kuei Temple...
1351111112.content:
Her back was turned to Sub-Zero waiting...

"How dare she turn her back to me!" Sub-Zero thought inraged. At that moment Sub-Zero was about to take the opportunity to strike her unarmed back.

After the initial rage died down Sub-Zero thought about what could've happened, was the risk worth it? If he were to attack and somehow fail yet again, he would be killing Hanzo.... He could always attack her later. Perhaps swallowing his pride and kissing the woman's behind could lower her guard even more so... but still.

"I'm not going to wait forever, Kuai. Get over here now!" Frost yelled.

"Fine! You'll have it your way..." Sub-Zero began to walk over towards Frost.

Frost smiled under her mask. This was just the beginning of her conquest... what a start. Frost then felt a quick peck to her right cheek.

"I don't feel convinced... keep kissing." Frost said seemingly calmed down.

"You said kiss. I gave your behind a kiss." Sub-Zero tried talking himself out of lowering himself further.

"And I said keep kissing. Go ahead... keep testing me Kuai. If I don't feel your lips on my ass in 5 seconds, I'm turning your friend into my personal roboservant." Frost's attitude quickly came back.

Frost counted "1, 2, 3, 4..."

At the count of 4 and a half she felt her former teachers lips on her ass. Small pecks here and there all across the right cheek.

"You really favor the right side of my ass huh Kuai?" Frost teased.

"I'm only doing this to save a friend... don't get what's happening confused, Frost." Sub-Zero said as he stopped servicing Frost.

"Oh, I'm sure, Kuai. Cyrax! Get up, now!" Frost ordered the stuttering yellow robot still on the ground. His repairs from Scorpions beating somewhat repaired.

"Y-Y-Yessss, M-Maam." Cyrax replied trying to gather himself as sparks flew out of his circuitry.

"Keep auto-recover enabled and carry Scorpion. Destination: Lin Kuei Temple Redux" Sub-Zero hearing those words confused him. He's heard of the Lin Kuei palace but never this Lin Kuei Temple... Redux.

"Congratulations Kuai... now you get to see the superior Lin Kuei base. Follow me and don't even think of trying anything funny."
1351111112.title: Sub-Zero play's it safe...

choices: Those who get in her way...

info.brief_description: An interactive female domination story dedicated to the women of fighting games.
info.description:
I had a lot of ideas swirling in my mind and thanks to the very talented authors that are still active on the site, I decided to finally make an interactive story of my own featuring the super beautiful woman of fighting games. Some of my chapters might be in progress, being able to edit chapters mean I can kind of take my time with things so if you see something weird or just incomplete then it probably is. If you love these characters as much as I do, please feel free to contribute...

Also everyone in this story is either 18 years or older even if you think that'd be weird or the game say's otherwise. They're 18 or older, believe me.



- No M/M.

- Only fictional women from any fighting game. No games that come from another media's source material (Smash, Marvel, DBZ, DC, etc.)

- No pointless short chapters without intent and please try to use proper spelling and grammar.
